Whenever you draw a card, target opponent puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If they're both nonland cards that share a color, repeat this process.
{5}{U}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

foreignNames.name: 漫步云端
foreignNames.text: 结附于生物当漫步云端进战场时，抓一张牌。所结附的生物具有飞行异能。（它只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）所结附的生物只能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。

foreignNames.name: 漫步雲端
foreignNames.text: 結附於生物當漫步雲端進戰場時，抽一張牌。所結附的生物具有飛行異能。（此生物只能被具飛行或延勢異能的生物阻擋。）所結附的生物只能阻擋具飛行異能的生物。

foreignNames.name: Tour de stratus
foreignNames.text: Enchanter : créatureQuand le Tour de stratus arrive sur le champ de bataille, piochez une carte.La créature enchantée a le vol. (Elle ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)La créature enchantée ne peut bloquer que les créatures avec le vol.

foreignNames.name: Auf Wolken wandeln
foreignNames.text: Verzaubert eine KreaturWenn Auf Wolken wandeln ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte.Die verzauberte Kreatur hat Flugfähigkeit. (Sie kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nur fliegende Kreaturen blocken.

foreignNames.name: Camminare sui Nembi
foreignNames.text: Incanta creaturaQuando Camminare sui Nembi entra nel campo di battaglia, pesca una carta.La creatura incantata ha volare. (Non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)La creatura incantata può bloccare solo creature con volare.

foreignNames.name: 層雲歩み
foreignNames.text: エンチャント（クリーチャー）層雲歩みが戦場に出たとき、カードを１枚引く。エンチャントされているクリーチャーは飛行を持つ。（それは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）エンチャントされているクリーチャーは飛行を持つクリーチャーのみをブロックできる。

foreignNames.name: 구름 걷기
foreignNames.text: 생물에 부여구름 걷기가 전장에 들어올 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.부여된 생물은 비행을 가진다. (이 생물은 비행이나 대공을 가진 생물에만 방어될 수 있다.)부여된 생물은 비행을 가진 생물만 방어할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Caminhar nos Estratos
foreignNames.text: Encantar criaturaQuando Caminhar nos Estratos entrar no campo de batalha, compre um card.A criatura encantada tem voar. (Ela só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com voar ou alcance.)A criatura encantada só pode bloquear criaturas com voar.

foreignNames.name: Прогулка по Облакам
foreignNames.text: Зачаровать существоКогда Прогулка по Облакам выходит на поле битвы, возьмите карту.Зачарованное существо имеет Полет. (Оно может быть заблокировано только существами с Полетом или Захватом.)Зачарованное существо может блокировать только существа с Полетом.

foreignNames.name: Levitación estratosférica
foreignNames.text: Encantar criatura.Cuando la Levitación estratosférica entre al campo de batalla, roba una carta.La criatura encantada tiene la habilidad de volar. (No puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)La criatura encantada solo puede bloquear criaturas con la habilidad de volar.

cards.name: Stratus Walk
cards.originalText: Enchant creatureWhen Stratus Walk enters the battlefield, draw a card.Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Stratus Walk enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

foreignNames.name: 读心天赋
foreignNames.text: 目标对手展示其牌库顶的七张牌。你可以施放其中的一张瞬间或法术牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。然后该牌手将其余的牌置入其坟墓场。精熟咒语～如果你坟墓场中有两张或更多的瞬间和／或法术牌，则改为你可以如此施放至多两张所展示的瞬间和／或法术牌，而非一张。

foreignNames.name: 讀心天賦
foreignNames.text: 目標對手展示其牌庫頂的七張牌。你可以施放其中的一張瞬間或巫術牌，且不需支付其魔法力費用。然後該玩家將其餘的牌置入其墳墓場。精熟咒語～如果你墳墓場中有兩張或更多的瞬間和／或巫術牌，則改為你可以如此施放至多兩張所展示的瞬間和／或巫術牌，而非一張。

foreignNames.name: Talent du télépathe
foreignNames.text: L'adversaire ciblé révèle les sept cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque. Vous pouvez lancer une carte d'éphémère ou de rituel parmi elles sans payer son coût de mana. Ce joueur met ensuite le reste dans son cimetière.Maîtrise de sort — S'il y a au moins deux cartes d'éphémère et/ou de rituel dans votre cimetière, vous pouvez lancer jusqu'à deux cartes d'éphémère et/ou de rituel révélées à la place d'une.

foreignNames.name: Talent des Telepathen
foreignNames.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl deckt die obersten sieben Karten seiner Bibliothek auf. Du kannst davon eine Spontanzauber- oder Hexerei-Karte wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen. Dann legt dieser Spieler den Rest auf seinen Friedhof.Zauberkunst — Falls sich zwei oder mehr Spontanzauber- und/oder Hexerei-Karten in deinem Friedhof befinden, kannst du bis zu zwei aufgedeckte Spontanzauber- oder Hexerei-Karten statt einer wirken.

foreignNames.name: Talento del Telepate
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio rivela le prime sette carte del suo grimorio. Puoi lanciare una carta istantaneo o stregoneria scelta tra esse senza pagare il suo costo di mana. Poi quel giocatore mette le altre nel suo cimitero.Arte magica — Se nel tuo cimitero ci sono due o più carte istantaneo e/o stregoneria, puoi lanciare fino a due carte istantaneo e/o stregoneria rivelate invece di una.

foreignNames.name: テレパスの才能
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から７枚のカードを公開する。あなたはその中にあるインスタント・カードかソーサリー・カード１枚を、そのマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。その後、そのプレイヤーは残りのカードをそのプレイヤーの墓地に置く。魔巧 — あなたの墓地にインスタント・カードやソーサリー・カードが合わせて２枚以上あるなら、あなたは公開されたインスタント・カードやソーサリー・カードを１枚の代わりに最大２枚まで唱えてもよい。

foreignNames.name: 정신술사의 재능
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 일곱 장을 공개한다. 당신은 그렇게 공개된 순간마법이나 집중마법 카드 한 장을 마나 비용을 지불하지 않고 발동할 수 있다. 그 플레이어는 공개된 나머지 카드를 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.주문 숙련 — 당신의 무덤에 집중마법 그리고/또는 순간마법 카드가 두 장 이상 있다면, 당신은 공개된 순간마법 또는 집중마법 카드를 한 장 대신 최대 두 장까지 발동할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Talento do Telepata
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo revela sete cards do topo de seu próprio grimório. Você pode conjurar um card de mágica instantânea ou feitiço dentre eles sem pagar seu custo de mana. Depois, aquele jogador coloca o resto dos cards revelados no próprio cemitério.Maestria em magia — Se houver dois ou mais cards de mágica instantânea ou feitiço no seu cemitério, você poderá conjurar até dois cards de mágica instantânea ou feitiço, em vez de um.

foreignNames.name: Талант Телепата
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент показывает семь верхних карт своей библиотеки. Вы можете разыграть находящуюся среди них карту мгновенного заклинания или волшебства без уплаты ее мана-стоимости. Затем тот игрок кладет оставшиеся карты на свое кладбище.Мастерство заклинаний — Если на вашем кладбище есть не менее двух карт мгновенных заклинаний и (или) волшебства, вы можете разыграть до двух показанных карт мгновенных заклинаний или волшебства вместо одной.

foreignNames.name: Talento del telépata
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo muestra las siete primeras cartas de su biblioteca. Puedes lanzar una carta de instantáneo o de conjuro que se encuentre entre ellas sin pagar su coste de maná. Luego ese jugador pone el resto en su cementerio.Dominio de hechizos — Si hay dos o más cartas de instantáneo y/o de conjuro en tu cementerio, en vez de eso, puedes lanzar hasta dos cartas de instantáneo y/o de conjuro mostradas.

cards.name: Talent of the Telepath
cards.originalText: Target opponent reveals the top seven cards of his or her library. You may cast an instant or sorcery card from among them without paying its mana cost. Then that player puts the rest into his or her graveyard.Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may cast up to two revealed instant and/or sorcery cards instead of one.

rulings.text: If the spell mastery ability applies, you’ll cast the two cards in order. The one you cast last will be the one that resolves first.

You cast the instant and/or sorcery card(s) from your opponent’s library as Talent of the Telepath is resolving. Ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type. Other timing restrictions, such as “Cast [this card] only during combat,” must be followed.
The cards will be put into their owner’s graveyard after they resolve, not yours.

If you can’t cast any instant or sorcery cards (perhaps because there are no legal targets available) or if you choose not to cast one, then Talent of the Telepath finishes resolving. Any of the revealed cards you didn’t cast will be put into that player’s graveyard.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t pay any alternative costs. You can pay additional costs such as kicker costs. If the card has mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as its value.

Check to see if there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard as the spell resolves to determine whether the spell mastery ability applies. The spell itself won’t count because it’s still on the stack as you make this check.

cards.text:
Target opponent reveals the top seven cards of his or her library. You may cast an instant or sorcery card from among them without paying its mana cost. Then that player puts the rest into his or her graveyard.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may cast up to two revealed instant and/or sorcery cards instead of one.

foreignNames.name: 振翼机情报网
foreignNames.text: 在你的维持开始时，若你操控神器，则将一个1/1无色，具飞行异能的振翼机衍生神器生物放进战场。每当由你操控的一个或数个神器生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

foreignNames.name: 振翼機情報網
foreignNames.text: 在你的維持開始時，若你操控神器，則將一個1/1無色，具飛行異能的振翼機衍生神器生物放進戰場。每當由你操控的一個或數個神器生物對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，抽一張牌。

foreignNames.name: Réseau de mécanoptères espions
foreignNames.text: Au début de votre entretien, si vous contrôlez un artefact, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature-artefact 1/1 incolore Mécanoptère avec le vol.À chaque fois qu'au moins une créature-artefact que vous contrôlez inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, piochez une carte.

foreignNames.name: Thopter-Spionagenetz
foreignNames.text: Falls du zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments ein Artefakt kontrollierst, bringe einen 1/1 farblosen Thopter-Artefaktkreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.Immer wenn eine oder mehrere Artefaktkreaturen, die du kontrollierst, einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügen, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignNames.name: Rete di Totteri Spia
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, se controlli un artefatto, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura artefatto Tottero 1/1 incolore con volare.Ogniqualvolta una o più creature artefatto che controlli infliggono danno da combattimento a un giocatore, pesca una carta.

foreignNames.name: 飛行機械の諜報網
foreignNames.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがアーティファクトをコントロールしている場合、飛行を持つ無色の１/１の飛行機械・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。あなたがコントロールする１体以上のアーティファクト・クリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、カードを１枚引く。

foreignNames.name: 날틀 첩보망
foreignNames.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신이 마법물체를 조종한다면, 비행을 가진 1/1 무색 날틀 마법물체 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.당신이 조종하는 하나 이상의 마법물체 생물이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 줄 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignNames.name: Rede de Espionagem de Tópteros
foreignNames.text: No início de sua manutenção, se você controlar um artefato, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura artefato incolor 1/1 do tipo Tóptero com voar.Toda vez que uma ou mais criaturas artefato que você controla causarem dano de combate a um jogador, compre um card.

foreignNames.name: Шпионская Сеть Топтеров
foreignNames.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки, если под вашим контролем есть артефакт, положите на поле битвы одну фишку артефакта существа 1/1 бесцветный Топтер с Полетом.Каждый раз, когда один или более артефактов существ под вашим контролем наносят боевые повреждения игроку, возьмите карту.

foreignNames.name: Red de espionaje tóptera
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, si controlas un artefacto, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura artefacto Tóptero incolora 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.Siempre que una o más criaturas artefacto que controlas hagan daño de combate a un jugador, roba una carta.

cards.name: Thopter Spy Network
cards.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

rulings.text: Thopter Spy Network’s first ability has an “intervening ‘if’ clause.” That means (1) the ability won’t trigger at all unless you control an artifact as your upkeep begins, and (2) the ability will do nothing if you don’t control an artifact as it resolves.

The last ability will trigger, at most, once per combat damage step. However, if at least one artifact creature you control has first strike and others don’t, or if an artifact creature you control has double strike, the ability could trigger twice per combat: once in each combat damage step.

cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an artifact, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.flavor: Jenrik's tower is served by those who once sought to enter it uninvited.

foreignNames.name: 塔楼游魂
foreignNames.text: 飞行当塔楼游魂进战场时，检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张置入你的坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor: 严理的塔楼由曾被当成不速之客者来维护。

foreignNames.name: 塔樓遊魂
foreignNames.text: 飛行當塔樓遊魂進戰場時，檢視你牌庫頂的兩張牌。將其中一張置於你手上，另一張置入你的墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 嚴理的塔樓由曾被當成不速之客者來維護。

foreignNames.name: Geist de la tour
foreignNames.text: VolQuand le Geist de la tour arrive sur le champ de bataille, regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une d'entre elles dans votre main et l'autre dans votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: La tour de Jenrik est servie par ceux qui autrefois ont voulu y entrer sans invitation.

foreignNames.name: Turmgeist
foreignNames.text: FliegendWenn der Turmgeist ins Spiel kommt, schaue dir die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege die andere auf deinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: In Jenriks Turm bestehen die Diener aus ehemaligen ungeladenen Gästen.

foreignNames.name: Geist della Torre
foreignNames.text: VolareQuando il Geist della Torre entra nel campo di battaglia, guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungine una alla tua mano e metti l'altra nel tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: La torre di Jenrik è servita da quanti un tempo tentarono di entrarvi senza invito.

foreignNames.name: 塔の霊
foreignNames.text: 飛行塔の霊が戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見る。そのうち１枚をあなたの手札に加え、もう１枚をあなたの墓地に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: ジェンリクの塔に仕えているのは、招かれざるままに入る術を求めた者達だ。

foreignNames.name: 탑의 심령
foreignNames.text: 비행탑의 심령이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 본다. 그 중 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져가고 다른 한 장은 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 젠릭의 탑은 한때 그의 허락 없이 침입하려고 했던 자들에 의해 관리된다.

foreignNames.name: Geist da Torre
foreignNames.text: VoarQuando Geist da Torre entrar no campo de batalha, olhe os dois cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque um deles na sua mão e o restante em seu cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: Os servos da torre de Jenrik são seus visitantes indesejáveis do passado.

foreignNames.name: Привидение Башни
foreignNames.text: ПолетКогда Привидение Башни выходит на поле битвы, посмотрите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Положите одну из них в вашу руку, а другую — на ваше кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: В башне Дженрика прислуживают те, кто когда-то пытался проникнуть в нее без приглашения.

foreignNames.name: Geist de la torre
foreignNames.text: Vuela.Cuando el Geist de la torre entre al campo de batalla, mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de ellas en tu mano y la otra en tu cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: La torre de Jenrik es atendida por aquellos que alguna vez entraron sin ser invitados.

cards.name: Tower Geist
cards.originalText: FlyingWhen Tower Geist enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

rulings.text: If there's only one card in your library when Tower Geist enters the battlefield, you'll look at that card and put it into your hand.

cards.text:
Flying
When Tower Geist enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

cards.flavor: "Ribbit."

foreignNames.name: 化蛙术
foreignNames.text: 直到回合结束，目标生物失去所有异能，且成为基础力量与防御力为1/1的蓝色蛙。
foreignNames.flavor: 「呱呱。」

foreignNames.name: 化蛙術
foreignNames.text: 直到回合結束，目標生物失去所有異能，且成為基礎力量與防禦力為1/1的藍色蛙。
foreignNames.flavor: 「呱呱。」

foreignNames.name: Transformation en grenouille
foreignNames.text: Jusqu'à la fin du tour, la créature ciblée perd toutes ses capacités et devient une grenouille bleue avec une force et une endurance de base de 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: « Coâ. »

foreignNames.name: Verfroschen
foreignNames.text: Bis zum Ende des Zuges verliert eine Kreatur deiner Wahl alle Fähigkeiten und wird zu einem blauen Frosch mit Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: „Quaaak."

foreignNames.name: Tramutare in Rana
foreignNames.text: Fino alla fine del turno, una creatura bersaglio perde tutte le abilità e diventa una Rana blu con forza e costituzione base 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: "Cra cra."

foreignNames.name: 蛙変化
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それはすべての能力を失うとともに基本のパワーとタフネスが１/１の青のカエルになる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「ゲコッ」

foreignNames.name: 개구리로 변신
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 모든 능력을 잃고 기본 공격력 및 방어력이 1/1인 청색 개구리가 된다.
foreignNames.flavor: "개굴."

foreignNames.name: Transformar em Sapo
foreignNames.text: Até o final do turno, a criatura alvo perde todas as habilidades e torna-se um Sapo azul com 1/1 de poder e resistência básicos.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ueberte".

foreignNames.name: Превращение в Лягушку
foreignNames.text: До конца хода целевое существо теряет все способности и становится синей Лягушкой с базовыми силой и выносливостью 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: «Ква!»

foreignNames.name: Convertir en rana
foreignNames.text: Hasta el final del turno, la criatura objetivo pierde todas sus habilidades y se convierte en una Rana azul con fuerza y resistencia base 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: "Croac".

cards.name: Turn to Frog
cards.originalText: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

rulings.text: The creature will lose all other colors and creature types, but it will retain any other card types (such as artifact) or supertypes (such as legendary) it may have.

Turn to Frog overwrites all previous effects that set the creature’s base power and toughness to specific values. Any power- or toughness-setting effects that start to apply after Turn to Frog resolves will overwrite this effect.

Turn to Frog doesn’t counter abilities that have already triggered or been activated. In particular, there is no way to cast this spell to stop a creature’s ability that says “At the beginning of your upkeep,” “When this creature enters the battlefield,” or similar from triggering.
If the affected creature gains an ability after Turn to Frog resolves, it will keep that ability.

Effects that modify a creature’s power and/or toughness, such as the effect of Titanic Growth, will apply to the creature no matter when they started to take effect. The same is true for any counters that change its power and/or toughness and effects that switch its power and toughness.

If one of the Theros block Gods is affected by Turn to Frog, it will be a legendary 1/1 blue Frog enchantment creature with no abilities. If it stops being a creature, perhaps because your devotion to its color(s) decreased, it will be a legendary blue enchantment with no abilities. The way continuous effects work, the God’s type-changing ability is applied before the effect that removes that ability is applied.

If another player gains control of Willbreaker, its control-change effect ends. Regaining control of Willbreaker won’t cause you to regain control of the creature.

(В следующий раз при уничтожении того существа в этом ходу оно не уничтожается. Вместо этого поверните его, снимите с него все повреждения и удалите его из боя.)

foreignNames.name: Consagrada por la sangre

cards.name: Consecrated by Blood
cards.originalText: Enchant creatureEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying and "Sacrifice two other creatures: Regenerate this creature." (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

rulings.text: If the regeneration ability is activated before combat damage is dealt, the two creatures you sacrifice won’t deal combat damage. However, you must regenerate a creature before it would be destroyed, so if you wait for combat damage to be dealt, the enchanted creature may be destroyed by that damage before it has the chance to regenerate.

cards.flavor: On Innistrad, Liliana embraced necromancy, honing her powers by practicing on scores of undead—and sometimes the living.

foreignNames.name: 残酷复生
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标非灵俑的生物。它不能重生。将至多一张目标灵俑牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 莉莲娜在依尼翠钻研死灵术，拿无数不死生物来磨练她的技艺，有时甚至用上活物。

foreignNames.name: 殘酷復生
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標非殭屍的生物。它不能重生。將至多一張目標殭屍牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 莉蓮娜在依尼翠鑽研死靈術，拿無數不死生物來磨練她的技藝，有時甚至用上活物。

foreignNames.name: Réanimation cruelle
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature non-Zombie ciblée. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée. Renvoyez jusqu'à une carte de zombie ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: Sur Innistrad, Liliana s'était passionnée pour la nécromancie, perfectionnant ses pouvoirs sur des dizaines de morts-vivants... et parfois les vivants.

foreignNames.name: Grausame Wiederbelebung
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Nicht-Zombie-Kreatur deiner Wahl. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden. Bringe bis zu eine Zombie-Karte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Auf Innistrad verschrieb sich Liliana der Nekromagie und verfeinerte ihr Können, indem sie an unzähligen Untoten übte … und an einigen Lebenden.

foreignNames.name: Rinascita Crudele
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura non Zombie bersaglio. Non può essere rigenerata. Riprendi in mano fino a una carta Zombie bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: Su Innistrad, Liliana abbracciò l'arte della necromanzia, affinando i suoi poteri con esperimenti su un gran numero di non morti e talvolta sui vivi.

foreignNames.name: 残酷な蘇生
foreignNames.text: ゾンビでないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。それは再生できない。あなたの墓地にあるゾンビ・カードを最大１枚まで対象とし、それをあなたの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: イニストラードでリリアナは屍術を受け入れ、数多くの不死者たち、そして時には生ある者たちを実験台として、その実力を磨いてきた。

foreignNames.name: 가혹한 부활
foreignNames.text: 좀비가 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다. 그 생물은 재생될 수 없다. 당신의 무덤에 있는 좀비 카드를 최대 한 장까지 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 무덤에서 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 릴리아나는 이니스트라드에서 사령술을 받아들였다. 그녀는 수많은 시체로 자신의 기술을 연마했고, 때로는 멀쩡한 사람을 상대로 연습했다.

foreignNames.name: Renascimento Cruel
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo que não seja Zumbi. Ela não pode ser regenerada. Devolva até um card alvo do tipo Zumbi de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: Em Innistrad, Liliana abraçou a necromancia, aprimorando seus poderes nas hordas de mortos-vivos e, às vezes, nos vivos também.

foreignNames.name: Жестокое Оживление
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо, не являющееся Зомби. Оно не может быть регенерировано. Верните не более одной целевой карты Зомби из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
foreignNames.flavor: В Иннистраде Лилиана изучала некромантию, оттачивая свое мастерство на многочисленной нежити... а иногда и на живых.

foreignNames.name: Resucitación cruel

foreignNames.flavor: En Innistrad, Liliana abrazó la nigromancia y perfeccionó sus poderes practicando con decenas de muertos vivientes... y a veces con los vivos.

cards.name: Cruel Revival
cards.originalText: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.text: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Return up to one target Zombie card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Dark Dabbling
cards.originalText: Regenerate target creature. Draw a card. (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, also regenerate each other creature you control.

rulings.text: You draw a card as Dark Dabbling resolves, not as the creature actually regenerates.

Whether the spell mastery applies or not, Dark Dabbling targets only one creature. If that creature becomes an illegal target by the time Dark Dabbling tries to resolve, Dark Dabbling will be countered and none of its effects will happen. No creature will regenerate and you won’t draw a card.

Check to see if there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard as the spell resolves to determine whether the spell mastery ability applies. The spell itself won’t count because it’s still on the stack as you make this check.

foreignNames.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、以下からまだ選ばれていないもの１つを選ぶ。・クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。悪魔の契約はそれに４点のダメージを与え、あなたは４点のライフを得る。・対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚捨てる。・カードを２枚引く。・あなたはこのゲームに敗北する。

foreignNames.name: 악마와의 계약
foreignNames.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 아직 선택하지 않은 하나를 선택한다 —• 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 악마와의 계약은 그 목표에 피해 4점을 입히고 당신은 생명 4점을 얻는다.• 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 카드 두 장을 버린다.• 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.• 당신이 게임에서 패배한다.

foreignNames.name: Pacto Demoníaco
foreignNames.text: No início da sua manutenção, escolha um que não tenha sido escolhido —• Pacto Demoníaco causa 4 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo e você ganha 4 pontos de vida.• O oponente alvo descarta dois cards.• Compre dois cards.• Você perde o jogo.

foreignNames.name: Договор с Демонами
foreignNames.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки выберите одно то, что еще не было выбрано —• Договор с Демонами наносит 4 повреждения целевому существу или игроку, а вы получаете 4 жизни.• Целевой оппонент сбрасывает две карты.• Возьмите две карты.• Вы проигрываете партию.

foreignNames.name: Pacto demoníaco
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, elige uno que no haya sido elegido:• El Pacto demoníaco hace 4 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo y tú ganas 4 vidas.• El oponente objetivo descarta dos cartas.• Roba dos cartas.• Pierdes el juego.

cards.name: Demonic Pact
cards.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen —• Demonic Pact deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.• Target opponent discards two cards.• Draw two cards.• You lose the game.

rulings.text: You choose the mode as the triggered ability goes on the stack. You can choose a mode that requires targets only if there are legal targets available.
If the ability is countered (either for having its target become illegal or because a spell or ability counters it), the mode chosen for that instance of the ability still counts as being chosen.

The phrase “that hasn’t been chosen” refers only to that specific Demonic Pact. If you control one and cast another one, you can choose any mode for the second one the first time its ability triggers.

It doesn’t matter who has chosen any particular mode. For example, say you control Demonic Pact and have chosen the first two modes. If an opponent gains control of Demonic Pact, that player can choose only the third or fourth mode.

In some very unusual situations, you may not be able to choose a mode, either because all modes have previously been chosen or the only remaining modes require targets and there are no legal targets available. In this case, the ability is simply removed from the stack with no effect.
Yes, if the fourth mode is the only one remaining, you must choose it. You read the whole contract, right?

cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• Demonic Pact deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.
• Target opponent discards two cards.
• Draw two cards.
• You lose the game.

cards.flavor: Rats and vultures devour. It desecrates.

foreignNames.name: 掠灵怪
foreignNames.text: 掠灵怪不能进行阻挡。{B}{B}，从你坟墓场中放逐两张其他生物牌：将掠灵怪从你的坟墓场移回战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 老鼠与兀鹰不过吞食尸体。它亵渎亡灵。

foreignNames.name: 掠靈怪
foreignNames.text: 掠靈怪不能進行阻擋。{B}{B}，從你墳墓場中放逐兩張其他生物牌：將掠靈怪從你的墳墓場移回戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 老鼠與兀鷹不過吞食身體。它褻瀆亡靈。

foreignNames.name: Spoliateur des âmes
foreignNames.text: Le Spoliateur des âmes ne peut pas bloquer.{B}{B}, exilez deux autres cartes de créature depuis votre cimetière : Renvoyez le Spoliateur des âmes sur le champ de bataille depuis votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: Les rats et les vautours dévorent. Lui profane.

foreignNames.name: Seelenplünderer
foreignNames.text: Der Seelenplünderer kann nicht blocken.{B}{B}, schicke zwei andere Kreaturenkarten aus deinem Friedhof ins Exil: Bringe den Seelenplünderer aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Ratten und Geier vertilgen. Er entweiht.

foreignNames.name: Depredatore di Anime
foreignNames.text: Il Depredatore di Anime non può bloccare.{B}{B}, Esilia altre due carte creatura dal tuo cimitero: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia il Depredatore di Anime dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: Profana ciò che ratti e avvoltoi si limitano a divorare.

foreignNames.name: 魂の略奪者
foreignNames.text: 魂の略奪者ではブロックできない。{B}{B}, あなたの墓地にある他のクリーチャー・カードを２枚追放する：あなたの墓地から魂の略奪者を戦場に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 鼠と禿鷹は喰らうが、これは穢す。

foreignNames.name: 영혼의 약탈자
foreignNames.text: 영혼의 약탈자는 방어할 수 없다.{B}{B}, 당신의 무덤에서 다른 생물 카드 두 장을 추방한다: 영혼의 약탈자를 당신의 무덤에서 전장으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 쥐나 독수리는 먹어치운다. 그것은 모독한다.

foreignNames.name: Despojador de Almas
foreignNames.text: Despojador de Almas não pode bloquear.{B}{B}, Exile dois outros cards de criatura do seu cemitério: Devolva Despojador de Almas do seu cemitério para o campo de batalha.
foreignNames.flavor: Ratos e abutres devoram. Ele profana.

foreignNames.name: Похититель Душ
foreignNames.text: Похититель Душ не может блокировать.{B}{B}, изгоните две другие карты существ из вашего кладбища: верните Похитителя Душ из вашего кладбища на поле битвы.
foreignNames.flavor: Крысы и стервятники пожирают тела. Он оскверняет души.

foreignNames.name: Saqueador de almas
foreignNames.text: El Saqueador de almas no puede bloquear.{B}{B}, exiliar otras dos cartas de criatura de tu cementerio: Regresa el Saqueador de almas de tu cementerio al campo de batalla.
foreignNames.flavor: Las ratas y los buitres devoran. Él profana.

cards.name: Despoiler of Souls
cards.originalText: Despoiler of Souls can't block.{B}{B}, Exile two other creature cards from your graveyard: Return Despoiler of Souls from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.text:
Despoiler of Souls can't block.
{B}{B}, Exile two other creature cards from your graveyard: Return Despoiler of Souls from your graveyard to the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: 厄睿柏斯的泰坦
foreignNames.text: 只要所有对手均未操控任何生物，厄睿柏斯的泰坦便具有不灭异能。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将它消灭。）每当一张生物牌离开对手的坟墓场时，你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则将厄睿柏斯的泰坦从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: 厄睿柏斯的泰坦
foreignNames.text: 只要所有對手均未操控任何生物，厄睿柏斯的泰坦便具有不滅異能。（傷害與註明「消滅」的效應不會將它消滅。)每當一張生物牌離開對手的墳墓場時，你可以棄一張牌。若你如此作，則將厄睿柏斯的泰坦從你的墳墓場移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: Titan d'Érébos
foreignNames.text: Tant que vos adversaires ne contrôlent pas de créature, le Titan d'Érébos a l'indestructible. (Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne le détruisent pas.)À chaque fois qu'une carte de créature quitte le cimetière d'un adversaire, vous pouvez vous défausser d'une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, renvoyez le Titan d'Érébos depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignNames.name: Erebos' Titan
foreignNames.text: Solange deine Gegner keine Kreaturen kontrollieren, hat Erebos' Titan Unzerstörbarkeit. (Schaden und Effekte, die „zerstören", zerstören ihn nicht.)Immer wenn eine Kreaturenkarte den Friedhof eines Gegners verlässt, kannst du eine Karte abwerfen. Falls du dies tust, bringe Erebos' Titan aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignNames.name: Titano di Erebos
foreignNames.text: Fintanto che i tuoi avversari non controllano creature, il Titano di Erebos ha indistruttibile. (Il danno e gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non lo distruggono.)Ogniqualvolta una carta creatura lascia il cimitero di un avversario, puoi scartare una carta. Se lo fai, riprendi in mano il Titano di Erebos dal tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: エレボスのタイタン
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手がクリーチャーをコントロールしていない限り、エレボスのタイタンは破壊不能を持つ。（ダメージや「破壊する」と書かれた効果では、これは破壊されない。）対戦相手の墓地からクリーチャー・カードが１枚離れるたび、あなたはカードを１枚捨ててもよい。そうしたなら、あなたの墓地にあるエレボスのタイタンをあなたの手札に戻す。

foreignNames.name: 에레보스의 거신
foreignNames.text: 당신의 상대들이 생물을 조종하지 않는 한, 에레보스의 거신은 무적을 가진다. (피해 또는 "파괴"라고 써있는 효과에 의해 파괴당할 수 없다.)생물 카드가 상대의 무덤을 떠날 때마다, 당신은 카드 한 장을 버릴 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 에레보스의 거신을 당신의 무덤에서 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Titã de Érebo
foreignNames.text: Enquanto seus oponentes não controlarem criaturas, Titã de Érebo terá indestrutível. (O dano e os efeitos que dizem "destrua" não a destroem.)Toda vez que um card de criatura deixar o cemitério de um oponente, você poderá descartar um card. Se fizer isso, devolva Titã de Érebo de seu cemitério para sua mão.

foreignNames.name: Титан Эреба
foreignNames.text: Пока у ваших оппонентов под контролем нет существ, Титан Эреба имеет Неразрушимость. (Повреждения и эффекты с указанием «уничтожьте» не уничтожают его.)Каждый раз, когда карта существа покидает кладбище оппонента, вы можете сбросить карту. Если вы это делаете, верните Титана Эреба из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.

foreignNames.name: Titán de Erebos
foreignNames.text: Mientras tus oponentes no controlen ninguna criatura, el Titán de Erebos tiene la habilidad de indestructible. (El daño y los efectos que dicen "destruir" no lo destruyen.)Siempre que una carta de criatura deje el cementerio de un oponente, puedes descartar una carta. Si lo haces, regresa el Titán de Erebos de tu cementerio a tu mano.

cards.name: Erebos's Titan
cards.originalText: As long as your opponents control no creatures, Erebos's Titan has indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)Whenever a creature card leaves an opponent's graveyard, you may discard a card. If you do, return Erebos's Titan from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: Damage dealt to a creature with indestructible remains marked on that creature. If Erebos’s Titan has lethal damage marked on it and it loses indestructible (perhaps because your opponent controlled no creatures and then gained control of one), Erebos’s Titan will be destroyed.
The last ability triggers only if Erebos’s Titan is in your graveyard.
In a multiplayer game, the last ability won’t trigger when a player with a creature card in his or her graveyard leaves the game.

cards.text:
As long as your opponents control no creatures, Erebos's Titan has indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
Whenever a creature card leaves an opponent's graveyard, you may discard a card. If you do, return Erebos's Titan from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: "Boggart blood disgusts me almost as much as the foul creatures themselves."

foreignNames.name: 碍眼杀手
foreignNames.text: 当碍眼杀手进战场时，目标由对手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「波尬的鲜血就跟这些污秽生物本身一样令我厌恶。」

foreignNames.name: 礙眼殺手
foreignNames.text: 當礙眼殺手進戰場時，目標由對手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「波尬的鮮血就跟這些污穢生物本身一樣令我厭惡。」

foreignNames.name: Assassin du dysmèle
foreignNames.text: Quand l'Assassin du dysmèle arrive sur le champ de bataille, une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle gagne -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: « Le sang des boggarts me dégoûte presque autant que ces créatures fétides. »

foreignNames.name: Augenweh-Meuchlerin
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Augenweh-Meuchlerin ins Spiel kommt, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: „Boggart-Blut widert mich fast genauso an wie die stinkenden Kreaturen selbst."

foreignNames.name: Assassina di Mal'Occhi
foreignNames.text: Quando l'Assassina di Mal'Occhi entra nel campo di battaglia, una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario prende -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Il sangue dei boggart mi disgusta quasi quanto quelle ripugnanti creature."

foreignNames.name: 眼腐りの暗殺者
foreignNames.text: 眼腐りの暗殺者が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－１/－１の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: 「クリーチャーとしても十分汚らわしいけれど、ボガートの血はそれ以上に汚らわしいものね。」

foreignNames.name: 추물 암살자
foreignNames.text: 추물 암살자가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -1/-1을 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "역겨운 보가트는 피조차도 구역질나는군."

foreignNames.name: Assassino de Seca-olho
foreignNames.text: Quando Assassino de Seca-olho entra no campo de batalha, a criatura alvo que um oponente controla recebe -1/-1 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "O sangue de papão me enoja quase tanto quanto as próprias criaturas imundas."

foreignNames.name: Убийца Порчеглазов
foreignNames.text: Когда Убийца Порчеглазов выходит на поле битвы, целевое существо под контролем оппонента получает -1/-1 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: «Кровь боггартов вызывает у меня почти такое же отвращение, как сами эти омерзительные твари».

foreignNames.name: Asesina de desgracias visuales
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Asesina de desgracias visuales entre al campo de batalla, la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente obtiene -1/-1 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "La sangre de boggart me da casi tanto asco como esas mismas criaturas hediondas".

cards.name: Eyeblight Assassin
cards.originalText: When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.text: When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "I've already seen so much evil, so much darkness. Why do you insist on adding more?"—Nissa Revane, to Dwynen

foreignNames.name: 屠戮碍眼
foreignNames.text: 非妖精的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我看过太多邪恶与黑暗，你为什么还要添加一笔？」～妮莎瑞文怒斥德维恩

foreignNames.name: 屠戮礙眼
foreignNames.text: 非妖精的生物得-2/-2直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我看過太多邪惡與黑暗，妳為什麼還要添加一筆？」～妮莎瑞文怒斥德維恩

foreignNames.name: Massacre du dysmèle
foreignNames.text: Les créatures non-Elfe gagnent -2/-2 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: « Il y a déjà tant de mal, tant de ténèbres dans le monde. Pourquoi en rajouter ? »—Nissa Revane, à Dwynen

foreignNames.name: Augenweh-Massaker
foreignNames.text: Nicht-Elf-Kreaturen erhalten -2/-2 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich habe schon so viel Böses gesehen, so viel Dunkelheit. Warum beharrst du darauf, es zu mehren?"—Nissa Revane zu Dwynen

foreignNames.name: Massacro di Mal'Occhi
foreignNames.text: Le creature non Elfo prendono -2/-2 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ho visto così tanto male, così tanta oscurità. Perché vi ostinate a causarne ancora?"—Nissa Revane, a Dwynen

foreignNames.name: 眼腐りの虐殺
foreignNames.text: ターン終了時まで、エルフでないクリーチャーは－２/－２の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: 「私はこれまで、多くの邪悪と闇をこの目で見てきたわ。どうして、あんたはそれを増やすことに固執するのよ？」——ニッサ・レヴェインからドゥイネンへ

foreignNames.name: 추물 학살
foreignNames.text: 엘프가 아닌 생물들은 턴종료까지 -2/-2를 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "세상은 이미 악과 어둠으로 가득하다. 왜 굳이 악과 어둠을 더하려고 하지?"—니사 레베인이 드위넨에게

foreignNames.name: Massacre dos Seca-olho
foreignNames.text: As criaturas que não sejam do tipo Elfo recebem -2/-2 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu já vi tanto mal, tanta escuridão. Por que vocês insistem em adicionar mais?— Nissa Revane, para Dwynen

foreignNames.name: Истребление Порчеглазов
foreignNames.text: Не являющиеся Эльфами существа получают -2/-2 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: «Я уже видела так много тьмы, так много зла. Зачем ты его приумножаешь?» — Нисса Ревейн, обращаясь к Двайнен

foreignNames.name: Masacre de desgracias visuales
foreignNames.text: Las criaturas que no sean Elfo obtienen -2/-2 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ya he visto demasiada maldad, demasiada oscuridad. ¿Por qué insistes en añadir aún más?".—Nissa Revane, a Dwynen

cards.name: Eyeblight Massacre
cards.originalText: Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.text: Non-Elf creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: 腥臭小恶魔
foreignNames.text: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）{B}：腥臭小恶魔获得死触异能直到回合结束。（它对生物造成的任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。）

foreignNames.name: 腥臭小惡魔
foreignNames.text: 飛行（此生物只能被具飛行或延勢異能的生物阻擋。）{B}：腥臭小惡魔獲得死觸異能直到回合結束。（它對生物造成的任何數量傷害都足以消滅後者。）

foreignNames.name: Diablotin fétide
foreignNames.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.){B} : Le Diablotin fétide acquiert le contact mortel jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Le nombre de blessures qu'il inflige à une créature, quel qu'il soit, est suffisant pour la détruire.)

foreignNames.name: Stinkbold
foreignNames.text: Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.){B}: Der Stinkbold erhält Todesberührung bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Eine beliebige Menge Schadenspunkte, die er einer Kreatur zufügt, sind ausreichend, um diese zu zerstören.)

foreignNames.name: Demonietto Mefitico
foreignNames.text: Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.){B}: Il Demonietto Mefitico ha tocco letale fino alla fine del turno. (Qualsiasi danno che questa creatura infligge a una creatura è sufficiente a distruggerla.)

foreignNames.name: 異臭のインプ
foreignNames.text: 飛行（このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）{B}：ターン終了時まで、異臭のインプは接死を得る。（これが何らかのダメージをクリーチャーに与えたら、それだけで破壊する。）

foreignNames.name: 악취 임프
foreignNames.text: 비행 (이 생물은 비행이나 대공 능력을 가진 생물에만 방어될 수 있다.){B}: 악취 임프는 턴종료까지 치명타를 얻는다. (이 생물에 피해를 입은 생물은 입은 피해의 양에 상관없이 파괴된다.)

foreignNames.name: Diabrete Fedido
foreignNames.text: Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com voar ou alcance.){B}: Diabrete Fedido ganha toque mortífero até o final do turno. (Qualquer quantidade de dano que ela cause a uma criatura é suficiente para destruí-la.)

foreignNames.name: Смрадный Бес

cards.flavor: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

foreignNames.name: 肉囊劫掠者
foreignNames.text: 当肉囊劫掠者进战场时，每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 格利极这世界盛产的只有死亡与腐败。死灵术士与恶魔所使用的交易标准是死尸，不论完整或是片段。

foreignNames.name: 肉囊劫掠者
foreignNames.text: 當肉囊劫掠者進戰場時，每位玩家各犧牲一個生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 格利極世界盛產的只有死亡與腐敗。死靈術士與惡魔所使用的交易標準是死屍，不論完整或是片段。

foreignNames.name: Maraudeur sacpeau
foreignNames.text: Quand le Maraudeur sacpeau arrive sur le champ de bataille, chaque joueur sacrifie une créature.
foreignNames.flavor: Grixis est un monde où seules la mort et la décrépitude existent en abondance. Les cadavres, entiers ou en pièces, sont la monnaie d'échange des nécromanciens et des démons.

foreignNames.name: Marodierender Fleischsack
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Marodierende Fleischsack ins Spiel kommt, opfert jeder Spieler eine Kreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: Grixis ist eine Welt, auf der es nur Tod und Verfall im Überfluss gibt. Leichen, auch in Teilen, sind die Standardwährung bei Todesbeschwörern und Dämonen.

foreignNames.name: Predone Sacco di Carne
foreignNames.text: Quando il Predone Sacco di Carne entra nel campo di battaglia, ogni giocatore sacrifica una creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Grixis è un mondo in cui le sole cose che abbondano sono la morte e la putrefazione. I cadaveri, interi o in parti, sono la moneta corrente tra demoni e necromanti.

foreignNames.name: 肉袋の匪賊
foreignNames.text: 肉袋の匪賊が戦場に出たとき、各プレイヤーはそれぞれクリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.flavor: グリクシスは死と腐敗だけが潤沢に存在する世界。死体は全身であれ一部であれ、屍術師や悪魔達の間では一般的な通貨である。

foreignNames.name: 시체로 짜맞춘 약탈자
foreignNames.text: 시체로 짜맞춘 약탈자가 전장에 들어올 때, 각 플레이어는 생물 한 개를 희생한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그릭시스는 죽음과 부패만이 가득한 세계다. 사령술사와 악마들은 온전한 시체나 시체의 일부를 화폐로 사용한다.

foreignNames.name: Saqueador Saco-de-carne
foreignNames.text: Quando Saqueador Saco-de-carne entra no campo de batalha, cada jogador sacrifica uma criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Grixis é um mundo onde as únicas coisas que existem em abundância são a morte e a putrefação. Cadáveres, inteiros ou em pedaços, são a moeda padrão dos necromantes e demônios.

foreignNames.name: Трупный Куль-Мародер
foreignNames.text: Когда Трупный Куль-Мародер выходит на поле битвы, каждый игрок жертвует существо.
foreignNames.flavor: Гриксис — это мир, где в изобилии есть лишь смерть и тлен. Трупы, целиком или кусками, — обычное средство платежа среди некромантов и демонов.

foreignNames.name: Merodeador bolsa de carne
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Merodeador bolsa de carne entre al campo de batalla, cada jugador sacrifica una criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Grixis es un mundo donde lo único que hay en abundancia es muerte y podredumbre. Los cuerpos, enteros o en partes, son moneda de cambio entre nigromantes y demonios.

cards.name: Fleshbag Marauder
cards.originalText: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

rulings.text: When the ability resolves, you may sacrifice Fleshbag Marauder itself. If you control no other creatures, you'll have to sacrifice Fleshbag Marauder.

As Fleshbag Marauder’s ability resolves, first you choose a creature to sacrifice, then each other player in turn order chooses a creature to sacrifice, then all those creatures are sacrificed simultaneously.

foreignNames.text: 說出一張生物牌的名稱。從目標對手的墳墓場，手牌及牌庫中搜尋任意數量具該名稱的牌，並將它們放逐。然後該玩家將其牌庫洗牌。

foreignNames.name: Oblitération infinie
foreignNames.text: Nommez une carte de créature. Cherchez dans le cimetière, la main et la bibliothèque de l'adversaire ciblé n'importe quel nombre de cartes avec ce nom et exilez-les. Ce joueur mélange ensuite sa bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Endlose Auslöschung
foreignNames.text: Benenne eine Kreaturenkarte. Durchsuche den Friedhof, die Hand und die Bibliothek eines Gegners deiner Wahl nach einer beliebigen Anzahl an Karten mit diesem Namen und schicke sie ins Exil. Dieser Spieler mischt dann seine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Annientamento Infinito
foreignNames.text: Nomina una carta creatura. Passa in rassegna il cimitero, la mano e il grimorio di un avversario bersaglio per un qualsiasi numero di carte con quel nome ed esiliale. Poi quel giocatore rimescola il suo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 無限の抹消
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。クリーチャー・カード名を１つ指定する。そのプレイヤーの墓地と手札とライブラリーから、その名前を持つカードを望む枚数探し、それらを追放する。その後、そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: 무한한 소멸
foreignNames.text: 생물 카드 한 장을 호명한다. 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대의 무덤, 손, 서고에서 그 이름의 카드를 원하는 만큼 찾아서 추방한다. 그러고 나서 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Obliteração Infinita
foreignNames.text: Nomeie um card de criatura. Procure um número qualquer de cards com o mesmo nome daquele card no cemitério, na mão e no grimório do oponente alvo e exile-os. Depois, aquele jogador embaralha seu próprio grimório.

foreignNames.name: Бесконечное Изничтожение
foreignNames.text: Назовите карту существа. Найдите на кладбище, в руке и в библиотеке целевого оппонента любое количество карт с тем именем и изгоните их. Затем тот игрок тасует свою библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: Aniquilación infinita
foreignNames.text: Nombra una carta de criatura. Busca en el cementerio, mano y biblioteca del oponente objetivo cualquier cantidad de cartas con ese nombre y exílialas. Luego ese jugador baraja su biblioteca.

cards.name: Infinite Obliteration
cards.originalText: Name a creature card. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
cards.text: Name a creature card. Search target opponent's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.flavor: "I will be your most demanding master, Liliana. But I have great things in mind for you."

foreignNames.name: 贮魂恶魔柯索非
foreignNames.text: 飞行每当一个由其他牌手拥有的永久物从战场进入坟墓场时，你抓一张牌且你失去1点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我会是你最苛刻的主人，莉莲娜。但我对你有很高的期望。」

foreignNames.name: 儲魂惡魔柯索非
foreignNames.text: 飛行每當一個由其他玩家擁有的永久物從戰場進入墳墓場時，你抽一張牌且你失去1點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我會是你最苛刻的主人，莉蓮娜。但我對你有很高的期望。」

foreignNames.name: Kothophed, thésauriseur d'âmes
foreignNames.text: VolÀ chaque fois qu'un permanent appartenant à un autre joueur est mis dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, vous piochez une carte et vous perdez 1 point de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je serai un maître des plus exigeants, Liliana. Mais j'ai de grands projets pour toi. »

foreignNames.name: Kothophed der Seelensammler
foreignNames.text: FliegendImmer wenn eine bleibende Karte, die ein anderer Spieler besitzt, aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, ziehst du eine Karte und verlierst 1 Lebenspunkt.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich werde dein kritischster Lehrmeister sein, Liliana. Doch ich habe Großes mit dir vor."

foreignNames.name: Kothophed, Accaparratore di Anime
foreignNames.text: VolareOgniqualvolta un permanente posseduto da un altro giocatore viene messo in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia, pesca una carta e perdi 1 punto vita.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sarò il tuo maestro più esigente, Liliana, ma ho in mente grandi progetti per te."

foreignNames.name: 魂の貯蔵者、コソフェッド
foreignNames.text: 飛行他のプレイヤーがオーナーであるパーマネントが１つ戦場から墓地に置かれるたび、あなたはカードを１枚引き、１点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.flavor: 「リリアナよ、我はお前にとって厳しい主人となるであろう。だが、我が考えているお前の前途は非常に有望でもある。」

foreignNames.name: 탐욕스러운 영혼수집가 코소페드
foreignNames.text: 비행다른 플레이어가 소유한 지속물이 전장에서 무덤으로 갈 때마다, 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑고 생명 1점을 잃는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "난 조금 까다로운 주인이다, 릴리아나. 하지만 난 네게 어울리는 근사한 계획이 있어."

foreignNames.name: Kothophed, Acumulador de Almas
foreignNames.text: VoarToda vez que uma permanente que pertence a outro jogador é colocada no cemitério vinda do campo de batalha, você compra um card e perde 1 ponto de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu serei seu mestre mais exigente, Liliana. Mas tenho grandes coisas em mente para você."

foreignNames.name: Котофед, Стяжатель Душ
foreignNames.text: ПолетКаждый раз, когда перманент, владельцем которого является другой игрок, попадает с поля битвы на кладбище, вы берете карту и теряете 1 жизнь.
foreignNames.flavor: «Я буду самым требовательным из твоих хозяев, Лилиана. Но я задумал для тебя великие дела».

foreignNames.name: Kothophed, acaparador de almas
foreignNames.text: Vuela.Siempre que un permanente propiedad de otro jugador vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla, robas una carta y pierdes 1 vida.
foreignNames.flavor: "Seré el más exigente de tus maestros, Liliana, pero tengo grandes cosas en mente para ti".

cards.name: Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
cards.originalText: FlyingWhenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

rulings.text: It doesn’t matter who controlled the permanent when it was put into a graveyard.
The triggered ability is mandatory. You can’t decline to draw the card and lose life, even if you want to.

cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor: Life is such a fragile thing.

foreignNames.name: 衰萎
foreignNames.text: 所有生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 生命就是如此脆弱。

foreignNames.name: 衰萎
foreignNames.text: 所有生物得-4/-4直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 生命就是如此脆弱。

foreignNames.name: Croupissement
foreignNames.text: Toutes les créatures gagnent -4/-4 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: La vie est si fragile.

foreignNames.name: Siechen
foreignNames.text: Alle Kreaturen erhalten -4/-4 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Das Leben ist so vergänglich.

foreignNames.name: Languire
foreignNames.text: Tutte le creature prendono -4/-4 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: La vita è così labile...

foreignNames.name: 衰滅
foreignNames.text: ターン終了時まで、すべてのクリーチャーは－４/－４の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: 生命とはかように脆く、儚いもの。

foreignNames.name: 쇠퇴
foreignNames.text: 모든 생물은 턴종료까지 -4/-4를 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 생명은 꺼지기 쉬운 등불과 같다.

foreignNames.name: Debilitar
foreignNames.text: Todas as criaturas recebem -4/-4 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: A vida é tão frágil.

foreignNames.name: Угасание
foreignNames.text: Все существа получают -4/-4 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Жизнь — очень хрупкая штука.

foreignNames.name: Podredumbre
foreignNames.text: Todas las criaturas obtienen -4/-4 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Cuán frágil es la vida.

cards.name: Languish
cards.originalText: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.
cards.text: All creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: 异端治疗师莉莲娜
foreignNames.text: 系命每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，放逐异端治疗师莉莲娜，然后将她在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。若你如此作，则将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物放进战场。

foreignNames.name: 異端治療師莉蓮娜
foreignNames.text: 繫命每當另一個由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去時，放逐異端治療師莉蓮娜，然後將她在其擁有者的操控下移回戰場且已轉化。若你如此作，則將一個2/2黑色殭屍衍生生物放進戰場。

foreignNames.name: Liliana, guérisseuse hérétique
foreignNames.text: Lien de vieÀ chaque fois qu'une autre créature non-jeton que vous contrôlez meurt, exilez Liliana, guérisseuse hérétique, puis renvoyez-la sur le champ de bataille, transformée, sous le contrôle de son propriétaire. Si vous faites ainsi, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 2/2 noire Zombie.

foreignNames.name: Liliana, die ketzerische Heilerin
foreignNames.text: LebensverknüpfungImmer wenn eine andere Nichtspielsteinkreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, schicke Liliana, die ketzerische Heilerin, ins Exil und bringe sie dann transformiert unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück. Falls du dies tust, bringe einen 2/2 schwarzen Zombie-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.

foreignNames.name: Liliana, Guaritrice Eretica
foreignNames.text: Legame vitaleOgniqualvolta un'altra creatura non pedina che controlli muore, esilia Liliana, Guaritrice Eretica, poi rimettila sul campo di battaglia trasformata sotto il controllo del suo proprietario. Se lo fai, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Zombie 2/2 nera.

foreignNames.name: 異端の癒し手、リリアナ
foreignNames.text: 絆魂あなたがコントロールする他のトークンでないクリーチャーが１体死亡するたび、異端の癒し手、リリアナを追放し、その後、これを変身させた状態でオーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。そうしたなら、黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。

foreignNames.name: 이단적인 치유사 릴리아나
foreignNames.text: 생명연결당신이 조종하는 토큰이 아닌 다른 생물이 죽을 때마다, 이단적인 치유사 릴리아나를 추방한 다음 변신한 상태로 그 소유자의 조종하에 전장으로 되돌린다. 당신이 그렇게 한다면, 2/2 흑색 좀비 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Liliana, Curandeira Herege
foreignNames.text: Vínculo com a vidaToda vez que outra criatura que não seja ficha que você controle morrer, exile Liliana, Curandeira Herege, e devolva-a ao campo de batalha transformada sob o controle de seu dono. Se fizer isso, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Zumbi.

foreignNames.name: Лилиана, Целитель-Еретик
foreignNames.text: Цепь жизниКаждый раз, когда другое не являющееся фишкой существо под вашим контролем умирает, изгоните Лилиану, Целителя-Еретика, затем верните ее на поле битвы трансформированной под контролем ее владельца. Если вы это делаете, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 2/2 черный Зомби.

foreignNames.name: Liliana, sanadora herética
foreignNames.text: Vínculo vital.Siempre que otra criatura que no sea ficha que controlas muera, exilia a Liliana, sanadora herética y luego regrésala al campo de batalla transformada bajo el control de su propietario. Si lo haces, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Zombie negra 2/2.

cards.name: Liliana, Heretical Healer
cards.originalText: LifelinkWhenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: If multiple nontoken creatures you control die, then Liliana, Heretical Healer’s ability will trigger that many times. However, since Liliana can be exiled and returned to the battlefield only once, only the first ability to resolve will create a Zombie token. The other abilities will resolve but won’t do anything.

Each face of a double-faced card has its own set of characteristics: name, types, subtypes, power and toughness, loyalty, abilities, and so on. While a double-faced card is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that’s currently up. The other set of characteristics is ignored. While a double-faced card isn’t on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of its front face.
The converted mana cost of a double-faced card not on the battlefield is the converted mana cost of its front face.

The back face of a double-faced card doesn’t have a mana cost. A double-faced permanent with its back face up has a converted mana cost of 0. Each back face has a color indicator that defines its color.
The back face of a double-faced card (in the case of Magic Origins, the planeswalker face) can’t be cast.

Although the two rules are similar, the “legend rule” and the “planeswalker uniqueness rule” affect different kinds of permanents. You can control two of this permanent, one front face-up and the other back-face up at the same time. However, if the former is exiled and enters the battlefield transformed, you’ll then control two planeswalkers with the same subtype. You’ll choose one to remain on the battlefield, and the other will be put into its owner’s graveyard.

A double-faced card enters the battlefield with its front face up by default, unless a spell or ability instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed, in which case it enters with its back face up.
A Magic Origins planeswalker that enters the battlefield because of the ability of its front face will enter with loyalty counters as normal.

In some rare cases, a spell or ability may cause one of these five cards to transform while it’s a creature (front face up) on the battlefield. If this happens, the resulting planeswalker won’t have any loyalty counters on it and will subsequently be put into its owner’s graveyard.

You can activate one of the planeswalker’s loyalty abilities the turn it enters the battlefield. However, you may do so only during one of your main phases when the stack is empty. For example, if the planeswalker enters the battlefield during combat, there will be an opportunity for your opponent to remove it before you can activate one of its abilities.

If a double-faced card is manifested, it will be put onto the battlefield face down (this is also true if it’s put onto the battlefield face down some other way). Note that “face down” is not synonymous with “with its back face up.” A manifested double-faced card is a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. While face down, it can’t transform. If the front face of a manifested double-faced card is a creature card, you can turn it face up by paying its mana cost. If you do, its front face will be up. A double-faced card on the battlefield can’t be turned face down.

cards.text:
Lifelink
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

Если вы это делаете, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 2/2 черный Зомби.

cards.name: Liliana, Defiant Necromancer
cards.originalText: +2: Each player discards a card.−X: Return target nonlegendary creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield.−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."

rulings.text: When Liliana, Defiant Necromancer’s first ability resolves, first you choose a card to discard, then each other player in turn order chooses a card to discard, then all those cards are discarded simultaneously. No one sees what the other players are discarding before deciding which card to discard.

cards.text:
+2: Each player discards a card.
−X: Return target nonlegendary creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."

cards.flavor: "All dead move to the hollow rhythm of necromancy."—Savra

foreignNames.name: 亡者华尔滋
foreignNames.text: 将至多两张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，然后弃一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「所有亡者都随死灵术的空荡旋律起舞。」～撒芙儿

foreignNames.name: 亡者華爾滋
foreignNames.text: 將至多兩張目標生物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上，然後棄一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「所有亡者都隨死靈術的空蕩旋律起舞。」～撒芙兒

foreignNames.name: Valse macabre
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez jusqu'à deux cartes de créature ciblées depuis votre cimetière dans votre main, et défaussez-vous ensuite d'une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Tous les morts se déplacent au rythme creux de la nécromancie. »—Savra

foreignNames.name: Makabrer Walzer
foreignNames.text: Bringe bis zu zwei Kreaturenkarten deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück und wirf dann eine Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: „Alles, was nicht mehr lebt, bewegt sich im schleppenden Rhythmus der Totenbeschwörung."—Savra

foreignNames.name: Valzer Macabro
foreignNames.text: Riprendi in mano fino a due carte creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero, poi scarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Tutti i morti si muovono al ritmo sacrilego della necromanzia."—Savra

foreignNames.name: 死の円舞曲
foreignNames.text: あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カードを最大２枚まで対象とし、それらをあなたの手札に戻し、その後カードを１枚捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「すべての死者は屍術のうつろなリズムに合わせて動くんだよ。」——サヴラ

foreignNames.name: 죽음의 왈츠

foreignNames.text: 飞行（只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡它。）当狂疾吸血怪进战场时，每位牌手各失去2点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 她展翅盘旋在街道之上，呼吸透着腐臭，双眼满是鲜血。

foreignNames.name: 狂疾吸血怪
foreignNames.text: 飛行（只有具飛行或延勢異能的生物才能阻擋它。）當狂疾吸血怪進戰場時，每位玩家各失去2點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 她展翅盤旋在街道之上，呼吸透著腐臭，雙眼滿是鮮血。

foreignNames.name: Suceuse de sang enragée
foreignNames.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)Quand la Suceuse de sang enragée arrive sur le champ de bataille, chaque joueur perd 2 points de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Elle hante les rues, ailes déployées, une puanteur de charogne pour haleine et du sang dans le regard.

foreignNames.name: Zügellose Blutsaugerin
foreignNames.text: Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)Wenn die Zügellose Blutsaugerin ins Spiel kommt, verliert jeder Spieler 2 Lebenspunkte.
foreignNames.flavor: Sie sucht die Straßen heim, mit gespreizten Schwingen, fauligem Atem und blutunterlaufenen Augen.

foreignNames.name: Succhiasangue Rabbiosa
foreignNames.text: Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)Quando la Succhiasangue Rabbiosa entra nel campo di battaglia, ogni giocatore perde 2 punti vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Vaga per le strade, ad ali spiegate, il fiato putrido e gli occhi intrisi di sangue.

foreignNames.name: 狂暴な吸血者
foreignNames.text: 飛行（このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってブロックされない。）狂暴な吸血者が戦場に出たとき、各プレイヤーはそれぞれ２点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.flavor: 彼女は翼を広く伸ばしながら道に出没する。その息は死肉臭を漂わせ、その目は赤く血走っている。

foreignNames.name: 미친 흡혈귀
foreignNames.text: 비행 (이 생물은 비행이나 대공을 가진 생물에만 방어될 수 있다.)미친 흡혈귀가 전장에 들어올 때, 각 플레이어는 생명 2점을 잃는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그녀는 날개를 펼치고 거리를 돌아다니는데, 입에서는 구더기가 나오고 눈에서는 피가 흐른다.

foreignNames.name: Sugador de Sangue Raivoso
foreignNames.text: Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com voar ou alcance.)Quando Sugador de Sangue Raivoso entra no campo de batalha, cada jogador perde 2 pontos de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Ela assombra as ruas de asas abertas, com hálito de carniça e sangue nos olhos.

foreignNames.name: Бешеный Кровосос
foreignNames.text: Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существами с Полетом или Захватом.)Когда Бешеный Кровосос выходит на поле битвы, каждый игрок теряет 2 жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: Широко раскинув крылья, она кружит над улицами. Ее дыхание наполнено зловонием трупов, а глаза налиты кровью.

foreignNames.name: Chupasangre rabiosa
foreignNames.text: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)Cuando la Chupasangre rabiosa entre al campo de batalla, cada jugador pierde 2 vidas.
foreignNames.flavor: Ronda las calles con las alas desplegadas, con carroña en el aliento y sangre en los ojos.

cards.name: Rabid Bloodsucker
cards.originalText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)When Rabid Bloodsucker enters the battlefield, each player loses 2 life.
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Rabid Bloodsucker enters the battlefield, each player loses 2 life.

cards.flavor: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

foreignNames.name: 解读骨卦
foreignNames.text: 占卜2，然后抓两张牌。你失去2点生命。（占卜2的流程是检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）
foreignNames.flavor: 逝者晓得生者尚未领悟的教训。

foreignNames.name: 解讀骨卦
foreignNames.text: 占卜2，然後抽兩張牌。你失去2點生命。（占卜2的流程是檢視你牌庫頂的兩張牌，然後將其中任意數量的牌以任意順序置於你牌庫底，其餘則以任意順序置於你牌庫頂。）
foreignNames.flavor: 逝者曉得生者尚未領悟的教訓。

foreignNames.name: Lire dans les os
foreignNames.text: Regard 2, puis piochez deux cartes. Vous perdez 2 points de vie. (Pour appliquer regard 2, regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste au-dessus, dans n'importe quel ordre.)
foreignNames.flavor: Les morts connaissent les leçons que les vivants n'ont jamais apprises.

foreignNames.name: Aus den Knochen lesen
foreignNames.text: Hellsicht 2, ziehe dann zwei Karten. Du verlierst 2 Lebenspunkte. (Betrachte für Hellsicht 2 die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek und lege dann eine beliebige Anzahl davon unter deine Bibliothek und den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge oben darauf.)
foreignNames.flavor: Der Tod kennt ein paar Tricks, die die Lebenden noch nicht gelernt haben.

foreignNames.name: Leggere le Ossa
foreignNames.text: Profetizza 2, poi pesca due carte. Perdi 2 punti vita. (Per profetizzare 2, guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio, poi mettine un qualsiasi numero in fondo al tuo grimorio e le altre in cima in qualsiasi ordine.)
foreignNames.flavor: I morti conoscono lezioni che i vivi non hanno ancora imparato.

foreignNames.name: 骨読み
foreignNames.text: 占術２を行い、その後カードを２枚引く。あなたは２点のライフを失う。（占術２を行うには、あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見て、そのうちの望む枚数のカードを望む順番であなたのライブラリーの一番下に置き、残りを望む順番で一番上に置く。）
foreignNames.flavor: 死んだことでしか学べないこともある。

foreignNames.name: 뼈로 친 점
foreignNames.text: 점술 2를 하고 카드 두 장을 뽑는다. 당신은 생명 2점을 잃는다. (점술 2를 하려면 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드들 중 원하는 만큼을 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓고 나머지를 당신의 서고 맨 위에 원하는 순서대로 놓을 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 죽은 자만 알 수 있는 지식도 있다.

foreignNames.name: Leia os Ossos
foreignNames.text: Use vidência 2 e depois compre dois cards. Você perde 2 pontos de vida. (Para usar vidência 2, olhe os dois cards do topo do seu grimório. Depois, coloque qualquer número deles no fundo do seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)
foreignNames.flavor: Os mortos conhecem lições que os vivos não aprenderam.

foreignNames.name: Гадание по Костям
foreignNames.text: Предскажите 2, затем возьмите две карты. Вы теряете 2 жизни. (Чтобы предсказать 2, посмотрите две верхние карты вашей библиотеки, затем положите любое количество из них в низ вашей библиотеки, а остальные на верх вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.)
foreignNames.flavor: Мертвые знают то, что неведомо живым.

foreignNames.name: Lectura de huesos
foreignNames.text: Adivina 2, luego roba dos cartas. Pierdes 2 vidas. (Para adivinar 2, mira las dos primeras cartas de tu biblioteca, luego pon cualquier cantidad de ellas en el fondo de tu biblioteca y el resto en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)
foreignNames.flavor: Los muertos saben lecciones que los vivos no han aprendido.

cards.name: Read the Bones
cards.originalText: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

rulings.text: The loss of life is part of the spell’s effect. It’s not an additional cost. If Read the Bones is countered, you won’t lose life.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it will be countered and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

cards.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor: "I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself."—Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: 裂魂术
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标力量等于或小于3的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「在我亲眼看到之前，我无法确信你是否有灵魂。」～莉莲娜维斯

foreignNames.name: 裂魂術
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標力量等於或小於3的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「在我親眼看到之前，我無法確信你是否有靈魂。」～莉蓮娜維斯

foreignNames.name: Pillage de l'âme
foreignNames.text: Détruisez une créature ciblée de force inférieure ou égale à 3.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je n'étais pas convaincue que tu avais une âme jusqu'à ce que je la voie de mes propres yeux. »—Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Seelenraub
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Stärke 3 oder weniger.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich war nicht überzeugt davon, dass du eine Seele hast, bis ich sie mit eigenen Augen sah."—Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Rubare l'Anima
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio con forza pari o inferiore a 3.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non ero convinta che avessi un'anima, finché non l'ho vista con i miei occhi."—Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: 魂裂き
foreignNames.text: パワーが３以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 「この目で実際に見るまでは、お前に魂があるなんて確信が持てなかったのよ。」——リリアナ・ヴェス

foreignNames.name: 영혼 찢기
foreignNames.text: 공격력이 3 이하인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "직접 보기 전까지는 네게도 영혼이 있다는 사실을 믿지 않았지."—릴리아나 베스

foreignNames.name: Despojar Alma
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo com poder igual ou inferior a 3.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu não tinha certeza de que você tinha alma até vê-la pessoalmente."— Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Похищение Души
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо с силой 3 или меньше.
foreignNames.flavor: «Я не была уверена, что у тебя есть душа, пока не увидела ее своими глазами».— Лилиана Весс

foreignNames.name: Desgarro espiritual
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo con fuerza de 3 o menos.
foreignNames.flavor: "No estaba segura de que tuvieras alma hasta que la vi con mis propios ojos".—Liliana Vess

cards.name: Reave Soul
cards.originalText: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
cards.text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

cards.flavor: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.

foreignNames.name: 转世半人马
foreignNames.text: 当转世半人马进战场时，目标牌手将其牌库顶的四张牌置入其坟墓场。
foreignNames.flavor: 被在世的亲属赶走后，他悲伤地在旷野间徘徊，寻找死城安福陵。

foreignNames.name: 轉世半人馬
foreignNames.text: 當轉世半人馬進戰場時，目標玩家將其牌庫頂的四張牌置入其墳墓場。
foreignNames.flavor: 被在世的親屬趕走後，他悲傷地在曠野間徘徊，尋找死城安福陵。

foreignNames.name: Centaure reparu
foreignNames.text: Quand le Centaure reparu arrive sur le champ de bataille, le joueur ciblé met les quatre cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: Chassé par ses semblables du monde des vivants, il parcourt désespérément les terres sauvages en quête de la cité des morts d'Asphodèle.

foreignNames.name: Wiedergekehrter Zentaur
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Wiedergekehrte Zentaur ins Spiel kommt, legt ein Spieler deiner Wahl die obersten vier Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: Vertrieben von seinen lebenden Artgenossen irrt er trauernd durch die Wildnis, immer auf der Suche nach Asphodel, der Polis der Toten.

foreignNames.name: Centauro Risvegliato
foreignNames.text: Quando il Centauro Risvegliato entra nel campo di battaglia, un giocatore bersaglio mette nel suo cimitero le prime quattro carte del suo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Scacciato dai suoi fratelli viventi, vaga gemendo per le terre selvagge, alla ricerca della città morta di Asfodelo.

foreignNames.name: 蘇りしケンタウルス
foreignNames.text: 蘇りしケンタウルスが戦場に出たとき、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上から４枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 生ある仲間たちから追われ、彼は悲しみの中、死者の街アスフォデルを求めて荒野をさまよっていた。

foreignNames.name: 되살아난 켄타우로스
foreignNames.text: 되살아난 켄타우로스가 전장에 들어올 때, 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 네 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 살아 있는 동료들에게 쫓겨난 켄타우로스는 망자들의 도시 아스포델을 찾아 황야를 배회한다.

foreignNames.name: Centauro Ressurgido
foreignNames.text: Quando Centauro Ressurgido entra no campo de batalha, o jogador alvo coloca os quatro cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: Rechaçado por seus parentes vivos, ele vaga em lamento pelas terras selvagens em busca da cidade dos mortos, Asfódelos.

foreignNames.name: Возвращенный Кентавр
foreignNames.text: Когда Возвращенный Кентавр выходит на поле битвы, целевой игрок кладет четыре верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: Изгнанный своими живыми собратьями, он печально скитается по диким землям в поисках мертвого города Асфодели.

foreignNames.name: Centauro resurgido
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Centauro resurgido entre al campo de batalla, el jugador objetivo pone las cuatro primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: Expulsado por sus hermanos vivos, vaga y se lamenta por los parajes en busca de la ciudad muerta de Asfodel.

cards.name: Returned Centaur
cards.originalText: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.text: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.flavor: Born from the slaughter of an entire army, it bears the wrath of a hundred souls.

foreignNames.name: 复仇者
foreignNames.text: 飞行复仇者的力量和防御力各等同于你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。
foreignNames.flavor: 整支军队惨遭屠戮后而生，承载上百灵魂忿恨。

foreignNames.name: 復仇者
foreignNames.text: 飛行復仇者的力量和防禦力各等同於你墳墓場中的生物牌數量。
foreignNames.flavor: 整支軍隊慘遭屠戮後而生，承載上百靈魂忿恨。

foreignNames.name: Revenant
foreignNames.text: VolLa force et l'endurance du Revenant sont chacune égales au nombre de cartes de créature dans votre cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor: Né du massacre de toute une armée, il porte en lui la rage de cent âmes.

foreignNames.name: Geist der Toten
foreignNames.text: FliegendStärke und Widerstandskraft des Geists der Toten sind gleich der Anzahl an Kreaturenkarten in deinem Friedhof.
foreignNames.flavor: Auferstanden aus dem Massaker an einer ganzen Armee, ist er erfüllt vom Zorn hunderter Seelen.

foreignNames.name: Redivivo
foreignNames.text: VolareLa forza e la costituzione del Redivivo sono pari al numero di carte creatura nel tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: Nato dal massacro di un intero esercito, porta con sé la collera di un centinaio di anime.

foreignNames.name: 黄泉からの帰還者
foreignNames.text: 飛行黄泉からの帰還者のパワーとタフネスは、それぞれあなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カードの枚数に等しい。
foreignNames.flavor: それは軍団全員の虐殺から生まれ、百の魂の怒りを秘める。

foreignNames.name: 망령
foreignNames.text: 비행망령의 공격력과 방어력은 각각 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드의 개수와 같다.
foreignNames.flavor: 군대가 몰살당한 곳에서 태어나는 망령은 수백 명 분의 분노를 토해낸다.

foreignNames.name: Ressurgido
foreignNames.text: Vpoder e a resistência de Ressurgido são ambos iguais ao número de cards de criatura no seu cemitério.
foreignNames.flavor: Nascido do massacre de um exército inteiro, ele carrega a fúria de centenas de almas.

foreignNames.name: Призрак Мертвеца
foreignNames.text: ПолетСила и выносливость Призрака Мертвеца равны количеству карт существ на вашем кладбище.
foreignNames.flavor: Он родился там, где была истреблена целая армия, и несет в себе гнев сотни душ.

foreignNames.name: Aparecido
foreignNames.text: Vuela.Tanto la fuerza como la resistencia del Aparecido son iguales a la cantidad de cartas de criatura que haya en tu cementerio.
foreignNames.flavor: Nacido de la masacre de todo un ejército, alberga la ira de cien almas.

cards.name: Revenant
cards.originalText: FlyingRevenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: The ability that defines Revenant’s power and toughness applies in all zones, not just the battlefield. If Revenant is in your graveyard, its ability will count itself.

cards.text:
Flying
Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

foreignNames.name: 往昔阴影
foreignNames.text: 每当一个生物死去时，占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）{4}{B}：每位对手各失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。只能于你的坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌时起动此异能。

foreignNames.name: 往昔陰影
foreignNames.text: 每當一個生物死去時，占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）{4}{B}：每位對手失去2點生命且你獲得2點生命。只能於你的墳墓場中有四張或更多生物牌時起動此異能。

foreignNames.name: Ombres du passé
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'une créature meurt, regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.){4}{B} : Chaque adversaire perd 2 points de vie et vous gagnez 2 points de vie. N'activez cette capacité que s'il y a au moins quatre cartes de créature dans votre cimetière.

foreignNames.name: Schatten der Vergangenheit
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn eine Kreatur stirbt, wende Hellsicht 1 an. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karte unter deine Bibliothek legen.){4}{B}: Jeder Gegner verliert 2 Lebenspunkte, und du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur, falls sich vier oder mehr Kreaturenkarten in deinem Friedhof befinden.

foreignNames.name: Ombre del Passato
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta una creatura muore, profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.){4}{B}: Ogni avversario perde 2 punti vita e tu guadagni 2 punti vita. Attiva questa abilità solo se ci sono quattro o più carte creatura nel tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: 過去の過ち
foreignNames.text: クリーチャーが１体死亡するたび、占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）{4}{B}：各対戦相手はそれぞれ２点のライフを失い、あなたは２点のライフを得る。この能力は、あなたの墓地にクリーチャー・カードが４枚以上あるときにのみ起動できる。

foreignNames.name: 과거의 그림자

cards.name: Tainted Remedy
cards.originalText: If an opponent would gain life, that player loses that much life instead.

rulings.text: If more than one replacement effect tries to apply to a life gain event, the player who would gain life chooses the order in which they apply. For example, if a player who controls Alhammarret’s Archive would gain 3 life while Tainted Remedy is on the battlefield, that player may choose to have the 3 life become doubled to 6 life and then lose 6 life. The player may also choose to apply Tainted Remedy first, turning “gain 3 life” into “lose 3 life.” Alhammarret’s Archive would then not apply.

Having more than one Tainted Remedy on the battlefield doesn’t have any noticeable effect on life gain. Once the effect of one Tainted Remedy applies, there is no life gain for the others to apply to.
