cards.name: Abbot of Keral Keep
cards.originalText: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)When Abbot of Keral Keep enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

rulings.text: The card exiled by Abbot of Keral Keep’s ability is exiled face up.
You may play that card that turn even if Abbot of Keral Keep is no longer on the battlefield or under your control.

Playing the card exiled with Abbot of Keral Keep’s ability follows the normal rules for playing that card. You must pay its costs, and you must follow all applicable timing rules. For example, if the card is a creature card, you can cast that card by paying its mana cost only during your main phase while the stack is empty.
Unless an effect allows you to play additional lands that turn, you can play a land card exiled with Abbot of Keral Keep’s ability only if you haven’t played a land yet that turn.
If you don’t play the card, it will remain exiled.

Any spell you cast that doesn’t have the type creature will cause prowess to trigger. If a spell has multiple types, and one of those types is creature (such as an artifact creature), casting it won’t cause prowess to trigger. Playing a land also won’t cause prowess to trigger.
Prowess goes on the stack on top of the spell that caused it to trigger. It will resolve before that spell.
Once it triggers, prowess isn’t connected to the spell that caused it to trigger. If that spell is countered, prowess will still resolve.

cards.text:

cards.name: Acolyte of the Inferno
cards.originalText: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)Whenever Acolyte of the Inferno becomes blocked by a creature, it deals 2 damage to that creature.

rulings.text: Acolyte of the Inferno’s last ability will trigger once for each creature that blocks it. Each of those creatures will be dealt 2 damage.

Acolyte of the Inferno’s last ability triggers and resolves before combat damage is dealt. If that causes each creature blocking Acolyte of the Inferno to be destroyed, Acolyte of the Inferno will remain blocked and neither deal nor be dealt combat damage.
Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.

cards.text:
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
Whenever Acolyte of the Inferno becomes blocked by a creature, it deals 2 damage to that creature.

foreignNames.flavor: An jenem Tag lernte sie eine schmerzhafte Lektion: Selbst die Reinsten lassen sich korrumpieren, wenn sie ein Zweifel im Herzen plagt.

foreignNames.name: Atto di Tradimento
foreignNames.text: Prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio fino alla fine del turno. STAPpa quella creatura. Ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno. (Può attaccare e {T} in questo turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Apprese una tragica lezione quel giorno: anche i più puri possono essere corrotti quando le emozioni del cuore vengono distorte.

foreignNames.name: 反逆の行動
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、ターン終了時までそれのコントロールを得る。そのクリーチャーをアンタップする。ターン終了時まで、それは速攻を得る。（このターン、それは攻撃したり{T}したりできる。）
foreignNames.flavor: その日、彼女は悲劇的な教訓を学ぶことになった。感情を歪ませることで、最も清純な者すらも堕落させ得るということを。

foreignNames.name: 반역 행위
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 턴종료까지 그 생물의 조종권을 얻는다. 그 생물은 언탭되며 턴종료까지 신속 능력을 얻는다. (이 턴에 이 생물은 공격하거나 {T}할 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 그날 그녀는 감정이 뒤틀리면 아무리 순수한 자라도 타락할 수 있다는 쓰디쓴 교훈을 얻었다.

foreignNames.name: Ato de Traição
foreignNames.text: Ganhe o controle da criatura alvo até o final do turno. Desvire aquela criatura. Ela ganha ímpeto até o final do turno. (Ela pode atacar e {T} neste turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Ela aprendeu uma lição trágica naquele dia: mesmo os mais puros podem ser corrompidos quando as emoções do coração são distorcidas.

foreignNames.name: Акт Измены
foreignNames.text: Получите контроль над целевым существом до конца хода. Разверните то существо. Оно получает Ускорение до конца хода. (Оно может атаковать и {T} в этом ходу.)
foreignNames.flavor: В этот день ей преподали жестокий урок: когда мысли и чувства спутаны, даже самых чистых можно сбить с пути.

foreignNames.name: Acto de traición
foreignNames.text: Gana el control de la criatura objetivo hasta el final del turno. Endereza esa criatura. Gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno. (Puede atacar y {T} este turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Aquel día aprendió una trágica lección: incluso los más puros pueden ser corrompidos cuando entran en juego las emociones del corazón.

cards.name: Act of Treason
cards.originalText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

rulings.text: Act of Treason can target any creature, even one that's untapped or one you already control.
Gaining control of a creature doesn't cause you to gain control of any Auras or Equipment attached to it.
If you control a legendary creature and gain control of another legendary creature with the same name, you’ll choose one to remain on the battlefield and put the other into its owner’s graveyard.

cards.name: Akroan Sergeant
cards.originalText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

rulings.text: Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.

cards.name: Call of the Full Moon
cards.originalText: Enchant creatureEnchanted creature gets +3/+2 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, sacrifice Call of the Full Moon.

rulings.text: Call of the Full Moon’s last ability will look at the entire previous turn, even if Call of the Moon wasn’t on the battlefield for some or all of that turn. For example, if you cast Call of the Full Moon and another spell on the same turn, you’ll have to sacrifice Call of the Full Moon at the beginning of the upkeep of the following turn.

A single player must have cast two or more spells during the previous turn for Call of the Full Moon’s last ability to trigger. If multiple players each cast just one spell during that turn, the ability won’t trigger.

foreignNames.text: 每当你施放红色咒语时，重置卡拉德许之火茜卓。{T}：卡拉德许之火茜卓对目标牌手造成1点伤害。如果茜卓本回合已造成3点或更多伤害，则放逐她，然后将她在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。

foreignNames.name: 卡拉德許之火茜卓
foreignNames.text: 每當你施放紅色咒語時，重置卡拉德許之火茜卓。{T}：卡拉德許之火茜卓對目標玩家造成1點傷害。如果茜卓本回合已造成3點或更多傷害，則放逐她，然後將她在其擁有者的操控下移回戰場且已轉化。

foreignNames.name: Chandra, feu de Kaladesh
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort rouge, dégagez Chandra, feu de Kaladesh.{T} : Chandra, feu de Kaladesh inflige 1 blessure au joueur ciblé. Si Chandra a infligé au moins 3 blessures ce tour-ci, exilez-la, puis renvoyez-la sur le champ de bataille, transformée, sous le contrôle de son propriétaire.

foreignNames.name: Chandra, Feuer von Kaladesh
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn du einen roten Zauberspruch wirkst, enttappe Chandra, Feuer von Kaladesh.{T}: Chandra, Feuer von Kaladesh, fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu. Falls Chandra in diesem Zug 3 oder mehr Schadenspunkte zugefügt hat, schicke sie ins Exil und bringe sie dann transformiert unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.

foreignNames.name: Chandra, Fuoco di Kaladesh
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia rossa, STAPpa Chandra, Fuoco di Kaladesh.{T}: Chandra, Fuoco di Kaladesh infligge 1 danno a un giocatore bersaglio. Se Chandra ha inflitto 3 o più danni in questo turno, esiliala, poi rimettila sul campo di battaglia trasformata sotto il controllo del suo proprietario.

foreignNames.name: カラデシュの火、チャンドラ
foreignNames.text: あなたが赤の呪文を１つ唱えるたび、カラデシュの火、チャンドラをアンタップする。{T}：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。カラデシュの火、チャンドラはそのプレイヤーに１点のダメージを与える。このターンにカラデシュの火、チャンドラが３点以上のダメージを与えたなら、カラデシュの火、チャンドラを追放し、その後、これを変身させた状態でオーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。

foreignNames.name: 칼라데시의 불 찬드라
foreignNames.text: 당신이 적색 주문을 발동할 때마다, 칼라데시의 불 찬드라를 언탭한다.{T}: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 칼라데시의 불 찬드라는 그 플레이어에게 피해 1점을 입힌다. 이 턴에 찬드라가 피해 3점 이상을 입혔다면, 찬드라를 추방한 다음 변신한 채로 그 소유자의 조종하에 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Chandra, Fogo de Kaladesh
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica vermelha, desvire Chandra, Fogo de Kaladesh.{T}: Chandra, Fogo de Kaladesh, causa 1 ponto de dano ao jogador alvo. Se Chandra tiver causado 3 ou mais pontos de dano neste turno, exile-a e devolva-a ao campo de batalha transformada sob o controle de seu dono.

foreignNames.name: Чандра, Огонь Каладеша
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете красное заклинание, разверните Чандру, Огонь Каладеша.{T}: Чандра, Огонь Каладеша наносит 1 повреждение целевому игроку. Если Чандра нанесла не менее 3 повреждений в этом ходу, изгоните ее, затем верните ее на поле битвы трансформированной под контролем ее владельца.

foreignNames.name: Chandra, el fuego de Kaladesh
foreignNames.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo rojo, endereza a Chandra, el fuego de Kaladesh.{T}: Chandra, el fuego de Kaladesh hace 1 punto de daño al jugador objetivo. Si Chandra ha hecho 3 o más puntos de daño este turno, exíliala, luego regrésala al campo de batalla transformada bajo el control de su propietario.

cards.name: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh
cards.originalText: Whenever you cast a red spell, untap Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh.{T}: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh deals 1 damage to target player. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

rulings.text: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh’s activated ability will count any damage Chandra has dealt during the turn to any permanent or player, including combat damage.

The last sentence of Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh’s activated ability isn’t a separate ability. The check happens only as that activated ability resolves. You must activate the ability in order to exile Chandra and return her to the battlefield transformed, even if Chandra has already dealt 3 or more damage during the turn.

Each face of a double-faced card has its own set of characteristics: name, types, subtypes, power and toughness, loyalty, abilities, and so on. While a double-faced card is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that’s currently up. The other set of characteristics is ignored. While a double-faced card isn’t on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of its front face.
The converted mana cost of a double-faced card not on the battlefield is the converted mana cost of its front face.

The back face of a double-faced card doesn’t have a mana cost. A double-faced permanent with its back face up has a converted mana cost of 0. Each back face has a color indicator that defines its color.
The back face of a double-faced card (in the case of Magic Origins, the planeswalker face) can’t be cast.

Although the two rules are similar, the “legend rule” and the “planeswalker uniqueness rule” affect different kinds of permanents. You can control two of this permanent, one front face-up and the other back-face up at the same time. However, if the former is exiled and enters the battlefield transformed, you’ll then control two planeswalkers with the same subtype. You’ll choose one to remain on the battlefield, and the other will be put into its owner’s graveyard.

A double-faced card enters the battlefield with its front face up by default, unless a spell or ability instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed, in which case it enters with its back face up.
A Magic Origins planeswalker that enters the battlefield because of the ability of its front face will enter with loyalty counters as normal.

In some rare cases, a spell or ability may cause one of these five cards to transform while it’s a creature (front face up) on the battlefield. If this happens, the resulting planeswalker won’t have any loyalty counters on it and will subsequently be put into its owner’s graveyard.

You can activate one of the planeswalker’s loyalty abilities the turn it enters the battlefield. However, you may do so only during one of your main phases when the stack is empty. For example, if the planeswalker enters the battlefield during combat, there will be an opportunity for your opponent to remove it before you can activate one of its abilities.

If a double-faced card is manifested, it will be put onto the battlefield face down (this is also true if it’s put onto the battlefield face down some other way). Note that “face down” is not synonymous with “with its back face up.” A manifested double-faced card is a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. While face down, it can’t transform. If the front face of a manifested double-faced card is a creature card, you can turn it face up by paying its mana cost. If you do, its front face will be up. A double-faced card on the battlefield can’t be turned face down.

{T}: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh deals 1 damage to target player. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia rossa, STAPpa Chandra, Fuoco di Kaladesh.{T}: Chandra, Fuoco di Kaladesh infligge 1 danno a un giocatore bersaglio. Se Chandra ha inflitto 3 o più danni in questo turno, esiliala, poi rimettila sul campo di battaglia trasformata sotto il controllo del suo proprietario.

foreignNames.text: あなたが赤の呪文を１つ唱えるたび、カラデシュの火、チャンドラをアンタップする。{T}：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。カラデシュの火、チャンドラはそのプレイヤーに１点のダメージを与える。このターンにカラデシュの火、チャンドラが３点以上のダメージを与えたなら、カラデシュの火、チャンドラを追放し、その後、これを変身させた状態でオーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。

foreignNames.text: 당신이 적색 주문을 발동할 때마다, 칼라데시의 불 찬드라를 언탭한다.{T}: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 칼라데시의 불 찬드라는 그 플레이어에게 피해 1점을 입힌다. 이 턴에 찬드라가 피해 3점 이상을 입혔다면, 찬드라를 추방한 다음 변신한 채로 그 소유자의 조종하에 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Chandra, Chama Furiosa
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica vermelha, desvire Chandra, Fogo de Kaladesh.{T}: Chandra, Fogo de Kaladesh, causa 1 ponto de dano ao jogador alvo. Se Chandra tiver causado 3 ou mais pontos de dano neste turno, exile-a e devolva-a ao campo de batalha transformada sob o controle de seu dono.

foreignNames.name: Чандра, Ревущее Пламя
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете красное заклинание, разверните Чандру, Огонь Каладеша.{T}: Чандра, Огонь Каладеша наносит 1 повреждение целевому игроку. Если Чандра нанесла не менее 3 повреждений в этом ходу, изгоните ее, затем верните ее на поле битвы трансформированной под контролем ее владельца.

foreignNames.name: Chandra, llamarada rugiente
foreignNames.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo rojo, endereza a Chandra, el fuego de Kaladesh.{T}: Chandra, el fuego de Kaladesh hace 1 punto de daño al jugador objetivo. Si Chandra ha hecho 3 o más puntos de daño este turno, exíliala, luego regrésala al campo de batalla transformada bajo el control de su propietario.

cards.name: Chandra, Roaring Flame
cards.originalText: +1: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target player.−2: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target creature.−7: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."

rulings.text: The emblem created by Chandra, Roaring Flame is colorless. The damage it deals is from a colorless source.

Only players actually dealt damage by the third ability of Chandra, Roaring Flame will get an emblem. If all of that damage to a player is prevented, that player won’t get an emblem. If any of that damage is redirected to Chandra’s controller, that player will get an emblem.
Each player who gets Chandra’s emblem is the owner of that emblem. In multiplayer games, that emblem will remain in the game as long as its owner does, even if Chandra’s owner leaves the game.

cards.text:
+1: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target player.
−2: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target creature.
−7: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."

cards.flavor: "They started it."

foreignNames.name: 茜卓的怒火
foreignNames.text: 茜卓的怒火对目标牌手造成4点伤害，且对每个由该牌手操控的生物各造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「他们先惹我的。」

foreignNames.name: 茜卓的怒火
foreignNames.text: 茜卓的怒火對目標玩家造成4點傷害，且對每個由該玩家操控的生物各造成1點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「他們先惹我的。」

foreignNames.name: Furie de Chandra
foreignNames.text: La Furie de Chandra inflige 4 blessures au joueur ciblé et 1 blessure à chaque créature que ce joueur contrôle.
foreignNames.flavor: « C'est eux qui ont commencé. »

foreignNames.name: Chandras Wut
foreignNames.text: Chandras Wut fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte und allen Kreaturen, die dieser Spieler kontrolliert, 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Sie haben angefangen."

foreignNames.name: Furia di Chandra
foreignNames.text: La Furia di Chandra infligge 4 danni a un giocatore bersaglio e 1 danno a ogni creatura controllata da quel giocatore.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sono stati loro a iniziare."

foreignNames.name: チャンドラの憤怒
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。チャンドラの憤怒はそのプレイヤーに４点、そのプレイヤーがコントロールする各クリーチャーにそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 「先に手を出したのはあいつらだからね。」

foreignNames.name: 찬드라의 분노
foreignNames.text: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 찬드라의 분노는 그 플레이어에게 피해 4점을 입히고 그 플레이어가 조종하는 각 생물에 피해 1점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: "놈들이 먼저 시작했어."

foreignNames.name: Fúria de Chandra
foreignNames.text: Fúria de Chandra causa 4 pontos de dano ao jogador alvo e 1 ponto de dano a cada criatura que aquele jogador controla.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eles começaram."

foreignNames.name: Ярость Чандры
foreignNames.text: Ярость Чандры наносит 4 повреждения целевому игроку и 1 повреждение каждому существу под контролем того игрока.
foreignNames.flavor: «Они первые начали».

foreignNames.name: Furia de Chandra
foreignNames.text: La Furia de Chandra hace 4 puntos de daño al jugador objetivo y 1 punto de daño a cada criatura que controla ese jugador.
foreignNames.flavor: "Empezaron ellos".

cards.name: Chandra's Fury
cards.originalText: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

rulings.text: Chandra's Fury targets only the player, not any creature. Chandra's Fury will deal 1 damage to a creature with hexproof, for example.

cards.text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

cards.flavor: In the moment before her execution, she realized what it meant to be a pyromancer, to be alive, to be Chandra.

foreignNames.name: 茜卓扬焰
foreignNames.text: 目标由你操控的生物向每个其他生物和每位对手各造成伤害，其数量等同于该生物的力量。
foreignNames.flavor: 在她将被处决的那一刻，她才明白身为烈焰术士的意义，活着的意义，以及身为茜卓的意义。

foreignNames.name: 茜卓揚焰
foreignNames.text: 目標由你操控的生物向每個其他生物和每位對手各造成傷害，其數量等同於該生物的力量。
foreignNames.flavor: 在她將被處決的那一刻，她才明白身為烈焰術士的意義，活著的意義，以及身為茜卓的意義。

foreignNames.name: Embrasement de Chandra
foreignNames.text: Une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez inflige un nombre de blessures égal à sa force à chaque autre créature et à chaque adversaire.
foreignNames.flavor: À l'instant de son exécution, elle comprit ce que signifiait être une pyromancienne, être vivante et être Chandra.

foreignNames.name: Chandras Entflammen
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, fügt jeder anderen Kreatur und jedem Gegner Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.
foreignNames.flavor: In dem Moment vor ihrer Hinrichtung verstand sie, was es heißt, eine Pyromagierin zu sein, am Leben zu sein, Chandra zu sein.

foreignNames.name: Scintilla di Chandra
foreignNames.text: Una creatura bersaglio che controlli infligge danno pari alla sua forza a ogni altra creatura e a ogni avversario.
foreignNames.flavor: Nell'istante prima della sua esecuzione, capì cosa significava essere una piromante, essere viva, essere... Chandra.

foreignNames.name: チャンドラの灯の目覚め
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それは他の各クリーチャーと各対戦相手に、自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージをそれぞれ与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 処刑される直前の瞬間、彼女は紅蓮術師であること、生きること、チャンドラであることの意味を悟った。

foreignNames.name: 찬드라의 점화
foreignNames.text: 당신이 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 다른 각 생물과 상대에게 자신의 공격력만큼의 피해를 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 찬드라는 처형당하기 직전에 불꽃술사가 뭔지, 살아 있다는 것이 뭔지, 자기 자신이 뭘 원하는지 깨달았다.

foreignNames.name: Combustão de Chandra
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo que você controla causa dano igual ao seu poder a cada outra criatura e cada oponente.
foreignNames.flavor: No momento antes de sua execução, ela se deu conta do significado de ser uma piromante, de estar viva e de ser Chandra.

foreignNames.name: Воспламенение Чандры
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо под вашим контролем наносит повреждения, равные своей силе, каждому другому существу и каждому оппоненту.
foreignNames.flavor: За секунду до казни она поняла, что значит быть пиромантом, быть живой, быть Чандрой.

foreignNames.name: Ignición de Chandra
foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo que controlas hace una cantidad de daño igual a su fuerza a cada otra criatura y cada oponente.
foreignNames.flavor: En el momento previo a su ejecución, se dio cuenta de lo que significaba ser una piromante, estar viva, ser Chandra.

cards.name: Chandra's Ignition
cards.originalText: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.

rulings.text: The creature is the source of the damage, not Chandra’s Ignition. For example, Chandra’s Ignition can have a white creature deal damage to a creature with protection from red.
Use the power of the target creature as Chandra’s Ignition resolves to determine how much damage it deals to each other creature and each opponent.

If the creature becomes an illegal target by the time Chandra’s Ignition tries to resolve (perhaps because another player controls it or it’s left the battlefield), Chandra’s Ignition will be countered and none of its effects will happen. No damage will be dealt.

cards.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature and each opponent.

cards.flavor: Ravnica's most ancient streets take on a life of their own. A few have decided to move to nicer neighborhoods.

foreignNames.name: 鹅卵石蛮汉
foreignNames.flavor: 拉尼卡最古老的街道开始有了自己的生命。其中一些决定搬到比较好的街坊。

foreignNames.name: 鵝卵石蠻漢
foreignNames.flavor: 拉尼卡最古老的街道開始有了自己的生命。其中一些決定搬到比較好的街坊。

foreignNames.name: Brute de pavés
foreignNames.flavor: Les rues les plus anciennes de Ravnica ont une vie qui leur est propre. Quelques-unes ont décidé de déménager dans des quartiers plus cossus.

foreignNames.name: Trotzpflaster
foreignNames.flavor: Ravnicas älteste Straßen entwickeln ein Eigenleben. Ein paar haben beschlossen, in schönere Gegenden umzuziehen.

foreignNames.name: Bruto di Ciottoli
foreignNames.flavor: Le strade più antiche di Ravnica hanno una vita propria. Molti hanno deciso di trasferirsi in quartieri più tranquilli.

foreignNames.name: 暴れ玉石
foreignNames.flavor: ラヴニカの最古の街路は、それ自体が生命を持つようになる。よりよい場所へと引っ越そうと決めた者もいた。

foreignNames.name: 조약돌 괴수
foreignNames.flavor: 라브니카의 아주 오래된 거리에서는 나름 대로의 생존 법칙이 있다. 그러나 더 좋은 동네로 이사가는 이는 거의 없다.

foreignNames.name: Brutamontes Pedregoso
foreignNames.flavor: As ruas mais antigas de Ravnica têm vida própria. Algumas resolveram se mudar para vizinhanças melhores.

foreignNames.name: Булыжный Зверюга
foreignNames.flavor: Самые старые улицы Равники уже давно живут своей жизнью. Некоторые из них решили перебраться в более приятные места.

foreignNames.name: Bruto adoquinado
foreignNames.flavor: Las calles más antiguas de Rávnica adquieren vida propia. Algunas han decidido trasladarse a barrios más agradables.

cards.name: Cobblebrute

cards.flavor: Nothing of nature nor of mortals can stand forever.

foreignNames.name: 毁坏
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标神器或地。
foreignNames.flavor: 自然和凡人的一切都无法永存。

foreignNames.name: 毀壞
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標神器或地。
foreignNames.flavor: 自然和凡人的一切都無法永存。

foreignNames.name: Démolition
foreignNames.text: Détruisez l'artefact ciblé ou le terrain ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: Rien de naturel ou de mortel n'est éternel.

foreignNames.name: Demolieren
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder ein Land deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: Nichts Natürliches oder Sterbliches hat für immer Bestand.

foreignNames.name: Frantumare
foreignNames.text: Distruggi un artefatto o una terra bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Niente che appartenga alla natura o ai mortali può durare in eterno.

foreignNames.name: 破砕
foreignNames.text: アーティファクト１つか土地１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 自然または定命の者の造ったもので、永遠に残るものは皆無である。

foreignNames.name: 철거
foreignNames.text: 마법물체나 대지를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 자연이나 인간이 만든 것은 영속성이 없다.

foreignNames.name: Demolir
foreignNames.text: Destrua o artefato ou terreno alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Nada da natureza ou dos mortais pode durar para sempre.

foreignNames.name: Разрушение
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевой артефакт или землю.
foreignNames.flavor: Ни творения природы, ни создания смертных не существуют вечно.

foreignNames.name: Demoler
foreignNames.text: Destruye el artefacto o tierra objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Nada que proceda de la naturaleza ni de los mortales puede resistir para siempre.

cards.name: Demolish
cards.originalText: Destroy target artifact or land.
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or land.

cards.flavor: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

foreignNames.name: 巨龙食粮
foreignNames.text: 将两个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物放进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 鬼怪前往牺牲山峰的旅程总是两两结伴同行，好让极幸运的生还者能讲述另一人的悲惨死法。

foreignNames.name: 巨龍食糧
foreignNames.text: 將兩個1/1紅色鬼怪衍生生物放進戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 鬼怪前往犧牲山峰的旅程總是兩兩結伴同行，好讓極幸運的生還者能講述另一人的悲慘死法。

foreignNames.name: Chair à dragon
foreignNames.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille deux jetons de créature 1/1 rouge Gobelin.
foreignNames.flavor: Les gobelins se rendent sur les pics sacrificiels par deux pour que l'éventuel survivant puisse relater les détails de l'horrible fin de l'autre.

foreignNames.name: Drachenfutter
foreignNames.text: Bringe zwei 1/1 rote Goblin-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Goblins wandern immer zu zweit zu den Gipfeln der Opferung, damit der gelegentliche Überlebende vom Untergang des anderen berichten kann.

foreignNames.name: Spuntino del Drago
foreignNames.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia due pedine creatura Goblin 1/1 rosse.
foreignNames.flavor: I goblin viaggiano fino alle vette sacrificali in coppia così che i rari sopravvissuti siano in grado di riferire i dettagli della macabra dipartita del compagno.

foreignNames.name: ドラゴンの餌
foreignNames.text: 赤の１/１のゴブリン・クリーチャー・トークンを２体戦場に出す。
foreignNames.flavor: 贄の峠へと旅に出るとき、ゴブリンは必ず二人で行く。稀に、生き残った方が、もう一方の悲惨な最期を語ることができるかもしれないからだ。

foreignNames.name: 용의 먹이
foreignNames.text: 1/1 적색 고블린 생물 토큰 두 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 고블린들은 희생의 봉우리로 갈 때는 꼭 짝을 지어서 움직인다. 혹시라도 한 명이 살아남았을 경우 죽은 쪽의 최후를 상세히 전달하기 위해서다.

foreignNames.name: Forragem de Dragão
foreignNames.text: Coloque no campo de batalha duas fichas de criatura vermelhas 1/1 do tipo Goblin.
foreignNames.flavor: Os goblins viajam para o pico do sacrifício em pares, para que os raros sobreviventes possam relatar os detalhes da morte dolorosa de seu par.

foreignNames.name: Драконий Корм
foreignNames.text: Положите на поле битвы две фишки существа 1/1 красный Гоблин.
foreignNames.flavor: Гоблины всегда отправляются к местам жертвоприношения парами, чтобы выживший счастливчик смог поведать о страшной кончине товарища.

foreignNames.name: Carnada para dragones
foreignNames.text: Pon en el campo de batalla dos fichas de criatura Trasgo rojas 1/1.
foreignNames.flavor: Los trasgos viajan a los picos de sacrificio en parejas, de manera tal que si hay un superviviente pueda contar los detalles del fallecimiento del otro.

cards.name: Dragon Fodder
cards.originalText: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.text: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: 烬喉地狱兽
foreignNames.text: 践踏（此生物攻击时造成之过量战斗伤害能对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成之。）如果由你操控的其他红色来源将对任一永久物或牌手造成伤害，则改为它对该永久物或牌手造成原数量加1点伤害。

foreignNames.name: 燼喉地獄獸
foreignNames.text: 踐踏（此生物攻擊時造成之過量戰鬥傷害能對防禦玩家或鵬洛客造成之。）如果由你操控的其他紅色來源將對任一永久物或玩家造成傷害，則改為它對該永久物或玩家造成原數量加1點傷害。

foreignNames.name: Monstruosité braisegueule
foreignNames.text: Piétinement (Cette créature peut infliger son surplus de blessures de combat au joueur ou au planeswalker défenseur quand elle attaque.)Si une autre source rouge que vous contrôlez devait infliger des blessures à un permanent ou à un joueur, elle inflige autant de blessures plus 1 à ce permanent ou à ce joueur à la place.

foreignNames.name: Glutschlund-Teufelsbraten
foreignNames.text: Verursacht Trampelschaden (Diese Kreatur kann beim Angreifen überschüssigen Kampfschaden dem verteidigenden Spieler oder Planeswalker zufügen.)Falls eine andere rote Quelle, die du kontrollierst, einer bleibenden Karte oder einem Spieler Schaden zufügen würde, fügt sie dieser bleibenden Karte oder diesem Spieler stattdessen so viele Schadenspunkte plus 1 zu.

foreignNames.name: Infernale Bracifauce
foreignNames.text: Travolgere (Questa creatura può infliggere il danno da combattimento in eccesso a un giocatore in difesa o a un planeswalker mentre attacca.)Se un'altra fonte rossa che controlli sta per infliggere danno a un permanente o a un giocatore, infligge invece altrettanti danni più 1 a quel permanente o giocatore.

foreignNames.name: 燃えさし口のヘリオン
foreignNames.text: トランプル（攻撃しているこのクリーチャーは余剰の戦闘ダメージを防御プレイヤーかプレインズウォーカーに与えることができる。）あなたがコントロールする他の赤の発生源がパーマネントかプレイヤーにダメージを与えるなら、代わりにそれはそのパーマネントやプレイヤーに、その点数に１を足した点数のダメージを与える。

foreignNames.name: 불꽃아가리 헬리온
foreignNames.text: 돌진 (이 생물은 공격할 때 수비플레이어 또는 플레인즈워커에게 여분의 피해를 입힌다.)당신이 조종하는 다른 적색 원천이 지속물이나 플레이어에게 피해를 입히려 한다면, 대신에 그 피해에 1을 더한 만큼의 피해를 입힌다.

foreignNames.name: Avernal Boca de Brasa
foreignNames.text: Atropelar (Esta criatura pode causar seu dano de combate excedente ao planeswalker ou jogador defensor ao atacar.)Se outra fonte vermelha sob seu controle for causar dano a uma permanente ou jogador, ela causará, em vez disso, aquela quantidade de dano mais 1 àquela permanente ou jogador.

foreignNames.name: Геллион Пылающей Утробы
foreignNames.text: Пробивной удар (Атакуя, это существо может нанести избыточные боевые повреждения защищающемуся игроку или planeswalker-у.)Если другой красный источник под вашим контролем должен нанести повреждения перманенту или игроку, вместо этого он наносит тому перманенту или игроку на 1 повреждение больше.

foreignNames.name: Infernal brasafauces
foreignNames.text: Arrolla. (Esta criatura puede hacer el daño de combate sobrante al jugador o planeswalker defensor mientras ataca.)Si otra fuente roja que controlas fuera a hacer daño a un permanente o jugador, en vez de eso, hace esa misma cantidad de daño más 1 a ese permanente o jugador.

cards.name: Embermaw Hellion
cards.originalText: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.

rulings.text: Embermaw Hellion’s last ability doesn’t cause Embermaw Hellion to deal damage; it affects the amount of damage dealt by the original red source.

If the player or permanent being dealt damage is also affected by a damage prevention effect, that player or the controller of that permanent can apply that effect and Embermaw Hellion’s effect in any order. If all of the damage is prevented, Embermaw Hellion’s effect can’t apply to it.

Multiple Embermaw Hellions are cumulative. If you control two of them, you’ll add 2 to the damage dealt by another red source you control. In this case, you would also add 1 to the damage dealt by either Embermaw Hellion.

cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.

cards.flavor: If you stare at the sun for too long, you'll lose your ability to see clearly.

foreignNames.name: 威服英豪
foreignNames.text: 当威服英豪进战场时，获得目标由对手操控且力量等于或小于2的生物之操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。（它此回合便能攻击与{T}。）
foreignNames.flavor: 若你瞪视太阳太久，就会失去看清一切的能力。

foreignNames.name: 威服英豪
foreignNames.text: 當威服英豪進戰場時，獲得目標由對手操控且力量等於或小於2的生物之操控權直到回合結束。重置該生物。它獲得敏捷異能直到回合結束。（它此回合便能攻擊與{T}。）
foreignNames.flavor: 若你瞪視太陽太久，就會失去看清一切的能力。

foreignNames.name: Vainqueur charismatique
foreignNames.text: Quand le Vainqueur charismatique arrive sur le champ de bataille, acquérez le contrôle d'une créature de force inférieure ou égale à 2 ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle jusqu'à la fin du tour. Dégagez cette créature. Elle acquiert la célérité jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Elle peut attaquer et {T} ce tour-ci.)
foreignNames.flavor: Si vous fixez le soleil trop longtemps, vous perdrez votre capacité à voir clairement.

foreignNames.name: Mitreißender Sieger
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Mitreißende Sieger ins Spiel kommt, übernimm bis zum Ende des Zuges die Kontrolle über eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Stärke 2 oder weniger, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. Enttappe diese Kreatur. Sie erhält Eile bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Sie kann in diesem Zug angreifen und {T}.)
foreignNames.flavor: Wenn du zu lange in die Sonne starrst, vermagst du irgendwann nicht mehr klar zu sehen.

foreignNames.name: Vincitore Affascinante
foreignNames.text: Quando il Vincitore Affascinante entra nel campo di battaglia, prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario con forza pari o inferiore a 2 fino alla fine del turno. STAPpa quella creatura. Ha rapidità fino alla fine del turno. (Può attaccare e {T} in questo turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Se fissi il sole troppo a lungo, perderai la capacità di vedere con chiarezza.

foreignNames.name: 心酔させる勝者
foreignNames.text: 心酔させる勝者が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールするパワーが２以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、ターン終了時まで、それのコントロールを得る。そのクリーチャーをアンタップする。ターン終了時まで、それは速攻を得る。（このターン、それは攻撃したり{T}したりできる。）
foreignNames.flavor: 太陽を長く見つめすぎると、物事をはっきりと見ることができなくなる。

foreignNames.name: 마음을 사로잡는 승자
foreignNames.text: 마음을 사로잡는 승자가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물 중 공격력이 2 이하인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 턴종료까지 그 생물의 조종권을 얻는다. 그 생물은 언탭되며 턴종료까지 신속 능력을 얻는다. (이 턴에 이 생물은 공격하거나 {T}할 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 태양을 오래 쳐다보면 시력을 잃는다.

foreignNames.name: Campeão Hipnotizante
foreignNames.text: Quando Campeão Hipnotizante entrar no campo de batalha, ganhe o controle da criatura alvo que um oponente controla com poder igual ou inferior a 2 até o final do turno. Desvire aquela criatura. Ela ganha ímpeto até o final do turno. (Ela pode atacar e {T} neste turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Se você olhar para o sol por muito tempo, perderá a habilidade de ver com clareza.

foreignNames.name: Порабощающий Завоеватель
foreignNames.text: Когда Порабощающий Завоеватель выходит на поле битвы, получите контроль над целевым существом с силой 2 или меньше под контролем оппонента до конца хода. Разверните то существо. Оно получает Ускорение до конца хода. (Оно может атаковать и {T} в этом ходу.)
foreignNames.flavor: Если слишком долго смотреть на солнце, теряешь ясность зрения.

foreignNames.name: Vencedor seductor
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Vencedor seductor entre al campo de batalla, gana el control de la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente con fuerza de 2 o menos hasta el final del turno. Endereza esa criatura. Gana la habilidad de prisa hasta el final del turno. (Puede atacar y {T} este turno.)
foreignNames.flavor: Si se mira fijamente al sol durante demasiado tiempo, se pierde la capacidad de ver con claridad.

cards.name: Enthralling Victor
cards.originalText: When Enthralling Victor enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

rulings.text: Once Enthralling Victor’s ability resolves and you gain control of a creature, raising its power above 2 won’t cause you to lose control of it. Similarly, it doesn’t matter if Enthralling Victor leaves the battlefield or you lose control of Enthralling Victor. You’ll keep control of the creature that was the target of the ability until the end of the turn.
Enthralling Victor’s ability can target a creature that’s already untapped. You’ll still gain control of it and it will gain haste.

cards.text: When Enthralling Victor enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

cards.flavor: Chandra's gift set her apart and others aflame.

foreignNames.name: 精巧火术
foreignNames.text: 精巧火术对目标生物或牌手造成4点伤害。精熟咒语～如果你坟墓场中有两张或更多的瞬间和／或法术牌，则精巧火术不能被咒语或异能反击。
foreignNames.flavor: 茜卓的天赋让她孑然独立，使他人着火燃烧。

foreignNames.name: 精巧火術
foreignNames.text: 精巧火術對目標生物或玩家造成4點傷害。精熟咒語～如果你墳墓場中有兩張或更多的瞬間和／或巫術牌，則精巧火術不能被咒語或異能反擊。
foreignNames.flavor: 茜卓的天賦讓她孑然獨立，使他人著火燃燒。

foreignNames.name: Art pyromantique admirable
foreignNames.text: L'Art pyromantique admirable inflige 4 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.Maîtrise de sort — S'il y a au moins deux cartes d'éphémère et/ou de rituel dans votre cimetière, l'Art pyromantique admirable ne peut pas être contrecarré par des sorts ou des capacités.
foreignNames.flavor: Le don de Chandra l'isolait et consumait les autres.

foreignNames.name: Überragende Feuerkunst
foreignNames.text: Überragende Feuerkunst fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.Zauberkunst — Falls sich zwei oder mehr Spontanzauber- und/oder Hexerei-Karten in deinem Friedhof befinden, kann Überragende Feuerkunst nicht von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten neutralisiert werden.
foreignNames.flavor: Chandras Gabe ließ sie selbst in ihrer Berufung und andere in Flammen aufgehen.

foreignNames.name: Piroarte Raffinata
foreignNames.text: La Piroarte Raffinata infligge 4 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.Arte magica — Se nel tuo cimitero ci sono due o più carte istantaneo e/o stregoneria, la Piroarte Raffinata non può essere neutralizzata da magie o abilità.
foreignNames.flavor: Il dono di Chandra isolava lei mentre inceneriva gli altri.

foreignNames.name: 極上の炎技
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。極上の炎技はそれに４点のダメージを与える。魔巧 — あなたの墓地にインスタント・カードやソーサリー・カードが合わせて２枚以上あるなら、極上の炎技は呪文や能力によっては打ち消されない。
foreignNames.flavor: チャンドラの天資は彼女を際立たせ、他の者を燃え立たせた。

foreignNames.name: 정교한 화염술
foreignNames.text: 생물이나 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 정교한 화염술은 그 목표에 피해 4점을 입힌다.주문 숙련 — 당신의 무덤에 집중마법 그리고/또는 순간마법 카드가 두 장 이상 있다면, 정교한 화염술은 주문이나 능력에 의해 무효화될 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: 찬드라의 상대를 불태워 자신의 불타는 신념을 표출한다.

foreignNames.name: Excelência em Pirotecnia
foreignNames.text: Excelência em Pirotecnia causa 4 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.Maestria em magia — Se houver dois ou mais cards de mágica instantânea ou feitiço no seu cemitério, Excelência em Pirotecnia não poderá ser anulada por mágicas ou habilidades.
foreignNames.flavor: O dom de Chandra a distinguiu dos outros, que acabaram em chamas.

foreignNames.name: Изысканное Мастерство Пламени
foreignNames.text: Изысканное Мастерство Пламени наносит 4 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.Мастерство заклинаний — Если на вашем кладбище есть не менее двух карт мгновенных заклинаний и (или) волшебства, Изысканное Мастерство Пламени не может быть отменено заклинаниями или способностями.
foreignNames.flavor: Дар Чандры возвышал ее над остальными, а остальных — превращал в пепел.

foreignNames.name: Piromancia impecable
foreignNames.text: La Piromancia impecable hace 4 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.Dominio de hechizos — Si hay dos o más cartas de instantáneo y/o de conjuro en tu cementerio, la Piromancia impecable no puede ser contrarrestada por hechizos o habilidades.
foreignNames.flavor: El don de Chandra la hizo destacar y a otros arder.

cards.name: Exquisite Firecraft
cards.originalText: Exquisite Firecraft deals 4 damage to target creature or player.Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Exquisite Firecraft can't be countered by spells or abilities.

rulings.text: Even if the spell mastery ability applies, Exquisite Firecraft can be targeted by spells or abilities that would counter it. The part of their effect that would counter Exquisite Firecraft won’t do anything, but any other effects those spells or abilities may have will still happen, if applicable.

Check to see if there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard as the spell resolves to determine whether the spell mastery ability applies. The spell itself won’t count because it’s still on the stack as you make this check.

cards.text:
Exquisite Firecraft deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Exquisite Firecraft can't be countered by spells or abilities.

cards.flavor: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

foreignNames.name: 暴烈终局
foreignNames.text: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放暴烈终局的额外费用。暴烈终局对目标生物造成5点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 波洛斯军团兵见证了高贵的牺牲，拉铎司刺客看到了眩目的自杀场面，伊捷炼金术士则认为是实验出了差错。

foreignNames.name: 暴烈終局
foreignNames.text: 犧牲一個生物，以作為施放暴烈終局的額外費用。暴烈終局對目標生物造成5點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 波洛斯軍團兵見證了高貴的犧牲，拉鐸司刺客看到了眩目的自殺場面，伊捷鍊金術士則認為是實驗出了差錯。

foreignNames.name: Conclusion ardente
foreignNames.text: En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer la Conclusion ardente, sacrifiez une créature.La Conclusion ardente inflige 5 blessures à une créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: Le légionnaire boros vit un noble sacrifice, l'étrangleur rakdos, une immolation, et l'alchimiste izzet, une expérience qui avait mal tourné.

foreignNames.name: Feuriges Ende

cards.originalText: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

rulings.text: Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.

foreignNames.name: Invocación sombrardiente

cards.name: Flameshadow Conjuring
cards.originalText: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {R}. If you do, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: The token copies exactly what’s printed on the original creature and nothing else (unless that creature is copying something else; see below). It doesn’t copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, and so on.
If the copied creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.
If the copied creature is copying something else when the ability resolves, then the token enters the battlefield as a copy of whatever that creature is copying.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “as [this permanent] enters the battlefield” or “[this permanent] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the copied creature will also work.
The token is exiled at the beginning of the next end step regardless of who controls it at that time.
If the ability resolves during a turn’s end step, the token will be exiled at the beginning of the next turn’s end step.
If the token isn’t exiled at the beginning of the next end step (perhaps because the delayed triggered ability is countered), it remains on the battlefield indefinitely. It continues to have haste.
If another creature becomes or enters the battlefield as a copy of the token, that creature won’t have haste and it won’t be exiled.

cards.name: Goblin Glory Chaser
cards.originalText: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)As long as Goblin Glory Chaser is renowned, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

rulings.text: Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.
Once an attacking creature with menace is legally blocked by two or more creatures, removing one or more of those blockers from combat won’t change or undo that block.

rulings.text: If, during its controller’s declare attackers step, the enchanted creature is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, then that creature doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If he or she doesn’t, the creature doesn’t have to attack.

cards.name: Mage-Ring Bully
cards.originalText: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)Mage-Ring Bully attacks each turn if able.

rulings.text: If, during its controller’s declare attackers step, Mage-Ring Bully is tapped or is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, then Mage-Ring Bully doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having it attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If he or she doesn’t, Mage-Ring Bully doesn’t have to attack.

Any spell you cast that doesn’t have the type creature will cause prowess to trigger. If a spell has multiple types, and one of those types is creature (such as an artifact creature), casting it won’t cause prowess to trigger. Playing a land also won’t cause prowess to trigger.
Prowess goes on the stack on top of the spell that caused it to trigger. It will resolve before that spell.
Once it triggers, prowess isn’t connected to the spell that caused it to trigger. If that spell is countered, prowess will still resolve.

foreignNames.flavor: 隨著時光流逝，連火焰修行僧的技藝也比不上茜卓了。

foreignNames.name: Brasier dévastateur
foreignNames.text: Le Brasier dévastateur inflige X blessures à une créature ciblée. Maîtrise de sort — S'il y a au moins deux cartes d'éphémère et/ou de rituel dans votre cimetière, le Brasier dévastateur inflige aussi X blessures au contrôleur de cette créature.
foreignNames.flavor: Au bout d'un certain temps, même les moines de feu ne parvenaient plus à contrôler Chandra.

foreignNames.name: Verheerende Flammen
foreignNames.text: Die Verheerenden Flammen fügen einer Kreatur deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu. Zauberkunst — Falls sich zwei oder mehr Spontanzauber- und/oder Hexerei-Karten in deinem Friedhof befinden, fügen die Verheerenden Flammen außerdem dem Beherrscher dieser Kreatur X Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Es dauerte nicht lange, bis nicht einmal mehr die Feuermönche mit Chandra mithalten konnten.

foreignNames.name: Fiammata Devastante
foreignNames.text: La Fiammata Devastante infligge X danni a una creatura bersaglio. Arte magica — Se nel tuo cimitero ci sono due o più carte istantaneo e/o stregoneria, la Fiammata Devastante infligge anche X danni al controllore di quella creatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Con il tempo, neppure i monaci del fuoco riuscirono a tenere il passo con Chandra.

foreignNames.name: 残虐無道の猛火
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。残虐無道の猛火はそれにＸ点のダメージを与える。 魔巧 — あなたの墓地にインスタント・カードやソーサリー・カードが合わせて２枚以上あるなら、残虐無道の猛火はそのクリーチャーのコントローラーにもＸ点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 次第に、炎僧たちですらチャンドラにかなわなくなった。

foreignNames.name: 유린하는 불꽃
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 유린하는 불꽃은 그 생물에 피해 X점을 입힌다. 주문 숙련 — 당신의 무덤에 집중마법 그리고/또는 순간마법 카드가 두 장 이상 있다면, 유린하는 불꽃은 그 생물의 조종자에게도 피해 X점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 시간이 흐르자 화염 수도승조차 찬드라를 따라갈 수 없었다.

foreignNames.name: Incêndio Furioso
foreignNames.text: Incêndio Furioso causa X pontos de dano à criatura alvo. Maestria em magia — Se houver dois ou mais cards de mágica instantânea ou feitiço no seu cemitério, Incêndio Furioso também causará X pontos de dano ao controlador daquela criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Com o tempo, nem os monges de fogo conseguiram acompanhar Chandra.

foreignNames.name: Яростная Вспышка
foreignNames.text: Яростная Вспышка наносит X повреждений целевому существу. Мастерство заклинаний — Если на вашем кладбище есть не менее двух карт мгновенных заклинаний и (или) волшебства, Яростная Вспышка также наносит X повреждений игроку, контролирующему то существо.
foreignNames.flavor: Со временем даже монахи огня перестали поспевать за Чандрой.

foreignNames.name: Llamarada salvaje
foreignNames.text: La Llamarada salvaje hace X puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo. Dominio de hechizos — Si hay dos o más cartas de instantáneo y/o de conjuro en tu cementerio, la Llamarada salvaje también hace X puntos de daño al controlador de esa criatura.
foreignNames.flavor: Con el tiempo, ni siquiera los monjes de fuego podían seguirle el ritmo a Chandra.

cards.name: Ravaging Blaze
cards.originalText: Ravaging Blaze deals X damage to target creature. Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ravaging Blaze also deals X damage to that creature's controller.

rulings.text: Ravaging Blaze targets only the creature. It doesn’t target any player, even if the spell mastery ability applies.

If the creature becomes an illegal target by the time Ravaging Blaze tries to resolve, Ravaging Blaze will be countered and none of its effects will happen. No damage will be dealt to the creature or its controller.

Check to see if there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard as the spell resolves to determine whether the spell mastery ability applies. The spell itself won’t count because it’s still on the stack as you make this check.

cards.text:

(Cuando esta criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador, si no tiene prestigio, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre ella y gana prestigio.)Siempre que un oponente lance un hechizo que no sea de criatura, si la Berserker del clan Scab tiene prestigio, la Berserker del clan Scab hace 2 puntos de daño a ese jugador.

cards.name: Scab-Clan Berserker
cards.originalText: HasteRenown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, if Scab-Clan Berserker is renowned, Scab-Clan Berserker deals 2 damage to that player.

rulings.text: Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.

cards.text:

cards.name: Aerial Volley
cards.originalText: Aerial Volley deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures with flying.

rulings.text: You choose how many targets Aerial Volley has and how the damage is divided as you cast the spell. Each target must receive at least 1 damage.

If some (but not all) of the targets become illegal before Aerial Volley tries to resolve, the original division of damage still applies, but no damage is dealt to illegal targets. If all targets become illegal, Aerial Volley will be countered.

cards.name: Animist's Awakening
cards.originalText: Reveal the top X cards of your library. Put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, untap those lands.

rulings.text: No player will know the order of the cards put on the bottom of your library. Practically speaking, the cards should be shuffled (although this is not the game action of “shuffling”).
If the spell mastery ability applies, you untap only the lands put onto the battlefield with Animist’s Awakening.

If you have X or less cards in your library, you’ll reveal all the cards from your library, put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield tapped, and then put the rest of the cards back in your library in a random order. (This is effectively the same as shuffling your library, although it’s still not technically a shuffle.)

Check to see if there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard as the spell resolves to determine whether the spell mastery ability applies. The spell itself won’t count because it’s still on the stack as you make this check.

cards.text:
Reveal the top X cards of your library. Put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, untap those lands.

cards.name: Elemental Bond
cards.originalText: Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

rulings.text: The creature must have power 3 or greater as it enters the battlefield, or Elemental Bond’s ability won’t trigger. Static abilities that raise (or lower) a creature’s power are taken into account. However, you can’t have a creature with power 2 or less enter the battlefield and try to raise its power with a spell, an activated ability, or a triggered ability.

foreignNames.flavor: 变化乃自然根本。

foreignNames.name: 飛躍進化
foreignNames.text: {G}，犧牲一個生物：從你的牌庫頂開始展示牌，直到展示出一張生物牌為止。將該牌置於你手上，並將其餘的牌以隨機順序置於你的牌庫底。
foreignNames.flavor: 變化乃自然根本。

foreignNames.name: Bond de l'évolution
foreignNames.text: {G}, sacrifiez une créature : Révélez les cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque jusqu'à ce que vous révéliez une carte de créature. Mettez cette carte dans votre main et le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans un ordre aléatoire.
foreignNames.flavor: Le changement est l'essence même de la nature.

foreignNames.name: Evolutionssprung
foreignNames.text: {G}, opfere eine Kreatur: Decke Karten oben von deiner Bibliothek auf, bis du eine Kreaturenkarte aufdeckst. Nimm diese Karte auf deine Hand und lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Essenz der Natur ist Veränderung.

foreignNames.name: Balzo Evolutivo
foreignNames.text: {G}, Sacrifica una creatura: Rivela carte dalla cima del tuo grimorio finché non riveli una carta creatura. Aggiungi quella carta alla tua mano e metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in ordine casuale.
foreignNames.flavor: L'essenza della natura è il cambiamento.

foreignNames.name: 進化の飛躍
foreignNames.text: {G}, クリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーの一番上から、クリーチャー・カードが公開されるまでカードを公開する。そのカードをあなたの手札に加え、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に無作為の順番で置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 自然の本質とは変化である。

foreignNames.name: 급속한 진화
foreignNames.text: {G}, 생물 한 개를 희생한다: 생물 카드가 공개될 때까지 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 공개한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 가져가고 나머지 카드들은 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 무작위로 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 자연의 정수는 변화다.

foreignNames.name: Salto Evolutivo
foreignNames.text: {G}, Sacrifique uma criatura: Revele cards do topo de seu grimório até revelar um card de criatura. Coloque aquele card na sua mão e o restante no fundo de seu grimório em ordem aleatória.
foreignNames.flavor: A essência da natureza é a mudança.

foreignNames.name: Скачок Эволюции
foreignNames.text: {G}, пожертвуйте существо: показывайте карты с верха вашей библиотеки до тех пор, пока вы не покажете карту существа. Положите ту карту в вашу руку, а остальные — в низ вашей библиотеки в случайном порядке.
foreignNames.flavor: Сущность природы — перемены.

foreignNames.name: Salto evolutivo
foreignNames.text: {G}, sacrificar una criatura: Muestra las primeras cartas de tu biblioteca hasta que muestres una carta de criatura. Pon esa carta en tu mano y el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio.
foreignNames.flavor: La esencia de la naturaleza es el cambio.

cards.name: Evolutionary Leap
cards.originalText: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

rulings.text: No player will know the order of the cards put on the bottom of your library. Practically speaking, the cards should be shuffled (although this is not the game action of “shuffling”).

If you don’t reveal a creature card, you’ll reveal all the cards from your library and then put them back in your library in a random order. (This is effectively the same as shuffling your library, although it’s still not technically a shuffle.)

cards.text: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

foreignNames.name: 盖亚复仇灵
foreignNames.text: 盖亚复仇灵不能被反击。敏捷盖亚复仇灵不能成为非绿色咒语或非绿色来源的异能之目标。

foreignNames.name: 蓋亞復仇靈
foreignNames.text: 蓋亞復仇靈不能被反擊。敏捷蓋亞復仇靈不能成為非綠色咒語或非綠色來源的異能之目標。

foreignNames.name: Vengeance de Gaia
foreignNames.text: La Vengeance de Gaia ne peut pas être contrecarrée.CéléritéLa Vengeance de Gaia ne peut pas être la cible de sorts non-verts ou de capacités de sources non-vertes.

foreignNames.name: Gaeas Rache
foreignNames.text: Gaeas Rache kann nicht neutralisiert werden.EileGaeas Rache kann nicht das Ziel von nichtgrünen Zaubersprüchen oder von Fähigkeiten aus nichtgrünen Quellen sein.

foreignNames.name: Vendetta di Gea
foreignNames.text: La Vendetta di Gea non può essere neutralizzata.RapiditàLa Vendetta di Gea non può essere bersaglio di magie non verdi o abilità da fonti non verdi.

foreignNames.name: ガイアの復讐者
foreignNames.text: ガイアの復讐者は打ち消されない。速攻ガイアの復讐者は、緑でない呪文や緑でない発生源の能力の対象にならない。

foreignNames.name: 가이아의 보복
foreignNames.text: 가이아의 보복은 무효화될 수 없다.신속가이아의 보복은 녹색이 아닌 주문이나 녹색이 아닌 원천에서 나온 능력의 목표로 정해질 수 없다.

foreignNames.name: Vingança de Gaia
foreignNames.text: Vingança de Gaia não pode ser anulado.ÍmpetoVingança de Gaia não pode ser alvo de mágicas que não sejam verdes ou de habilidades que não sejam de fontes verdes.

foreignNames.name: Месть Геи
foreignNames.text: Месть Геи не может быть отменена.УскорениеМесть Геи не может быть целью незеленых заклинаний или способностей от незеленых источников.

foreignNames.name: Venganza de Gaia
foreignNames.text: La Venganza de Gaia no puede ser contrarrestada.Prisa.La Venganza de Gaia no puede ser objetivo de hechizos que no sean verdes o de habilidades de fuentes que no sean verdes.

cards.name: Gaea's Revenge
cards.originalText: Gaea's Revenge can't be countered.HasteGaea's Revenge can't be the target of nongreen spells or abilities from nongreen sources.

rulings.text: Gaea's Revenge's first ability works only while it's a spell on the stack. Gaea's Revenge's last ability works only while it's on the battlefield.

A Gaea’s Revenge spell can be targeted by spells and abilities that would counter it. The part of their effect that would counter Gaea’s Revenge won’t do anything, but any other effects those spells or abilities may have will still happen, if applicable.

Gaea's Revenge's last ability applies to all nongreen spells and abilities from nongreen sources, including ones you control. For example, you can't target it with the equip ability of an Equipment you control (unless the Equipment is somehow green).
If a spell is one or more colors, and one of those colors is green, that spell can target Gaea’s Revenge.

cards.text:
Gaea's Revenge can't be countered.
Haste
Gaea's Revenge can't be the target of nongreen spells or abilities from nongreen sources.

foreignNames.name: 召集猎群
foreignNames.text: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌。你可以将其中的一张生物牌置于你手上。将其余的牌置入你的坟墓场。精熟咒语～如果你坟墓场中有两张或更多的瞬间和／或法术牌，则改为将所展示之牌中至多两张生物牌置于你手上，而非一张。

foreignNames.name: 召集獵群
foreignNames.text: 展示你牌庫頂的五張牌。你可以將其中的一張生物牌置於你手上。將其餘的牌置入你的墳墓場。精熟咒語～如果你墳墓場中有兩張或更多的瞬間和／或巫術牌，則改為將所展示之牌中至多兩張生物牌置於你手上，而非一張。

foreignNames.name: Rassemblement de la meute
foreignNames.text: Révélez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre une carte de créature parmi elles dans votre main. Mettez le reste dans votre cimetière.Maîtrise de sort — S'il y a au moins deux cartes d'éphémère et/ou de rituel dans votre cimetière, mettez jusqu'à deux cartes de créature parmi les cartes révélées dans votre main à la place d'une.

foreignNames.name: Das Rudel versammeln
foreignNames.text: Decke die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek auf. Du kannst davon eine Kreaturenkarte auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.Zauberkunst — Falls sich zwei oder mehr Spontanzauber- und/oder Hexerei-Karten in deinem Friedhof befinden, nimm von den aufgedeckten Karten bis zu zwei Kreaturenkarten statt einer auf deine Hand.

foreignNames.name: Radunare la Banda
foreignNames.text: Rivela le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi aggiungere alla tua mano una carta creatura scelta tra esse. Metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.Arte magica — Se nel tuo cimitero ci sono due o più carte istantaneo e/o stregoneria, aggiungi alla tua mano fino a due carte creatura scelte tra le carte rivelate invece di una.

foreignNames.name: 群れの結集
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを公開する。あなたは、その中からクリーチャー・カードを１枚あなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたの墓地に置く。魔巧 — あなたの墓地にインスタント・カードやソーサリー・カードが合わせて２枚以上あるなら、公開されたカードの中からクリーチャー・カードを、１枚の代わりに最大２枚まであなたの手札に加える。

foreignNames.name: 무리 소집
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 공개한다. 당신은 그 중 생물 카드 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드는 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.주문 숙련 — 당신의 무덤에 집중마법 그리고/또는 순간마법 카드가 두 장 이상 있다면, 공개한 카드 중 생물 카드를 한 장 대신 두 장까지 손으로 가져간다.

foreignNames.name: Reunir o Bando
foreignNames.text: Revele os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar um card de criatura dentre eles em sua mão. Coloque o restante em seu cemitério.Maestria em magia — Se houver dois ou mais cards de mágica instantânea ou feitiço no seu cemitério, coloque até dois cards de criatura dentre os revelados na sua mão, em vez de um.

foreignNames.name: Сбор Стаи
foreignNames.text: Покажите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить находящуюся среди них карту существа в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты на ваше кладбище.Мастерство заклинаний — Если на вашем кладбище есть не менее двух карт мгновенных заклинаний и (или) волшебства, положите в вашу руку не более двух карт существ, находящихся среди показанных карт, вместо одной.

foreignNames.name: Reunir al grupo
foreignNames.text: Muestra las primeras cinco cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner en tu mano una carta de criatura que se encuentre entre ellas. Pon el resto en tu cementerio.Dominio de hechizos — Si hay dos o más cartas de instantáneo y/o de conjuro en tu cementerio, en vez de una, pon en tu mano hasta dos cartas de criatura que se encuentren entre las cartas mostradas.

cards.name: Gather the Pack
cards.originalText: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, put up to two creature cards from among the revealed cards into your hand instead of one.

rulings.text: Check to see if there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard as the spell resolves to determine whether the spell mastery ability applies. The spell itself won’t count because it’s still on the stack as you make this check.

cards.text:
Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, put up to two creature cards from among the revealed cards into your hand instead of one.

foreignNames.name: 伟大极光
foreignNames.text: 每位牌手将其所有手牌和由他拥有的所有永久物洗入其牌库，然后各抓等量的牌。每位牌手可以将任意数量的地牌从其手上放进战场。放逐伟大极光。

foreignNames.name: 偉大極光
foreignNames.text: 每位玩家將其所有手牌和由他擁有的所有永久物洗入其牌庫，然後各抽等量的牌。每位玩家可以將任意數量的地牌從其手上放進戰場。放逐偉大極光。

foreignNames.name: La Grande Aurore
foreignNames.text: Chaque joueur mélange toutes les cartes de sa main et tous les permanents qu'il possède à sa bibliothèque et pioche ensuite autant de cartes. Chaque joueur peut mettre sur le champ de bataille n'importe quel nombre de cartes de terrain de sa main. Exilez La Grande Aurore.

foreignNames.name: Die Große Aurora
foreignNames.text: Jeder Spieler mischt alle Karten aus seiner Hand und alle bleibenden Karten, die er besitzt, in seine Bibliothek und zieht dann entsprechend viele Karten. Jeder Spieler kann eine beliebige Anzahl an Länderkarten aus seiner Hand ins Spiel bringen. Schicke Die Große Aurora ins Exil.

foreignNames.name: La Grande Luminaria
foreignNames.text: Ogni giocatore rimescola tutte le carte della propria mano e tutti i permanenti che possiede nel proprio grimorio, poi pesca altrettante carte. Ogni giocatore può mettere sul campo di battaglia un qualsiasi numero di carte terra dalla sua mano. Esilia La Grande Luminaria.

foreignNames.name: 大オーロラ
foreignNames.text: 各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、自分の手札にあるすべてのカードと自分がオーナーであるすべてのパーマネントを自分のライブラリーに加えて切り直し、その後それらの枚数に等しい枚数のカードを引く。各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、自分の手札から望む枚数の土地・カードを戦場に出してもよい。大オーロラを追放する。

foreignNames.name: 장대한 오로라
foreignNames.text: 각 플레이어는 자신의 손에 있는 모든 카드와 자신이 소유한 모든 지속물을 자신의 서고에 섞어 넣은 후, 그만큼의 카드를 뽑는다. 각 플레이어는 자신의 손에서 원하는 만큼의 대지 카드를 전장에 놓을 수 있다. 장대한 오로라를 추방한다.

foreignNames.name: A Grande Aurora
foreignNames.text: Cada jogador embaralha todos os cards da própria mão e todas as permanentes que lhe pertencem em seu próprio grimório e depois compra um número equivalente de cards. Cada jogador pode colocar qualquer número de cards de terrenos que tiver na mão no campo de batalha. Exile A Grande Aurora.

foreignNames.name: Великая Аврора
foreignNames.text: Каждый игрок втасовывает в свою библиотеку все карты из своей руки и все перманенты, владельцем которых он является, затем берет столько же карт. Каждый игрок может положить любое количество карт земель из своей руки на поле битвы. Изгоните Великую Аврору.

foreignNames.name: La Gran Aurora
foreignNames.text: Cada jugador baraja todas las cartas de su mano y todos los permanentes de los que es propietario en su biblioteca, luego roba esa misma cantidad de cartas. Cada jugador puede poner cualquier cantidad de cartas de tierra de su mano en el campo de batalla. Exilia La Gran Aurora.

cards.name: The Great Aurora
cards.originalText: Each player shuffles all cards from his or her hand and all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then draws that many cards. Each player may put any number of land cards from his or her hand onto the battlefield. Exile The Great Aurora.

rulings.text: The number of cards you draw is equal to the number of permanents on the battlefield that you shuffle into your library plus the number of cards from your hand that you shuffle into your library.

A token is owned by the player under whose control it entered the battlefield. Tokens shuffled into a library count toward the number of cards drawn, though they cease to exist upon becoming part of a library. Regardless of what you’re using to represent tokens, you won’t shuffle that physical object into your library.
If a player is required to draw more cards than his or her library contains, that player loses the game. If all players lose the game this way, the game is a draw.

As The Great Aurora resolves, first you choose any number of land cards in your hand to put onto the battlefield, and then each other player in turn order does the same. The lands enter the battlefield simultaneously.

cards.text: Each player shuffles all cards from his or her hand and all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then draws that many cards. Each player may put any number of land cards from his or her hand onto the battlefield. Exile The Great Aurora.

cards.flavor: The distinction of bearing the gods' banner is nothing compared to the glory of being closer to Nyx.

foreignNames.name: 诸神传令使
foreignNames.text: 你施放的结界咒语减少{1}来施放。每当你施放结界咒语时，你获得1点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 高扬诸神的旗帜所获得的荣誉无法与更接近尼兹所带来的荣耀相比。

foreignNames.name: 諸神傳令使
foreignNames.text: 你施放的結界咒語減少{1}來施放。每當你施放結界咒語時，你獲得1點生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 高揚諸神的旗幟所獲得的榮譽無法與更接近尼茲所帶來的榮耀相比。

foreignNames.name: Héraut du panthéon
foreignNames.text: Les sorts d'enchantement que vous lancez coûtent {1} de moins à lancer.À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort d'enchantement, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Porter l'étendard des dieux n'est rien comparé à la gloire d'être plus proche de Nyx.

foreignNames.name: Heroldin des Pantheons
foreignNames.text: Verzauberungszauber, die du wirkst, kosten beim Wirken {1} weniger.Immer wenn du einen Verzauberungszauber wirkst, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Auszeichnung, zum Bannerträger der Götter auserkoren zu werden, ist nichts verglichen mit der Ehre, Nyx näher sein zu dürfen.

foreignNames.name: Messaggera del Pantheon
foreignNames.text: Le magie incantesimo che lanci costano {1} in meno per essere lanciate.Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia incantesimo, guadagni 1 punto vita.
foreignNames.flavor: L'onore di portare il vessillo degli dei non è nulla se paragonato alla gloria di essere più vicini a Nyx.

foreignNames.name: 万神殿の伝令
foreignNames.text: あなたがエンチャント・呪文を唱えるためのコストは{1}少なくなる。あなたがエンチャント・呪文を１つ唱えるたび、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 神々の戦旗を掲げることができる栄誉など、ニクスに近づくことの栄光と比べたら何でもない。

foreignNames.name: 신계의 전령
foreignNames.text: 당신이 발동하는 부여마법 주문들은 발동하는 데 {1}이 덜 든다.당신이 부여마법 주문을 발동할 때마다, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 신의 기치를 드는 영광은 닉스에 다가가는 영광에 비하면 아무것도 아니다.

foreignNames.name: Arauto do Panteão
foreignNames.text: As mágicas de encantamentos que você conjura custam {1} a menos para serem conjuradas.Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica de encantamento, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: A honra de carregar o estandarte dos deuses não é nada comparado à glória de estar mais perto de Nyx.

foreignNames.name: Глашатай Пантеона
foreignNames.text: Разыгрываемые вами заклинания чар стоят на {1} меньше.Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание чар, вы получаете 1 жизнь.
foreignNames.flavor: Почетное право нести знамя богов — ничто по сравнению с честью быть ближе к Никсу.

foreignNames.name: Heraldo del panteón
foreignNames.text: Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar los hechizos de encantamiento.Siempre que lances un hechizo de encantamiento, ganas 1 vida.
foreignNames.flavor: La distinción de portar el estandarte de los dioses no es nada comparada con la gloria de estar más cerca de Nyx.

cards.name: Herald of the Pantheon
cards.originalText: Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: Herald of the Pantheon’s first ability can’t reduce the colored mana requirement of an enchantment spell.
If there are additional costs to cast an enchantment spell, apply those before applying cost reductions.
Herald of the Pantheon can reduce alternative costs such as bestow costs.

cards.text:
Enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: Not all spiders need webs to catch their prey.

foreignNames.name: 钩爪隐士
foreignNames.text: 延势（此生物能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 不是所有的蜘蛛都要靠结网来捕捉猎物。

foreignNames.name: 鈎爪隱士
foreignNames.text: 延勢（此生物能阻擋具飛行異能的生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 不是所有的蜘蛛都要靠結網來捕捉獵物。

foreignNames.name: Recluse crochegriffe
foreignNames.text: Portée (Cette créature peut bloquer les créatures avec le vol.)
foreignNames.flavor: Toutes les araignées n'ont pas besoin de toile pour attraper leurs proies.

foreignNames.name: Fangbein-Einsiedlerspinne
foreignNames.text: Reichweite (Diese Kreatur kann fliegende Kreaturen blocken.)
foreignNames.flavor: Nicht alle Spinnen brauchen Netze, um ihre Beute zu fangen.

foreignNames.name: Eremita dagli Artigli Uncinati
foreignNames.text: Raggiungere (Questa creatura può bloccare le creature con volare.)
foreignNames.flavor: Non tutti i ragni si servono di ragnatele per catturare le loro prede.

foreignNames.name: 絡み爪のイトグモ
foreignNames.text: 到達（このクリーチャーは飛行を持つクリーチャーをブロックできる。）
foreignNames.flavor: すべての蜘蛛が獲物を捕らえるのに網を必要とするとは限らない。

foreignNames.name: 고리발 은둔거미
foreignNames.text: 대공 (이 생물은 비행을 가진 생물을 방어할 수 있다.)

cards.name: Honored Hierarch
cards.originalText: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)As long as Honored Hierarch is renowned, it has vigilance and "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

rulings.text: Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.

cards.name: Joraga Invocation
cards.originalText: Each creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

rulings.text: If multiple attacking creatures must be blocked if able, the defending player must assign at least one blocker to each of them if possible. For example, if two such creatures were attacking and there were two potential blockers, they couldn’t both be assigned to block the same attacker.
Joraga Invocation doesn’t force any specific creature to block any specific attacking creature. The defending player still chooses how creatures he or she controls block.
