cards.flavor: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

foreignNames.name: 众人之力
foreignNames.text: 你每操控一个生物，目标生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 玖瑞加妖精从未要求巨魔离开其领土。他们只是将集体之力量赋予它身上，使它忍不住要展开快乐的暴冲旅程。

foreignNames.name: 眾人之力
foreignNames.text: 你每操控一個生物，目標生物便得+1/+1直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 玖瑞加妖精從未要求巨魔離開其領土。他們只是將集體之力量賦予牠身上，使牠忍不住要展開快樂的暴衝旅程。

foreignNames.name: Puissance des masses
foreignNames.text: La créature ciblée gagne +1/+1 jusqu'à la fin du tour pour chaque créature que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: Les elfes de Joraga ne demandent jamais à un troll de quitter leur territoire. Ils lui transfèrent juste leur force combinée et il ne peut résister très longtemps à l'appel de la sauvagerie.

foreignNames.name: Die Macht der Massen
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält für jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Joraga-Elfen haben es nicht nötig, Trolle aus ihrem Gebiet zu vertreiben. Sie verleihen ihnen einfach ihre gesammelte Stärke, und kein Troll kann dann widerstehen, sich auf eine lustige Rauftour in fremde Länder zu begeben.

foreignNames.name: Potere delle Masse
foreignNames.text: Una creatura bersaglio prende +1/+1 fino alla fine del turno per ogni creatura che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli elfi di Joraga non hanno mai la necessità di chiedere a un troll di alzare i tacchi. Basta che gli concedano la loro forza combinata e quello non può resistere alla prospettiva di scatenarsi come un pazzo.

foreignNames.name: 大群の力
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体につき＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.flavor: ジョラーガのエルフは、トロールに領地から出て行けと言う必要がまったくない。単に彼らの力を渡すだけで、嬉々として襲撃に出かけることを我慢できなくなるからだ。

foreignNames.name: 군중의 힘
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개당 +1/+1을 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 조라가의 엘프들은 트롤을 쫓아낼 필요가 없다. 트롤에게 자신들의 힘을 주면 트롤이 기쁨을 감추지 못하고 뭐든 때려 부수러 숲을 나가기 때문이다.

foreignNames.name: Força das Massas
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo recebe +1/+1 até o final do turno para cada criatura que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: Os elfos de Joraga nunca precisam pedir a um trol que deixe seu território. Eles meramente concedem a ele sua força combinada e ele não consegue resistir ao impulso destrutivo.

foreignNames.name: Сила Масс
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо получает +1/+1 до конца хода за каждое существо под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: Джорагским эльфам не приходится просить тролля покинуть их земли. Они наделяют его своей объединенной силой, и тот весело отправляется крушить все подряд.

foreignNames.name: Poder de las masas
foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene +1/+1 hasta el final del turno por cada criatura que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor: Los elfos de Joraga nunca necesitan pedir a un trol que deje su territorio. Simplemente le otorgan su fuerza combinada y este no puede resistir emprender un alegre viaje de destrucción.

cards.name: Might of the Masses
cards.originalText: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.

rulings.text: The bonus is determined as Might of the Masses resolves. It won't change if the number of creatures you control changes later in the turn.
If you target a creature you control with Might of the Masses, remember to count that one when determining the amount of the bonus.

cards.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.

foreignNames.name: 广林预言师妮莎
foreignNames.text: 当广林预言师妮莎进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的树林牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，若你操控七个或更多地，则放逐妮莎，然后将她在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。

foreignNames.name: 廣林預言師妮莎
foreignNames.text: 當廣林預言師妮莎進戰場時，你可以從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本的樹林牌，展示該牌，將它置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。每當一個地在你的操控下進戰場時，如果你操控七個或更多地，則放逐妮莎，然後將她在其擁有者的操控下移回戰場且已轉化。

foreignNames.name: Nissa, voyante de Vastebois
foreignNames.text: Quand Nissa, voyante de Vastebois arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez chercher dans votre bibliothèque une carte de forêt de base, la révéler, la mettre dans votre main et mélanger ensuite votre bibliothèque.À chaque fois qu'un terrain arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, si vous contrôlez au moins sept terrains, exilez Nissa, puis renvoyez-la sur le champ de bataille, transformée, sous le contrôle de son propriétaire.

foreignNames.name: Nissa, Seherin aus Riesenholz
foreignNames.text: Wenn Nissa, Seherin aus Riesenholz, ins Spiel kommt, kannst du deine Bibliothek nach einer Wald-Standardlandkarte durchsuchen, sie offen vorzeigen, auf deine Hand nehmen und dann deine Bibliothek mischen.Immer wenn ein Land unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt und falls du sieben oder mehr Länder kontrollierst, schicke Nissa ins Exil und bringe sie dann transformiert unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.

foreignNames.name: Nissa, Veggente di Boscovasto
foreignNames.text: Quando Nissa, Veggente di Boscovasto entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi passare in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Foresta base, rivelarla, aggiungerla alla tua mano, poi rimescolare il tuo grimorio.Ogniqualvolta una terra entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, se controlli sette o più terre, esilia Nissa, poi rimettila sul campo di battaglia trasformata sotto il controllo del suo proprietario.

foreignNames.name: 巨森の予見者、ニッサ
foreignNames.text: 巨森の予見者、ニッサが戦場に出たとき、あなたはあなたのライブラリーから基本森・カードを１枚探してもよい。そうしたなら、それを公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。土地が１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたが７つ以上の土地をコントロールしている場合、巨森の予見者、ニッサを追放し、その後、これを変身させた状態でオーナーのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。

foreignNames.name: 광활림의 예언자 니사
foreignNames.text: 광활림의 예언자 니사가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 당신의 서고에서 기본 숲 카드 한 장을 찾아 공개한 후 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.당신의 조종하에 대지가 전장에 들어올 때마다, 당신이 대지를 일곱 개 이상 조종한다면, 니사를 추방한 다음 변신한 상태로 그 소유자의 조종하에 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Nissa, Vidente de Matavasta
foreignNames.text: Quando Nissa, Vidente de Matavasta, entra no campo de batalha, você pode procurar um card de Floresta básico em seu grimório, revelá-lo, colocá-lo na sua mão e depois embaralhar seu grimório.Toda vez que um terreno entrar no campo de batalha sob seu controle, se você controlar sete terrenos ou mais, exile Nissa e depois devolva-a ao campo de batalha transformada sob o controle de seu dono.

foreignNames.name: Нисса, Провидица Широколесья
foreignNames.text: Когда Нисса, Провидица Широколесья выходит на поле битвы, вы можете найти в вашей библиотеке карту базового Леса, показать ее, положить ее в вашу руку, затем перетасовать вашу библиотеку.Каждый раз, когда земля выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, если вы контролируете не менее семи земель, изгоните Ниссу, затем верните ее на поле битвы трансформированной под контролем ее владельца.

foreignNames.name: Nissa, vidente del Bosque Extenso
foreignNames.text: Cuando Nissa, vidente del Bosque Extenso entre al campo de batalla, puedes buscar en tu biblioteca una carta de bosque básica, mostrarla, ponerla en tu mano y luego barajar tu biblioteca.Siempre que una tierra entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, si controlas siete o más tierras, exilia a Nissa y luego regrésala al campo de batalla transformada bajo el control de su propietario.

cards.name: Nissa, Vastwood Seer
cards.originalText: When Nissa, Vastwood Seer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, exile Nissa, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

rulings.text: Nissa, Vastwood Seer is exiled as a result of her second triggered ability. If she enters the battlefield while you control seven or more lands, she won't automatically be exiled and transform.

Each face of a double-faced card has its own set of characteristics: name, types, subtypes, power and toughness, loyalty, abilities, and so on. While a double-faced card is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that’s currently up. The other set of characteristics is ignored. While a double-faced card isn’t on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of its front face.
The converted mana cost of a double-faced card not on the battlefield is the converted mana cost of its front face.

The back face of a double-faced card doesn’t have a mana cost. A double-faced permanent with its back face up has a converted mana cost of 0. Each back face has a color indicator that defines its color.
The back face of a double-faced card (in the case of Magic Origins, the planeswalker face) can’t be cast.

Although the two rules are similar, the “legend rule” and the “planeswalker uniqueness rule” affect different kinds of permanents. You can control two of this permanent, one front face-up and the other back-face up at the same time. However, if the former is exiled and enters the battlefield transformed, you’ll then control two planeswalkers with the same subtype. You’ll choose one to remain on the battlefield, and the other will be put into its owner’s graveyard.

A double-faced card enters the battlefield with its front face up by default, unless a spell or ability instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed, in which case it enters with its back face up.
A Magic Origins planeswalker that enters the battlefield because of the ability of its front face will enter with loyalty counters as normal.

In some rare cases, a spell or ability may cause one of these five cards to transform while it’s a creature (front face up) on the battlefield. If this happens, the resulting planeswalker won’t have any loyalty counters on it and will subsequently be put into its owner’s graveyard.

You can activate one of the planeswalker’s loyalty abilities the turn it enters the battlefield. However, you may do so only during one of your main phases when the stack is empty. For example, if the planeswalker enters the battlefield during combat, there will be an opportunity for your opponent to remove it before you can activate one of its abilities.

If a double-faced card is manifested, it will be put onto the battlefield face down (this is also true if it’s put onto the battlefield face down some other way). Note that “face down” is not synonymous with “with its back face up.” A manifested double-faced card is a 2/2 creature with no name, mana cost, creature types, or abilities. While face down, it can’t transform. If the front face of a manifested double-faced card is a creature card, you can turn it face up by paying its mana cost. If you do, its front face will be up. A double-faced card on the battlefield can’t be turned face down.

cards.name: Nissa, Sage Animist
cards.originalText: +1: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.−2: Put a legendary 4/4 green Elemental creature token named Ashaya, the Awoken World onto the battlefield.−7: Untap up to six target lands. They become 6/6 Elemental creatures. They're still lands.

rulings.text: You can activate Nissa, Sage Animist’s second ability even if you already control an Ashaya, the Awoken World. Just after the second token is created, you’ll choose one to remain on the battlefield. The other will be put into your graveyard and subsequently cease to exist.

If a land becomes a creature but hasn’t continuously been under its controller’s control since that player’s most recent turn began, it won’t be able to attack and its abilities with {T} in the cost (including mana abilities) won’t be able to be activated. In other words, look at how long the permanent itself has been under your control, not how long it’s been a creature.

cards.text:
+1: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
−2: Put a legendary 4/4 green Elemental creature token named Ashaya, the Awoken World onto the battlefield.
−7: Untap up to six target lands. They become 6/6 Elemental creatures. They're still lands.

foreignNames.name: 妮莎的朝圣
foreignNames.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本的树林牌，展示这些牌，然后将一张横置放进战场，其余的牌则置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。精熟咒语～如果你坟墓场中有两张或更多的瞬间和／或法术牌，则改为从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张基本的树林牌，而非两张。

foreignNames.name: 妮莎的朝聖
foreignNames.text: 從你的牌庫中搜尋至多兩張基本的樹林牌，展示這些牌，然後將一張橫置放進戰場，其餘的牌則置於你手上。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。精熟咒語～如果你墳墓場中有兩張或更多的瞬間和／或巫術牌，則改為從你的牌庫中搜尋至多三張基本的樹林牌，而非兩張。

foreignNames.name: Pèlerinage de Nissa
foreignNames.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque jusqu'à deux cartes de forêt de base, révélez ces cartes et mettez-en une sur le champ de bataille engagée, et le reste dans votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.Maîtrise de sort — S'il y a au moins deux cartes d'éphémère et/ou de rituel dans votre cimetière, cherchez dans votre bibliothèque jusqu'à trois cartes de forêt de base à la place de deux.

foreignNames.name: Nissas Pilgerreise
foreignNames.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach bis zu zwei Wald-Standardlandkarten, zeige sie offen vor, bringe eine davon getappt ins Spiel und nimm den Rest auf deine Hand. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.Zauberkunst — Falls sich zwei oder mehr Spontanzauber- und/oder Hexerei-Karten in deinem Friedhof befinden, durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach bis zu drei Wald-Standardlandkarten statt zwei.

foreignNames.name: Pellegrinaggio di Nissa
foreignNames.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per trovare fino a due carte Foresta base, rivelale, mettine una sul campo di battaglia TAPpata e aggiungi l'altra alla tua mano. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.Arte magica — Se nel tuo cimitero ci sono due o più carte istantaneo e/o stregoneria, passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per trovare fino a tre carte Foresta base invece di due.

foreignNames.name: ニッサの巡礼
foreignNames.text: あなたのライブラリーから基本森・カードを最大２枚まで探し、それらを公開し、１枚をタップ状態で戦場に出し、残りをあなたの手札に加える。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。魔巧 — あなたの墓地にインスタント・カードやソーサリー・カードが合わせて２枚以上あるなら、あなたのライブラリーから基本森・カードを最大２枚の代わりに最大３枚まで探す。

foreignNames.name: 니사의 순례
foreignNames.text: 당신의 서고에서 기본 숲 카드를 최대 두 장까지 찾아 공개한다. 그 중 한 장을 탭된 상태로 전장에 놓고 나머지 카드는 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.주문 숙련 — 당신의 무덤에 집중마법 그리고/또는 순간마법 카드가 두 장 이상 있다면, 당신의 서고에서 기본 숲 카드를 최대 두 장 대신 세 장까지 찾는다.

foreignNames.name: Peregrinação de Nissa
foreignNames.text: Procure até dois cards básicos de Floresta em seu grimório, revele-os e coloque um deles no campo de batalha virado e o restante na sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.Maestria em magia — Se houver dois ou mais cards de mágica instantânea ou feitiço no seu cemitério, procure até três cards básicos de Floresta, em vez de dois.

foreignNames.name: Паломничество Ниссы
foreignNames.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке не более двух карт базовых Лесов, покажите те карты и положите одну из них на поле битвы повернутой, а остальные — в вашу руку. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.Мастерство заклинаний — Если на вашем кладбище есть не менее двух карт мгновенных заклинаний и (или) волшебства, найдите в вашей библиотеке не более трех карт базовых Лесов вместо двух.

foreignNames.name: Peregrinación de Nissa
foreignNames.text: Busca en tu biblioteca hasta dos cartas de bosque básicas, muéstralas, pon una de ellas en el campo de batalla girada y el resto en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.Dominio de hechizos — Si hay dos o más cartas de instantáneo y/o de conjuro en tu cementerio, en vez de dos, busca en tu biblioteca hasta tres cartas de bosque básicas.

cards.name: Nissa's Pilgrimage
cards.originalText: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.

rulings.text: If you only find one basic Forest card, you’ll put it onto the battlefield tapped. You won’t be able to put it into your hand, even if you want to.
If the spell mastery ability applies, and you find three basic Forest cards, one of them will be put onto the battlefield tapped and two of them will be put into your hand.

Check to see if there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard as the spell resolves to determine whether the spell mastery ability applies. The spell itself won’t count because it’s still on the stack as you make this check.

cards.text:
Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.

cards.flavor: The evil inside the mountain pulsed at Nissa in a shock wave of madness.

foreignNames.name: 妮莎的启示
foreignNames.text: 占卜5，然后展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是生物牌，则你抓等同于其力量的牌，且获得等同于其防御力的生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 山中邪物用疯狂的震荡波冲击妮莎。

foreignNames.name: 妮莎的啟示
foreignNames.text: 占卜5，然後展示你的牌庫頂牌。如果該牌是生物牌，則你抽等同於其力量的牌，且獲得等同於其防禦力的生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 山中邪物用瘋狂的震盪波衝擊妮莎。

foreignNames.name: Révélation de Nissa
foreignNames.text: Regard 5, puis révélez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Si c'est une carte de créature, vous piochez un nombre de cartes égal à sa force et vous gagnez un nombre de points de vie égal à son endurance.
foreignNames.flavor: Le mal enfoui dans la montagne frappa Nissa comme une onde de choc de folie.

foreignNames.name: Nissas Offenbarung
foreignNames.text: Hellsicht 5, decke dann die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek auf. Falls es eine Kreaturenkarte ist, ziehst du Karten entsprechend ihrer Stärke und erhältst Lebenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Widerstandskraft dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: Das Böse im Inneren des Berges schlug Nissa wie eine Schockwelle des Wahnsinns entgegen.

foreignNames.name: Rivelazione di Nissa
foreignNames.text: Profetizza 5, poi rivela la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Se è una carta creatura, pesca un numero di carte pari alla sua forza e guadagni punti vita pari alla sua costituzione.
foreignNames.flavor: Il male racchiuso nella montagna pulsò alla presenza di Nissa, scatenando un'onda d'urto di follia.

foreignNames.name: ニッサの天啓
foreignNames.text: 占術５を行い、その後あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを公開する。それがクリーチャー・カードであるなら、あなたはそのカードのパワーに等しい枚数のカードを引き、それのタフネスに等しい点数のライフを得る。
foreignNames.flavor: 山の中に潜む邪悪は、狂気の衝撃波をニッサに向けて放った。

foreignNames.name: 니사의 계시
foreignNames.text: 점술 5를 한 후, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 공개한다. 공개한 카드가 생물 카드라면, 당신은 그 생물의 공격력만큼의 카드를 뽑고 그 생물의 방어력만큼의 생명점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 산에 잠들어 있던 악의 존재가 니사 쪽으로 광기를 폭발시켰다.

foreignNames.name: Revelação de Nissa
foreignNames.text: Use vidência 5 e depois revele o card do topo do seu grimório. Se for um card de criatura, você compra uma quantidade de cards equivalente ao seu poder e ganha pontos de vida equivalentes à sua resistência.
foreignNames.flavor: O mal no interior da montanha golpeou Nissa com uma onda de loucura.

foreignNames.name: Откровение Ниссы
foreignNames.text: Предскажите 5, затем покажите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Если это карта существа, вы берете количество карт, равное ее силе, и получаете количество жизней, равное ее выносливости.
foreignNames.flavor: Зло, сокрытое в горе, выплеснулось на Ниссу волной безумия.

foreignNames.name: Revelación de Nissa
foreignNames.text: Adivina 5, luego muestra la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Si es una carta de criatura, robas una cantidad de cartas igual a su fuerza y ganas una cantidad de vidas igual a su resistencia.
foreignNames.flavor: La maldad que albergaba la montaña alcanzó a Nissa con los latidos de una onda de locura.

cards.name: Nissa's Revelation
cards.originalText: Scry 5, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you draw cards equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

rulings.text: If the top card of your library isn’t a creature card or it’s a creature card with power 0 or less, you won’t draw any cards. Otherwise, the first card you draw will be the card you revealed.

cards.text: Scry 5, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you draw cards equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

cards.flavor: "Pick not the rotten fruit, but neither touch the best. Leave those as an offering for our unseen guests."—Radwick, farmer of Gatstaf

foreignNames.name: 果园精怪
foreignNames.text: 只有具飞行或延势异能的生物才能阻挡果园精怪。
foreignNames.flavor: 「别挑中烂果子，也别碰最好的。那些该留着奉献给我们看不见的客人。」～卡兹特农夫列维

foreignNames.name: 果園精靈
foreignNames.text: 只有具飛行或延勢異能的生物才能阻擋果園精靈。
foreignNames.flavor: 「別挑中爛果子，也別碰最好的。那些該留著奉獻給我們看不見的客人。」～卡茲特農夫列維

foreignNames.name: Esprit du verger
foreignNames.text: L'Esprit du verger ne peut pas être bloqué excepté par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ne ramassez pas les fruits pourris, mais ne touchez pas non plus aux plus beaux. Ce sont nos offrandes à nos invités invisibles. »—Radwick, fermier de Gatstaf

foreignNames.name: Geist des Obsthains
foreignNames.text: Der Geist des Obsthains kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.
foreignNames.flavor: „Pflücke weder die faulen Früchte noch die besten. Lasse sie als Gabe für unsere unsichtbaren Gäste zurück."—Radwick, Bauer aus Gatztow

foreignNames.name: Spirito del Frutteto
foreignNames.text: Lo Spirito del Frutteto non può essere bloccato tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non cogliere la frutta marcia, ma la migliore non toccare. Lasciala per gli ospiti invisibili che la vengono a mangiare."—Radwick, contadino di Gatstaf

foreignNames.name: 果樹園の霊魂
foreignNames.text: 果樹園の霊魂は、飛行か到達を持つクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。
foreignNames.flavor: 「腐った果物は摘んじゃならんし、熟しとるのも触っちゃならん。見えん客への捧げ物として残しておくがええ。」——ガツタフの農夫、ラドウィック

foreignNames.name: 과수원 신령
foreignNames.text: 과수원 신령은 비행이나 대공을 가진 생물에만 방어될 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: "썩은 과일은 따지 마. 제일 좋은 과일에도 손대지 말고. 그것들은 보이지 않는 손님들에게 바치는 거야."—갓스타프의 농부 라드윅

foreignNames.name: Espírito do Pomar
foreignNames.text: Espírito do Pomar só pode ser bloqueado por criaturas com voar ou alcance.
foreignNames.flavor: "Não colha a fruta podre, tampouco a madura. Que sejam oferendas aos nossos hóspedes, invisíveis criaturas.— Radwick, fazendeiro de Gatstaf

foreignNames.name: Дух Фруктового Сада
foreignNames.text: Дух Фруктового Сада может быть заблокирован только существом с Полетом или Захватом.
foreignNames.flavor: «Не собирай гнилые плоды, но и самые лучшие не трогай. Оставь их как приношение нашим невидимым гостям».— Радвик, фермер из Гастафа

foreignNames.name: Espíritu del huerto
foreignNames.text: La Espíritu del huerto no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.
foreignNames.flavor: "No tomes la fruta podrida, pero tampoco tomes la mejor. Esas déjalas como una ofrenda para nuestros invitados invisibles".—Radwick, granjero de Gatstaf

cards.name: Outland Colossus
cards.originalText: Renown 6 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put six +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)Outland Colossus can't be blocked by more than one creature.

rulings.text: Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.

cards.name: Rhox Maulers
cards.originalText: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)

rulings.text: Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.

foreignNames.flavor: 얼룩떼 늑대는 단지 숫자가 많아서 무서운 것이 아니다. 이들이 무리를 지으면 보이지 않는 힘이 이들을 강화한다.

cards.name: Undercity Troll
cards.originalText: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.){2}{G}: Regenerate Undercity Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

rulings.text: Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.

cards.name: Wild Instincts
cards.originalText: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

rulings.text: You must target both a creature you control and a creature an opponent controls to cast Wild Instincts.

If the creature an opponent controls is an illegal target as Wild Instincts tries to resolve, but the creature you control is still a legal target, the creature you control will get +2/+2, but the creatures won’t fight. Neither creature will deal or be dealt damage during the resolution of Wild Instincts.

cards.name: Citadel Castellan
cards.originalText: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)

rulings.text: Renown won’t trigger when a creature deals combat damage to a planeswalker or another creature. It also won’t trigger when a creature deals noncombat damage to a player.
If a creature with renown deals combat damage to its controller because that damage was redirected, renown will trigger.

If a renown ability triggers, but the creature leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, the creature doesn’t become renowned. Any ability that triggers “whenever a creature becomes renowned” won’t trigger.

cards.name: Alhammarret's Archive
cards.originalText: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead.

rulings.text: If an effect would set your life total to a specific number that’s higher than your current life total, that effect would cause you to gain life equal to the difference. Alhammarret’s Archive will then double the amount of life that effect would cause you to gain. For example, if you have 3 life and an effect says that your life total “becomes 10,” your life total will actually become 17.
If two or more replacement effects would apply to a card-drawing event, the player drawing the card chooses the order in which to apply them.

Because Alhammarret’s Archive is legendary, it’s unlikely that one player will control two. However, if that happens, life gained by that player will be multiplied by four. Three Archives will multiply that life gain by eight, and so on.
Similarly, the effects of the last abilities of multiple Archives are cumulative. If you control two, you’ll draw four times the number of cards, and so on.

In a Two-Headed Giant game, only the controller of Alhammarret’s Archive is affected by it. If that player’s teammate gains life, Alhammarret’s Archive will have no effect, even when that life gain is applied to the team’s shared life total.

cards.text:

cards.name: Angel's Tomb
cards.originalText: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Angel's Tomb become a 3/3 white Angel artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: If Angel’s Tomb is already a creature when a creature enters the battlefield under your control, its ability will override any effects that set its base power and toughness to specific values, but other changes to its power and toughness (such as the one created by Titanic Growth) will still apply.

Effects setting Angel’s Tomb’s base power and toughness to specific values that begin to apply after Angel’s Tomb has become a creature will override the effect of Angel’s Tomb. For example, if an effect causes a 3/3 Angel’s Tomb to become 0/1, it will remain 0/1 until another effect (such as triggering the ability of Angel’s Tomb a second time or targeting it with Titanic Growth) causes those values to change.

cards.name: Bonded Construct
cards.originalText: Bonded Construct can't attack alone.

rulings.text: Bonded Construct can be declared as an attacker only if another creature is declared as an attacker at the same time.
If you control more than one creature that can’t attack alone, they can attack together, even if no other creatures attack.

Although Bonded Construct can’t attack alone, other attacking creatures don’t have to attack the same player or planeswalker. For example, Bonded Construct could attack an opponent and another creature could attack a planeswalker that opponent controls.
If a creature that can’t attack alone also must attack if able, its controller must attack with it and another creature if able.

In a Two-Headed Giant game (or in another format using the shared team turns option), Bonded Construct can attack with a creature controlled by your teammate, even if no other creatures you control attack.

foreignNames.name: 邁勒提斯守護者

cards.name: Hangarback Walker
cards.originalText: Hangarback Walker enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.When Hangarback Walker dies, put a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker.{1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker.

rulings.text: The value of each X in Hangarback Walker’s mana cost must be equal. For example, if X is 2, you’ll pay {4} to cast Hangarback Walker and it will enter the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

If enough -1/-1 counters are put on Hangarback Walker at the same time to make its toughness 0 or less, the number of +1/+1 counters on it before it got any -1/-1 counters will be used to determine how many Thopter tokens you get. For example, if there are three +1/+1 counters on Hangarback Walker and it gets four -1/-1 counters, you’ll get three Thopter tokens. That’s because Hangarback Walker’s triggered ability checks the creature’s existence just before it leaves the battlefield, and it still has all those counters on it at that point.

cards.name: Orbs of Warding
cards.originalText: You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)If a creature would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

rulings.text: As long as you have hexproof, your opponents can’t target you with spells that deal damage or abilities that cause their sources to deal damage, even if they intend to redirect the damage to a planeswalker you control.

Orbs of Warding won’t prevent damage dealt by creatures to a planeswalker you control. However, if a creature controlled by an opponent would deal noncombat damage to you, you can apply Orbs of Warding’s effect to prevent 1 of that damage before your opponent chooses whether to redirect that damage to a planeswalker you control.
The damage prevention effects of multiple Orbs of Warding are cumulative.

cards.name: Pyromancer's Goggles
cards.originalText: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. When that mana is spent to cast a red instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

rulings.text: The mana produced by Pyromancer’s Goggles can be spent on anything, not just a red instant or sorcery spell.
Any red instant or sorcery spell you spend the mana on will be copied, not just one that requires targets.
The delayed triggered ability will trigger whether Pyromancer’s Goggles is still on the battlefield or not.

If more than one red mana produced by a Pyromancer’s Goggles is spent to cast a single red instant or sorcery spell, the delayed triggered ability associated with each mana spent will trigger. That many copies will be created. It doesn’t matter if this red mana was produced by one Pyromancer’s Goggles or by multiple Pyromancer’s Goggles.

If a copy is created, you control the copy. That copy is created on the stack, so it’s not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won’t trigger. The copy will then resolve like a normal spell, after players get a chance to cast spells and activate abilities.

The copy will have the same targets as the spell it’s copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, you can’t choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).
If the copied spell is modal (that is, it says “Choose one –” or the like), the copy will have the same mode. You can’t choose a different one.
If the copied spell has an X whose value was determined as it was cast, the copy has the same value of X.

You can’t choose to pay any additional costs for the copy. However, effects based on any additional costs that were paid for the original spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy too. For example, if you sacrifice a 3/3 creature to cast Fling, and you copy it, the copy of Fling will also deal 3 damage to its target.

If the copy says that it affects “you,” it affects the controller of the copy, not the controller of the original spell. Similarly, if the copy says that it affects an “opponent,” it affects an opponent of the copy’s controller, not an opponent of the original spell’s controller.

cards.name: Sigil of Valor
cards.originalText: Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control.Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: Count the number of creatures you control other than the equipped creature as Sigil of Valor’s ability resolves to determine the amount of the bonus. Once the ability resolves, the bonus won’t change, even if the number of creatures you control does.

A creature attacks alone if it’s the only creature declared as an attacker during the declare attackers step (including creatures controlled by your teammates, if applicable). For example, Sigil of Valor’s ability won’t trigger if you attack with multiple creatures and all but one of them are removed from combat.

cards.originalText: Equipped creature gets +2/+0.Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may sacrifice Throwing Knife. If you do, Throwing Knife deals 2 damage to target creature or player.Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

rulings.text: Throwing Knife’s triggered ability triggers before blockers are declared. If you use the ability and destroy the targeted creature with lethal damage, it won’t be on the battlefield to block.

Throwing Knife is the source of the damage dealt because of its triggered ability. For example, you could sacrifice Throwing Knife to deal 2 damage to a creature with protection from red, even if Throwing Knife is equipped to a red creature.

foreignNames.flavor: Sein Hall dröhnt in den Ohren der Krieger, schlägt mit ihren Herzen und stampft mit ihren Schritten, wenn sie in den Kampf ziehen.

foreignNames.flavor: Il riverbero scorre nelle vene dei guerrieri, pulsa con i loro cuori e scalpita con i loro passi mentre si lanciano in battaglia.

foreignNames.flavor: その残響は戦いに向かって突撃する戦士たちの血管を駆け巡り、彼らの心臓の脈拍に合わせて脈動し、足踏みに合わせて鼓動する。

foreignNames.flavor: As vibrações correm pelas veias dos guerreiros, retumbando com seus corações e batendo com seus passos enquanto rumam à batalha.

cards.flavor: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，牺牲成形野地：从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，并将之横置放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 若没有文明的干预，自然将始终按照它自己的需求塑造自身。

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，犧牲成形野地：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，並將之橫置放進戰場。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 若沒有文明的干預，自然將始終按照它自己的需求塑造自身。

foreignNames.name: Étendues sauvages en évolution
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifiez les Étendues sauvages en évolution : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base et mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: Sans interférence de la civilisation, la nature s'adapte toujours à ses propres besoins.

foreignNames.name: Sich entfaltende Wildnis
foreignNames.text: {T}, opfere die Sich entfaltende Wildnis: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte und bringe sie getappt ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: Ohne den störenden Einfluss der Zivilisation wird sich die Natur immer nach dem eigenen Bedarf formen.

foreignNames.name: Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifica le Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base e mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: Senza la presenza invasiva della civiltà, la natura plasmerà se stessa a seconda dei propri bisogni.

foreignNames.name: 進化する未開地
foreignNames.text: {T}, 進化する未開地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カードを１枚探し、それをタップ状態で戦場に出す。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 文明の手による介入がなければ、自然は必ずその必要に応じて自らを変容させる。

foreignNames.name: 진화하는 야생지
foreignNames.text: {T}, 진화하는 야생지를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아 탭된 채로 전장에 놓는다. 그런 다음 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 자연은 문명의 손을 빌리지 않아도 언제나 환경에 맞게 변화를 거듭한다.

foreignNames.name: Terras em Desenvolvimento
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifique Terras em Desenvolvimento: Procure um card de terreno básico em seu grimório e coloque-o no campo de batalha virado. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: Sem a interferência das mãos da civilização, a natureza sempre se moldará às próprias necessidades.

foreignNames.name: Перерождающиеся Дебри
foreignNames.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Перерождающиеся Дебри: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли и положите ее на поле битвы повернутой. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Без вмешательства цивилизации природа сама изменяет себя, подстраиваясь под свои нужды.

foreignNames.name: Terrenos expansivos
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrificar los Terrenos expansivos: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica y ponla en el campo de batalla girada. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Sin las entrometidas manos de la civilización, la naturaleza siempre se moldeará según sus propias necesidades.

cards.flavor: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

foreignNames.name: 浪客小径
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。{4}，{T}：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 这谣言很快在小偷之间传开：有座无墙的迷宫，藏有价值无可计量的宝藏。

foreignNames.name: 浪客小徑
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{1}到你的魔法力池中。{4}，{T}：目標生物本回合不能被阻擋。
foreignNames.flavor: 這謠言很快在小偷之間傳開：有座無牆的迷宮，藏有價值無可計量的寶藏。

foreignNames.name: Passage des malandrins
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez {1} à votre réserve.{4}, {T} : La créature ciblée ne peut pas être bloquée ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: La rumeur d'un labyrinthe sans parois et d'un trésor inestimable se répandit rapidement chez les malandrins.

foreignNames.name: Schleichweg der Diebe
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {1}.{4}, {T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl kann in diesem Zug nicht geblockt werden.
foreignNames.flavor: Unter den Dieben verbreiteten sich rasch Gerüchte von einem Labyrinth ohne Mauern und einem Schatz von unermesslichem Wert.

foreignNames.name: Passaggio dei Farabutti
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi {1} alla tua riserva di mana.{4}, {T}: Una creatura bersaglio non può essere bloccata in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Tra i ladri si diffusero rapidamente voci che parlavano di un labirinto senza muri e di un bottino oltre ogni immaginazione.

foreignNames.name: ならず者の道
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{1}を加える。{4}, {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それはブロックされない。
foreignNames.flavor: 泥棒達の間では、想像を絶する宝が眠る壁のない迷宮についての噂が瞬く間に広まった。

foreignNames.name: 도적의 비밀통로
foreignNames.text: {T}: {1}을 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.{4}, {T}: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 이 턴에 방어될 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: 벽이 없는 미궁, 그리고 그 안에 있는 가치를 형언할 수 없는 보물에 대한 소문이 도둑들 사이에서 빠르게 퍼져 나갔다.

foreignNames.name: Passagem do Ladino
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione {1} à sua reserva de mana.{4}, {T}: A criatura alvo não pode ser bloqueada neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Os boatos sobre um labirinto sem paredes com um prêmio incalculável se espalharam rapidamente entre os ladrões.

foreignNames.name: Разбойничий Проход
foreignNames.text: {T}: добавьте {1} в ваше хранилище маны.{4}, {T}: целевое существо не может быть заблокировано в этом ходу.
foreignNames.flavor: Среди воров быстро распространились слухи о лабиринте без стен, скрывающем сокровище невообразимой ценности.

foreignNames.name: Pasaje del bribón
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {1} a tu reserva de maná.{4}, {T}: La criatura objetivo no puede ser bloqueada este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Entre los ladrones se extendió enseguida el rumor de un laberinto sin muros y de un premio más allá de todas las expectativas de riqueza.

foreignNames.name: 庇护天使
foreignNames.text: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）当庇护天使进战场时，于你操控庇护天使的时段内，另一个目标永久物获得不灭异能。（注明「消灭」的效应不会消灭它。伤害无法消灭具不灭异能的生物。）

foreignNames.name: 庇護天使
foreignNames.text: 飛行（此生物只能被具飛行或延勢異能的生物阻擋。）當庇護天使進戰場時，於你操控庇護天使的時段內，另一個目標永久物獲得不滅異能。（註明「消滅」的效應不會消滅它。傷害無法消滅具不滅異能的生物。）

foreignNames.name: Ange de l'égide
foreignNames.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)Quand l'Ange de l'égide arrive sur le champ de bataille, un autre permanent ciblé acquiert l'indestructible tant que vous contrôlez l'Ange de l'égide. (Les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne détruisent pas ce permanent. Une créature avec l'indestructible ne peut pas être détruite par des blessures.)

foreignNames.name: Behütender Engel
foreignNames.text: Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)Wenn der Behütende Engel ins Spiel kommt, erhält eine andere bleibende Karte deiner Wahl solange Unzerstörbarkeit, wie du den Behütenden Engel kontrollierst. (Effekte, die „zerstören", zerstören sie nicht. Eine Kreatur mit Unzerstörbarkeit kann nicht von Schaden zerstört werden.)

foreignNames.name: Angelo dell'Egida
foreignNames.text: Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)Quando l'Angelo dell'Egida entra nel campo di battaglia, un altro permanente bersaglio ha indistruttibile fintanto che controlli l'Angelo dell'Egida. (Gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non lo distruggono. Una creatura con indistruttibile non può essere distrutta dal danno.)

foreignNames.name: 神盾の天使
foreignNames.text: 飛行（このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。）神盾の天使が戦場に出たとき、他のパーマネント１つを対象とする。あなたが神盾の天使をコントロールし続けているかぎり、それは破壊不能を得る。（「破壊する」効果では、それは破壊されない。破壊不能を持つクリーチャーはダメージによって破壊されない。）

foreignNames.name: 보호의 천사
foreignNames.text: 비행 (이 생물은 비행이나 대공을 가진 생물에게만 방어될 수 있다.)보호의 천사가 전장에 들어올 때, 다른 지속물을 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물은 당신이 보호의 천사를 조종하는 한 무적을 얻는다. ("파괴"라고 명시된 효과로 파괴되지 않는다. 무적을 가진 생물은 피해를 입어 파괴될 수 없다.)

foreignNames.name: Anjo da Égide
foreignNames.text: Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com voar ou alcance.)Quando Anjo da Égide entrar no campo de batalha, outra permanente alvo ganhará indestrutível enquanto você controlar Anjo da Égide. (Os efeitos que dizem "destrua" não a destroem. Uma criatura com indestrutível não pode ser destruída por dano.)

foreignNames.name: Ангел Эгиды
foreignNames.text: Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существами с Полетом или Захватом.)Когда Ангел Эгиды выходит на поле битвы, другой целевой перманент получает Неразрушимость, пока вы контролируете Ангела Эгиды. (Эффекты с указанием «уничтожьте» не уничтожают его. Существо с Неразрушимостью нельзя уничтожить повреждениями.)

foreignNames.name: Ángel de la égida
foreignNames.text: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)Cuando el Ángel de la égida entre al campo de batalla, otro permanente objetivo gana la habilidad de indestructible mientras controles el Ángel de la égida. (Los efectos que dicen "destruye" no lo destruyen. Una criatura con la habilidad de indestructible no puede ser destruida por daño.)

cards.name: Aegis Angel
cards.originalText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

rulings.text: If Aegis Angel leaves the battlefield, you no longer control it.
If Aegis Angel and the permanent would be destroyed simultaneously, only Aegis Angel will be destroyed.
If another player gains control of Aegis Angel, the permanent will no longer have indestructible, even if you regain control of Aegis Angel.

cards.text:

When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

foreignNames.flavor: "Culpable".

cards.name: Divine Verdict
cards.originalText: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

rulings.text: An "attacking creature" is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.

A "blocking creature" is one that has been declared as a blocker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield blocking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be a blocking creature through the end of combat step, even if the creature or creatures it was blocking are no longer on the battlefield or have otherwise left combat.
Destroying a blocking creature won't cause any of the creatures it was blocking to become unblocked. They won't deal combat damage to the defending player or planeswalker (unless they have trample).

cards.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

—Kanlos, Akroan captain

foreignNames.name: Aquila della Guardia

foreignNames.name: 警備隊の鷲
foreignNames.text: 飛行（このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。）警戒（このクリーチャーは攻撃してもタップしない。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「数マイル先からも、我々の鷲が円を描いている姿が見えた。故郷が我々を必要としていることを理解したからだ。」——アクロスの隊長、カンロス

foreignNames.name: 경비대 독수리
foreignNames.text: 비행 (이 생물은 비행이나 대공을 가진 생물에게만 방어될 수 있다.)경계 (이 생물은 공격하면서 탭되지 않는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: '멀리서도 우리 독수리들이 선회하는 걸 볼 수 있었다. 그걸 보고 고향이 위험에 처했다는 걸 알았다."—아크로스 대장 칸로스

foreignNames.name: Águia da Vigia
foreignNames.text: Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com voar ou alcance.)Vigilância (Atacar não faz com que esta criatura seja virada.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Pude ver nossas águias circulando mesmo a quilômetros de distância. Foi quando eu soube que estavam precisando de nós em casa."— Kanlos, capitão acrosano

foreignNames.name: Сторожевой Орел
foreignNames.text: Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существами с Полетом или Захватом.)Бдительность (Атакуя, это существо не поворачивается.)
foreignNames.flavor: «Я еще издали заметил, как кружат наши орлы. Тогда я понял, что мы были нужны дома».— Канл, акросский капитан

foreignNames.name: Águila de la Guardia
foreignNames.text: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)Vigilancia. (Esta criatura no se gira al atacar.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Vi a nuestras águilas volar en círculos a varios estadios de distancia. Así fue como supe que nos necesitaban en casa".—Kanlos, capitán akroniense

cards.name: Eagle of the Watch
cards.originalText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.text: Flying, vigilance

cards.flavor: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

foreignNames.name: 撒拉天使
foreignNames.text: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）警戒（此生物攻击时不需横置。）
foreignNames.flavor: 跟随明光。若置身黑暗，就跟随她。

foreignNames.name: 撒拉天使
foreignNames.text: 飛行（此生物只能被具飛行或延勢異能的生物阻擋。）警戒（此生物攻擊時不需橫置。）
foreignNames.flavor: 跟隨明光。若置身黑暗，就跟隨她。

foreignNames.name: Ange de Serra
foreignNames.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)Vigilance (Attaquer avec cette créature ne la fait pas s'engager.)
foreignNames.flavor: Suivez la lumière. En son absence, suivez-la.

foreignNames.name: Serra-Engel
foreignNames.text: Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)Wachsamkeit (Diese Kreatur wird beim Angreifen nicht getappt.)
foreignNames.flavor: Folge dem Licht. Falls kein Licht da ist, folge ihr.

foreignNames.name: Angelo di Serra
foreignNames.text: Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)Cautela (Questa creatura attacca senza TAPpare.)
foreignNames.flavor: Segui la luce. In sua assenza, segui lei.

foreignNames.name: セラの天使
foreignNames.text: 飛行（このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。）警戒（このクリーチャーは攻撃してもタップしない。）
foreignNames.flavor: 光に従え。光無くば、彼女に従え。

foreignNames.name: 세라 천사
foreignNames.text: 비행 (이 생물은 비행이나 대공을 가진 생물에게만 방어될 수 있다.)경계 (이 생물은 공격하면서 탭되지 않는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 빛을 따라가라. 빛이 없다면 그녀를 따라가라.

foreignNames.name: Anjo Serra
foreignNames.text: Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com voar ou alcance.)Vigilância (Atacar não faz com que esta criatura seja virada.)
foreignNames.flavor: Siga a luz. Em sua ausência, siga ela.

foreignNames.name: Ангел Серры
foreignNames.text: Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существами с Полетом или Захватом.)Бдительность (Атакуя, это существо не поворачивается.)
foreignNames.flavor: Иди на свет. Если же света нет, иди за ней.

foreignNames.name: Ángel de Serra
foreignNames.text: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)Vigilancia. (Esta criatura no se gira al atacar.)
foreignNames.flavor: Sigue la luz. Si no hay luz, síguela a ella.

cards.name: Serra Angel
cards.originalText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.flavor:
"The cathars have their swords, the inquisitors their axes. I prefer the ‘diplomatic' approach."
—Terhold, archmage of Drunau

foreignNames.name: 驱入虚空
foreignNames.text: 将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「护教军有剑，审判官有斧。我偏好『外交』手段。」～杜瑙大法师忒候

foreignNames.name: 驅入虛空
foreignNames.text: 將至多兩個目標生物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「護教軍有劍，審判官有斧。我偏好『外交』手段。」～杜瑙大法師忒候

foreignNames.name: Vers le néant
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez jusqu'à deux créatures ciblées dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.
foreignNames.flavor: « Les cathares ont leur épée, les inquisiteurs leur hache. Je préfère quant à moi l'approche… diplomatique. »—Terhold, archimage de Drunaü

foreignNames.name: In die Leere
foreignNames.text: Bringe bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Katharer haben ihre Schwerter, die Inquisitoren ihre Äxte. Ich bevorzuge den ‚diplomatischen‘ Ansatz."—Therhold, Erzmagier von Durnau

foreignNames.name: Nel Vuoto
foreignNames.text: Fai tornare fino a due creature bersaglio in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.
foreignNames.flavor: "I catari brandiscono le spade, gli inquisitori impugnano le asce. Io preferisco un approccio più... diplomatico."—Terhold, arcimago di Drunau

foreignNames.name: 虚空への突入
foreignNames.text: クリーチャーを最大２体まで対象とし、それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「聖戦士には剣が、審問官には斧がある。だがわしは『外交的』な手段を望んでおる。」——ドルナウの大魔導師、ターホールド

foreignNames.name: 심연 속으로
foreignNames.text: 최대 두 개까지의 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물들을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: "카타르들은 칼을, 이단심문관들은 도끼를 사용하지. 난 '외교적인' 접근 방식을 선호해."—드루나우의 대마법사 테르홀드

foreignNames.name: Ao Vácuo
foreignNames.text: Devolva até duas criaturas alvo para as mãos de seus donos.
foreignNames.flavor: "Os cátaros têm suas espadas; os inquisidores, seus machados. Eu prefiro a abordagem ‘diplomática'."— Terhold, arquimago de Drunau

foreignNames.name: Навстречу Пустоте
foreignNames.text: Верните не более двух целевых существ в руки их владельцев.
foreignNames.flavor: «Катары сражаются мечами, инквизиторы — топорами. Я же предпочитаю... дипломатический подход».— Терхольд, архимаг Друнау

foreignNames.name: Empujar al vacío
foreignNames.text: Regresa hasta dos criaturas objetivo a las manos de sus propietarios.
foreignNames.flavor: "Los cátaros tienen espadas, y los inquisidores, hachas. Yo prefiero el enfoque ‘diplomático'".—Terhold, archimago de Drunau

cards.name: Into the Void
cards.originalText: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
cards.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

cards.flavor: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

foreignNames.name: 神灯巨灵
foreignNames.text: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）
foreignNames.flavor: 神灯巨灵乘着风的翅膀，拥有大气精怪中的高贵血统。他是诡计与误导的专家，不论身处赌场或战场都是一等高手。

foreignNames.name: 神燈巨靈
foreignNames.text: 飛行 （此生物只能被具飛行或延勢異能的生物阻擋。）
foreignNames.flavor: 神燈巨靈乘著風的翅膀，擁有大氣精靈中的高貴血統。他是詭計與誤導的專家，不論身處賭場或戰場都是一等高手。

foreignNames.name: Djinn mahâmot
foreignNames.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)
foreignNames.flavor: Noble d'entre les plus nobles esprits de l'air, le djinn mahâmot voyage sur les ailes du vent. Maître de la ruse et du mensonge, il est aussi redoutable au jeu que sur le champ de bataille.

foreignNames.name: Mahamoti-Dschinn
foreignNames.text: Fliegend (Diese Kreatur kann außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.)
foreignNames.flavor: Als König der Geister der Lüfte reitet der Mahamoti-Dschinn auf den Flügeln der Winde. Im Kampf und im Spiel ist er ein gefährlicher Gegner, und zudem ein Meister der Täuschung.

foreignNames.name: Genio Mahamoti
foreignNames.text: Volare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.)
foreignNames.flavor: Di sangue nobile tra gli spiriti dell'aria, il genio Mahamoti cavalca sulle ali del vento. Pericoloso nelle sale da gioco come in battaglia, è un maestro degli inganni e delle truffe.

foreignNames.name: マハモティ・ジン
foreignNames.text: 飛行（このクリーチャーは飛行や到達を持たないクリーチャーによってはブロックされない。）
foreignNames.flavor: マハモティ・ジンは大気の精霊たちの中でも高貴な血筋につながり、風の翼で空を駆ける。彼は計略と詐術の名手であり、戦場はもちろん、賭博場においても危険な存在となる。

foreignNames.name: 마하모티 지니
foreignNames.text: 비행 (이 생물은 비행이나 대공을 가진 생물에게만 방어될 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 공기의 신령 중에서도 왕족에 속하는 마하모티 지니는 바람을 타고 난다. 속임수와 책략에 능한 마하모티 지니는 전장에서나 도박장에서나 똑같이 두려운 상대다.

foreignNames.name: Gênio Mahamoti
foreignNames.text: Voar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas com voar ou alcance.
foreignNames.flavor: O gênio Mahamoti, um espírito do ar com sangue real, cavalga nas asas do vento. Ele é tão perigoso no salão de apostas quanto na batalha, pois é mestre em truques e enganação.

foreignNames.name: Джинн Магамоти
foreignNames.text: Полет (Это существо может быть заблокировано только существами с Полетом или Захватом.)
foreignNames.flavor: Джинн Магамоти, дух воздуха королевских кровей, парит на крыльях ветра. Он одинаково опасен как в азартной игре, так и в битве. Никто лучше него не умеет обманывать и сбивать с пути.

foreignNames.name: Djinn Mahamoti
foreignNames.text: Vuela. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas que tengan la habilidad de volar o alcance.)
foreignNames.flavor: De sangre real entre los espíritus del aire, el djinn Mahamoti cabalga sobre las alas de los vientos. Es tan peligroso en el salón de juego como en batalla, y es un maestro del engaño y la información errónea.

cards.name: Mahamoti Djinn
cards.originalText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

cards.flavor: Destiny is a flickering path among tangled possibilities.

foreignNames.name: 编纺命运
foreignNames.text: 抓两张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 命运就是错综复杂的可能性中变幻莫测的道路。

foreignNames.name: 編紡命運
foreignNames.text: 抽兩張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 命運就是錯綜複雜的可能性中變幻莫測的道路。

foreignNames.name: Tissage du destin
foreignNames.text: Piochez deux cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: Le destin est une voie discontinue dans l'enchevêtrement des possibilités.

foreignNames.name: Schicksal weben
foreignNames.text: Ziehe zwei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: Das Schicksal ist ein flimmernder Pfad inmitten verworrener Möglichkeiten.

foreignNames.name: Tessere il Destino
foreignNames.text: Pesca due carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Il destino è un sentiero effimero nell'intreccio delle possibilità.

foreignNames.name: 運命編み
foreignNames.text: カードを２枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 運命とは絡み合った可能性の中にちらつく道である。

foreignNames.name: 운명 짜기
foreignNames.text: 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 운명은 뒤얽힌 미로 속에서 홀로 반짝이는 길이다.

foreignNames.name: Tecer Destino
foreignNames.text: Compre dois cards.
foreignNames.flavor: O destino é um caminho tremulante dentre as possibilidades entrelaçadas.

foreignNames.name: Плетение Судьбы
foreignNames.text: Возьмите две карты.
foreignNames.flavor: Судьба — это еле заметная тропинка среди переплетений вероятностей.

foreignNames.name: Tejer el destino
foreignNames.text: Roba dos cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: El destino es un camino titilante entre posibilidades enmarañadas.

cards.name: Weave Fate
cards.originalText: Draw two cards.
cards.text: Draw two cards.

cards.flavor:
"Another day. Another avenging angel. Another clump of feathers to toss in the trash."
—Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: 肉身化尘
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标生物。它不能重生。
foreignNames.flavor: 「又是一天。又来一个天使要复仇，又多一团羽毛得扔掉。」～莉莲娜维斯

foreignNames.name: 肉身化塵
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標生物。它不能重生。
foreignNames.flavor: 「又是一天，又來一個天使要復仇，又多一團羽毛得扔掉。」～莉蓮娜維斯

foreignNames.name: Chair en poussière
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature ciblée. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée.
foreignNames.flavor: « Un nouveau jour. Un nouvel ange vengeur. Un nouveau tas de plumes à jeter aux ordures. »—Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Fleisch zu Staub
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ein weiterer Tag. Ein weiterer rächender Engel. Ein weiterer Klumpen Federn zum Entsorgen."—Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Polverizzare la Carne
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio. Non può essere rigenerata.
foreignNames.flavor: "Un altro giorno. Un altro angelo vendicatore. Un altro pugno di piume da gettare tra i rifiuti."—Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: 肉は塵に
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。それは再生できない。
foreignNames.flavor: 「新たな日。新たな復讐する天使。新たな羽根の塊がゴミ箱へ。」——リリアナ・ヴェス

foreignNames.name: 살을 먼지로
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다. 그 생물은 재생될 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: "흥, 복수의 천사가 또 납시었군. 지겨운 녀석들이야. 그래봐야 깃털 더미로 변하겠지만."—릴리아나 베스

foreignNames.name: Da Carne ao Pó
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo. Ela não pode ser regenerada.
foreignNames.flavor: "Mais um dia. Mais um anjo vingador. Mais um amontoado de penas para jogar no lixo."— Liliana Vess

foreignNames.name: Плоть в Прах
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо. Оно не может быть регенерировано.
foreignNames.flavor: «Очередной день. Очередной мстящий ангел. Очередная груда перьев отправляется в выгребную яму».— Лилиана Весс

foreignNames.name: De la carne al polvo
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo. No puede ser regenerada.
foreignNames.flavor: "Un día más, un ángel vengador más. Un montón de plumas más que irán a la basura".—Liliana Vess

cards.name: Flesh to Dust
cards.originalText: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor:
"It saddens me to lose a source of inspiration. This one seemed especially promising."
—Ashiok

foreignNames.name: 心之衰
foreignNames.text: 目标牌手弃两张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「失去灵感的源泉，令我非常难过。尤其是这一个看上去大有可为。」～安梭苛

foreignNames.name: 心之衰
foreignNames.text: 目標玩家棄兩張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「失去靈感的源泉，令我非常難過。尤其是這一個看上去大有可為。」～安梭苛

foreignNames.name: Pourrissement cérébral
foreignNames.text: Le joueur ciblé se défausse de deux cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: « Quelle tristesse de voir disparaître une source d'inspiration. D'autant que celle-ci paraissait très prometteuse. »—Ashiok

foreignNames.name: Gedankenzersetzung
foreignNames.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl wirft zwei Karten ab.
foreignNames.flavor: „Es macht mich traurig, eine Quelle der Inspiration zu verlieren. Diese hier schien besonders vielversprechend."—Ashiok

foreignNames.name: Cancrena della Mente
foreignNames.text: Un giocatore bersaglio scarta due carte.
foreignNames.flavor: "Mi addolora perdere una fonte di ispirazione. Questa sembrava particolarmente promettente."—Ashiok

foreignNames.name: 精神腐敗
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 「発想の源が失われるのは悲しいものがある。今回のは特に有望そうだったのだが。」——アショク

foreignNames.name: 정신 부패
foreignNames.text: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 두 장을 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: "영감의 원천을 잃는 일은 날 슬프게 한다. 이번 녀석은 특히 유망해 보였었다."—아시오크

foreignNames.name: Estiolar a Mente
foreignNames.text: O jogador alvo descarta dois cards.
foreignNames.flavor: "Me entristece perder uma fonte de inspiração. Essa parecia especialmente promissora."— Ashiok

foreignNames.name: Гниение Разума
foreignNames.text: Целевой игрок сбрасывает две карты.
foreignNames.flavor: «Жаль терять источник вдохновения. Этот выглядел особенно многообещающе».— Ашиок

foreignNames.name: Podredumbre mental
foreignNames.text: El jugador objetivo descarta dos cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Me entristece perder una fuente de inspiración. Esta parecía especialmente prometedora".—Ashiok

cards.name: Mind Rot
cards.originalText: Target player discards two cards.
cards.text: Target player discards two cards.

cards.flavor: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

foreignNames.name: 梦魇
foreignNames.text: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）梦魇的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的沼泽数量。
foreignNames.flavor: 它的铁蹄巨响将梦击入绝境。

foreignNames.name: 夢魘
foreignNames.text: 飛行（此生物只能被具飛行或延勢異能的生物阻擋。）夢魘的力量及防禦力各等同於由你操控的沼澤數量。
foreignNames.flavor: 他的鐵蹄巨響將夢擊入絕境。

foreignNames.name: Cheval de cauchemar
foreignNames.text: Vol (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures avec le vol ou la portée.)La force et l'endurance du Cheval de cauchemar sont chacune égales au nombre de marais que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Cauchemars entrevus dans le sommeil sans bornes, Sirènes aux seins nus, mélusines, licornes (…) »
—Victor Hugo, La Légende des siècles

foreignNames.name: Nachtmahr

rulings.text: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger. It doesn't matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

cards.name: Prized Unicorn
cards.originalText: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

rulings.text: Prized Unicorn doesn't give a creature the ability to block it. It just forces those creatures that are already able to block it to do so. For example, it can't force a creature that's tapped or affected by a spell or ability that says it can't block to block it. If there's a cost associated with having a creature block, its controller isn't forced to pay that cost, so the creature doesn't have to block Prized Unicorn in that case either.
If a creature the defending player controls can't block Prized Unicorn, it can block any attacking creature, or not block at all.

If two Prized Unicorns are attacking, each creature the defending player controls can block either one of them. (The defending player chooses.) A creature that can block multiple creatures, like Palace Guard, must block both of them.

cards.text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

cards.flavor: Sometimes violent earthquakes, hurtling boulders, and unseasonable dust storms are wrongly attributed to the Roil.

foreignNames.name: 跺地猛兽
foreignNames.text: 跺地猛兽不能被反击。践踏（此生物攻击时造成之过量战斗伤害能对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成之。）
foreignNames.flavor: 有时狂烈地震，飞掠巨岩，以及突来砂暴都给人误认作狂搅。

foreignNames.name: 跺地猛獸
foreignNames.text: 跺地猛獸不能被反擊。踐踏（此生物攻擊時造成之過量戰鬥傷害能對防禦玩家或鵬洛客造成之。）
foreignNames.flavor: 有時狂烈地震，飛掠巨岩，以及突來砂暴都給人誤認作狂攪。

foreignNames.name: Piétineur terrestre
foreignNames.text: Le Piétineur terrestre ne peut pas être contrecarré.Piétinement    (Cette créature peut infliger son surplus de blessures de combat au joueur ou au planeswalker défenseur quand elle attaque.)
foreignNames.flavor: Parfois les violents tremblements de terre, les chutes de pierres et les tempêtes de poussière hors-saison sont attribuées par erreur au Roulis.

foreignNames.name: Festlandzertreter
foreignNames.text: Der Festlandzertreter kann nicht neutralisiert werden.Verursacht Trampelschaden   (Diese Kreatur kann beim Angreifen überschüssigen Kampfschaden dem verteidigenden Spieler oder Planeswalker zufügen.)
foreignNames.flavor: Ab und zu werden schwere Erdbeben, herumfliegende Felsen und unerklärliche Staubwirbel fälschlicherweise der Turbulenz angekreidet.

foreignNames.name: Calcaterra
foreignNames.text: Il Calcaterra non può essere neutralizzato.Travolgere  (Questa creatura può infliggere il danno da combattimento in eccesso a un giocatore in difesa o a un planeswalker mentre attacca.)
foreignNames.flavor: A volte violenti terremoti, macigni in caduta e tempeste di polvere fuori stagione sono erroneamente attribuiti al Torbido.

foreignNames.name: 土を踏み付けるもの
foreignNames.text: 土を踏み付けるものは打ち消されない。トランプル（攻撃しているこのクリーチャーは余剰の戦闘ダメージを防御プレイヤーかプレインズウォーカーに与えることができる。）
foreignNames.flavor: 暴力的な地震やぶつかり合う岩、時期外れの砂嵐等は、時として乱動と間違われる。

foreignNames.name: 대지를 짓밟는 야수
foreignNames.text: 대지를 짓밟는 야수는 무효화될 수 없다.돌진  (이 생물은 공격할 때 수비플레이어 또는 플레인즈워커에게 여분의 피해를 입힌다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 사람들은 격렬한 지진이나 낙석, 그리고 먼지 폭풍이 일어나면 항상 소용돌이를 탓한다. 하지만 항상 소용돌이의 소행이라 생각하면 오산이다.

foreignNames.name: Pisoteador de Terreno
foreignNames.text: Pisoteador de Terreno não pode ser anulado.Atropelar  (Esta criatura pode causar seu dano de combate excedente ao planeswalker ou jogador defensor ao atacar.)
foreignNames.flavor: Algumas vezes violentos terremotos, rochedos em queda e tormentas de areia fora de estação são atribuídos erroneamente ao Turbilhão.

foreignNames.name: Земной Тяжелоступ
foreignNames.text: Земной Тяжелоступ не может быть отменен.Пробивной удар (Атакуя, это существо может нанести избыточные боевые повреждения защищающемуся игроку или planeswalker-у.)
foreignNames.flavor: Иногда сильные землетрясения, летящие валуны и неожиданные пылевые бури ошибочно приписываются Великому Валу.

foreignNames.name: Aplastatierra
foreignNames.text: El Aplastatierra no puede ser contrarrestado.Arrolla.  (Esta criatura puede hacer el daño de combate sobrante al jugador o planeswalker defensor mientras ataca.)
foreignNames.flavor: A veces terremotos violentos, piedras volando y tormentas de polvo fuera de temporada se atribuyen por error a la Turbulencia.

cards.name: Terra Stomper
cards.originalText:
Terra Stomper can't be countered.
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)

rulings.text: Terra Stomper can be targeted by spells that try to counter it (such as Cancel). Those spells will resolve, but the part of their effect that would counter Terra Stomper won't do anything. Any other effects those spells have will work as normal.

cards.text:
Terra Stomper can't be countered.
Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
